Topcon Positioning Systems is a global leader in precision positioning technology, operating as a subsidiary of Topcon Corporation, which was founded in Japan in 1932. Established in 1994, the company focuses on developing advanced positioning products and systems for various industries, including construction, agriculture, geospatial, and infrastructure.

The company offers a wide range of products and services centered on precision measurement and automation. This includes surveying instruments like electronic total stations and GNSS receivers, machine control systems for construction machinery, precision agriculture solutions for optimizing crop management, and geospatial tools for data collection and analysis. Topcon Positioning Systems emphasizes innovation in optomechatronics, integrating optical, mechanical, and electronic technologies to enhance operational efficiency.

With a global presence and a commitment to advancing technology, Topcon Positioning Systems aims to simplify workflows and improve productivity for its diverse customer base, which includes construction firms, agricultural producers, and surveying professionals.

Short Description:
Meet U-STUCCO™, world's lightest one-coat stucco that is revolutionizing the stucco industry with its thermal, fire, acoustic and water insulation properties. It's an ultra light-weight (7 times lighter than a conventional stucco) hydrophobic, high crack and corrosion resistant, UV reflective, ready-to-use powder-mix product. It provides fire resistance (2hr rated @1200°C/ 2192°F) as well as thermal (R 2.2 per inch), water and acoustic insulation (38 dB).

U-STUCCO's simple one-coat application process greatly reduces time and labor expenses and renders traditional 3-coat application obsolete. U-STUCCO™ can be applied in a single pass of up to 1" to nearly any substrate, including plywood, OSB, concrete, masonry, AAC, steel, EPS, XPS, ICF and plastic substrates.

U-STUCCO™ is ideal for achieving superior energy efficiency. It can be used in conjunction with EPS, XPS, ICF to create wall assemblies with higher insulation R values and improved crack and water-resistance complying with California Title 24 code helping you build sustainable living spaces.

U-STUCCO™ may also be used over wood or gypsum backing and as a scratch and brown coat application for a conventional stucco system. 

U-STUCCO™ is 99% inorganic and contains 40% post-consumer recycled content making it a true green product. It is a class 1 non-flammable material therefore it doesn't burst into flame or emit any toxic gas when exposed to fire. It allows your building to breathe and prevents mold and moisture from occuring.

Short Description:
Versatile strives to be the most trusted high-performance, two-component floor coating company in America. With over 100 million square feet of floor coating products sold, we are a leading manufacturer of high-quality direct-to-concrete epoxy, polyaspartic, polyurea, and chemical-resistant urethane floor coatings designed for residential, industrial, and commercial concrete floors.

Versatile maintains the largest stock of two-component floor coating and flake products of any family-owned manufacturer in the USA. With our in-house R&D and proprietary product technology, we deliver consistent, high-quality products that you can trust.

Versatile is your one-stop shop for concrete floor coating products, kits, and systems. Our wide selection of products, factory-direct pricing, technical support, and reputation for outstanding quality means that you'll find the products you need, at the price you want, with results that will stand up for years.

Benefits to Versatile Floor Coatings:
•	One-Day Install - Our most popular epoxy and polyaspartic floor coatings can be installed in one day, resulting in very little downtime for your business or garage. 
•	Maintenance Free - Our clear, abrasion-resistant polyaspartic topcoats produce a tough, easy-to-clean surface that does not require regular waxing or other labor-intensive upkeep. They are also impact-, abrasion-, and chemical-resistant.
•	No Peeling or Chipping - Our flooring systems are built on our proprietary direct-to-concrete epoxy that wicks deep into the concrete creating a bond that is three times stronger than other epoxies, preventing peeling and chipping.

Centrally located in Dallas, we offer free, same-day shipping on all our products. Bulk orders include free shipping and volume discounts giving you even greater savings when you shop with us. Also, Our Customer for Life program offers great rewards for our repeat customers.

Shop Versatile.net today for all your epoxy and polyaspartic floor coating needs.

Short Description:
Western Forms, Inc., based in Kansas City, Missouri, is a prominent manufacturer of aluminum forming systems for the concrete construction industry. Established in 1955, the company is recognized for inventing the first fabricated aluminum concrete form in 1963. With around 350 employees and annual revenues of approximately $63 million, Western Forms serves contractors, builders, and developers in the U.S. and over 35 countries.

The company specializes in aluminum concrete forms used for cast-in-place concrete walls and foundations. Their product offerings include aluminum forming systems, form release agents, steel form ties, and various concrete forms designed for residential, commercial, and large-scale projects. Known for their lightweight and durable designs, Western Forms' products enhance construction efficiency and quality, allowing for quicker setting and stripping of forms.

Western Forms prioritizes strong customer partnerships, providing consultation, technical support, and follow-up services to help clients reduce project costs and improve profitability. Their commitment to innovation and quality has established them as a leader in the aluminum forming systems market for over sixty years.

Short Description:
WRI is the world's leading association of manufacturers, allied industries and professionals engaged in the production and application of structural welded wire reinforcement (WWR) and related products for concrete reinforcement. The only organization devoted solely to developing, expanding and serving structural WWR markets

The Institute's efforts to advance the industry range from executing general marketing campaigns and providing promotional materials to conducting a variety of outreach programs designed to increase the construction industry's awareness and use of structural WWR's superior performance attributes and breadth of applications. WRI and its divisions promote structural WWR through seminars, workshops and programs targeted to construction industry decision-makers, such as architects, contractors, engineers, educators and owners. WRI serves as a resource for technical data and information, customer support, and training.

The Institute maintains a number of standing committees and subcommittees that initiate and oversee these efforts, as well as monitor the industry's emerging technologies and issues. WRI seeks to identify new opportunities and to help manage developments of critical interest to WRI membership and the industry at large.

Short Description:
World of Concrete India (WoC India) is a leading exhibition focused on the concrete and construction industry in India. It is the Indian version of the globally recognized World of Concrete event held annually in Las Vegas. WoC India serves as a key platform for industry professionals, suppliers, manufacturers, and buyers, covering the entire value chain from raw materials to equipment and services.

Organized by Informa Markets India, WoC India takes place annually, with the next event scheduled for October 16 to 18, 2024, at the Bombay Exhibition Center in Mumbai. The exhibition showcases a variety of products and technologies related to concrete production, masonry, construction equipment, and innovative construction solutions. Attendees can participate in live demonstrations, product showcases, and conferences, making it an excellent opportunity for networking and learning about the latest advancements in the industry.

WoC India plays a significant role in fostering innovation and collaboration within India's growing cement and concrete market, supporting the country's infrastructure development goals. It attracts a diverse audience, including contractors, engineers, architects, and project managers, and is backed by prominent industry associations.

Zurn Elkay Water Solutions is a global leader in clean water solutions, focusing on drinking water, hygiene, and sustainable water management. Based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, the company serves various markets, including commercial, municipal, healthcare, industrial, educational, and residential sectors.

The company offers a wide range of products, including engineered water solutions for construction and retrofitting, finished plumbing products like sinks and drinking fountains, washroom partitions, and sustainable hand drying solutions. Zurn Elkay markets its products under several well-known brands, such as Zurn, Wilkins, and JUST, catering to diverse needs in water distribution, drainage, and plumbing. With a history spanning over 125 years, the company emphasizes sustainability and health promotion, aiming to conserve resources while ensuring quality and reliability in its offerings.

Short Description:
Wiggert USA | Advanced Concrete Technologies, Inc. is the North American division of Wiggert & Co, a German company with over 50 years of experience in concrete batching and mixing plant solutions. Headquartered in Greenland, New Hampshire, Wiggert USA provides comprehensive services including customer support, training, technical assistance, and parts warehousing. The company specializes in delivering fully integrated concrete batching plants, mixers, control systems, and concrete distribution systems, focusing on high-quality concrete production for large civil projects.

Their product offerings include flexible concrete batching plants like WicoMix and CentroMix, high shear HPGM planetary mixers, and DWM twin shaft mixers. Wiggert USA also provides advanced control systems for precise batching and mixing, as well as admixture and color pigment systems for customized concrete products. The company emphasizes customer satisfaction through factory-trained service engineers, an extended service program called P3, and rapid spare parts delivery to ensure optimal plant performance and efficiency.

Short Description:
AICrete is a technology company based in Silicon Valley, founded in 2020. It focuses on transforming the concrete and heavy building materials industry using artificial intelligence. The company's mission is to enhance profitability, sustainability, efficiency, and productivity in concrete operations through its proprietary AI-powered platform, AICreteOS.

AICreteOS optimizes concrete recipes by utilizing AI, machine learning, computer vision, and automation. This platform helps concrete producers reduce costs and lower CO2 emissions by up to 35% while improving quality control and operational efficiency. AICrete employs a "recipe-as-a-service" model, allowing real-time adjustments to concrete mixtures to ensure consistent performance despite variations in raw materials and environmental conditions. The company has completed 38 projects, saving producers an average of $3.07 per cubic yard of concrete and avoiding over 37,000 tons of CO2 emissions. AICrete primarily serves concrete producers and manufacturers looking to enhance sustainability and profitability in a competitive market.

AltaVista Strategic Partners is a digital marketing company based in Baltimore, Maryland, founded in 2012. The company focuses on helping contractors and businesses across various industries grow through tailored, data-driven marketing strategies. Established by former electrical contractors Ray and Brian, AltaVista initially specialized in contractor marketing but has since expanded its services to a wider business audience.

The company offers a comprehensive suite of services, including database marketing, digital marketing, and consulting. Their database marketing utilizes a proprietary database of property and facility managers to connect clients with key decision-makers. They aim to be an extension of their clients' businesses, focusing on personalized service and strategic partnerships to drive measurable growth.

Allison Transmission is a global leader in manufacturing fully automatic transmissions and hybrid propulsion systems, primarily for medium- and heavy-duty commercial vehicles and defense applications. Founded in 1915, the company has evolved from its origins in automotive racing components to become a key player in the commercial transmission market.

The company designs and produces a wide range of products, including durable fully automatic transmissions for trucks, buses, and off-highway vehicles. Allison has been a pioneer in hybrid technology since the 1960s, developing hybrid electric powertrains and expanding its eGen Power® portfolio to support the growing demand for electrified solutions. Additionally, Allison provides specialized transmissions for military vehicles, leveraging its extensive experience in high-performance powertrain systems.

Allison Transmission serves a diverse customer base, including commercial vehicle manufacturers, defense agencies, and industries requiring robust off-highway solutions. With a strong commitment to innovation and sustainability, Allison continues to lead in powertrain technology for various applications worldwide.

Short Description:
The American Concrete Institute (ACI) is a non-profit technical society and standards developing organization focused on advancing knowledge and standards related to concrete. Founded in 1905 and headquartered in Farmington Hills, Michigan, ACI has a global presence with offices and resource centers, including a regional office in Dubai. Its mission is to develop and share consensus-based knowledge on concrete technology, design, construction, and materials.

ACI is well-known for its development of concrete standards and building codes, such as the ACI 318 Building Code Requirements for Structural Concrete. The organization also provides education and training through conventions, seminars, and publications, including the monthly magazine *Concrete International*. ACI invests in research and innovation through initiatives like the ACI Foundation and specialized Centers of Excellence, which focus on productivity, nonmetallic materials, and carbon-neutral technologies. ACI serves a diverse audience, including engineers, architects, contractors, material suppliers, and students, making it a vital resource in the concrete industry.

Short Description:
isolved Talent Acquisition, formerly known as ApplicantPro, provides comprehensive talent acquisition and hiring software to help businesses enhance their recruitment processes. Founded in 2007, the company serves over 9,000 customers, offering customizable solutions for organizations of all sizes. In March 2025, ApplicantPro was fully integrated into the isolved brand, becoming isolved Talent Acquisition, which features both a standalone talent acquisition platform and a connected human capital management (HCM) solution through isolved People Cloud™.

The company offers a range of services, including an intuitive Applicant Tracking System (ATS) for managing job postings and applicants, recruitment marketing services, and recruitment process outsourcing (RPO). It also incorporates AI-driven innovations like candidate matching and automated job ad writing. The integration with isolved People Cloud™ allows for a seamless experience throughout the employee lifecycle, covering onboarding, benefits administration, payroll, and talent management. This robust solution supports businesses in attracting, hiring, and retaining top talent efficiently.

Short Description:
ArcSite is a Michigan-based software development company that specializes in a mobile-first CAD platform. This platform simplifies drawing, takeoffs, and estimating for professionals in various industries. Users can create precise, to-scale drawings on iPads, Android tablets, and Windows devices without extensive training. The software integrates design, cost calculation, and proposal generation into a seamless workflow, making it accessible in both field and office environments.

Key features of ArcSite include mobile CAD drawing, automatic material takeoffs, customizable proposals, and secure cloud storage for collaboration. The platform supports integrations with popular business tools like QuickBooks and Salesforce, enhancing project management. ArcSite serves a diverse customer base, including contractors, small business owners, and field technicians across over 50 industries, helping them improve productivity and streamline operations. The company is committed to making CAD design accessible to all users, emphasizing customer-centric values and continuous improvement.

Short Description:
The Association of the United States Army (AUSA) is a nonprofit organization established in 1950 to advocate for the United States Army. Its mission focuses on maintaining a strong national defense, emphasizing landpower and supporting active duty, Reserve, National Guard, civilians, retirees, veterans, and their families. AUSA has expanded significantly, with 121 chapters worldwide and a tripled membership since 2017.

AUSA engages in advocacy and lobbying efforts to promote policies that benefit soldiers and Army civilians. It offers educational programs and resources to enhance professional development and understanding of the Army's role. The organization also supports communities through local programs and activities, fostering connections between the Army and civilian populations. AUSA publishes *ARMY Magazine*, the *Green Book*, and *AUSA Extra*, providing members with valuable information and updates about the Army. Membership is open to anyone who supports a strong national defense, including military personnel, civilians, and industry partners.

Short Description:
BCMI Corp. is a software development company based in Redmond, Washington, founded in 2014 by Craig Yeack and Bernard Benson. The company focuses on creating cloud-based and mobile software solutions specifically for the bulk construction materials industry, which includes ready-mixed concrete, aggregates, cement, and asphalt producers.

The BCMI Platform is a fully integrated software system that supports various business functions such as analytics, operational management, customer relationship management (CRM), and invoicing. Additionally, BCMI offers mobile apps like Material Pro and Material Now, which facilitate real-time communication and order management between producers and their customers. The company is committed to security and scalability, utilizing AWS cloud infrastructure and adhering to industry standards.

In June 2025, BCMI Corp. merged with XBE, enhancing its capabilities in the heavy construction materials software sector. The combined entity aims to deliver innovative, AI-enabled solutions that improve operational efficiency and customer communication for its clients in the bulk construction materials market.

Short Description:
Bekaert is a global leader in steel wire transformation and coating technologies, founded in 1880 in Zwevegem, Belgium. Originally a barbed wire manufacturer, the company has evolved significantly over its 140-year history, focusing on innovation and sustainability. Bekaert holds over 2,100 patents and has a strong research and development presence, emphasizing its commitment to addressing global megatrends such as new mobility, urbanization, and renewable energy.

The company offers a wide range of products, including steel cord for tire reinforcement, wire transformation and coating solutions, and perimeter security products through its Betafence brand. Bekaert serves various industries, including automotive, construction, energy, and agriculture, with a strong presence in Europe, Latin America, North America, and Asia. The company prioritizes customer intimacy by tailoring solutions to meet local market needs and collaborates with global technology leaders to develop innovative products. Bekaert aims to shape how people live and move by delivering sustainable and smart solutions worldwide.

Short Description:
Beneco, based in Scottsdale, Arizona, is a provider of bundled retirement and health & welfare benefits administration solutions, specifically for the prevailing wage market. With over 35 years of experience, Beneco partners with contractors involved in government-funded projects to help them enhance their businesses and support their employees' financial well-being.

The company offers a range of services, including recordkeeping, third-party administration, and benefit plan consulting, all tailored to the complexities of prevailing wage compliance. Beneco's expertise enables contractors to manage employee benefits effectively, reduce labor costs, and enhance their competitive edge in bidding for projects. As part of FuturePlan by Ascensus, Beneco benefits from the resources and expertise of a well-established organization, further strengthening its position in the prevailing wage market.

Boneng Transmission Co., Ltd. is a manufacturer based in Suzhou, China, specializing in mechanical and electrical products. Established in 1992, the company integrates design, manufacturing, assembly, and sales services. It has multiple manufacturing bases across China and assembly plants in various locations, including the United States and India.

The company offers a diverse range of products focused on gear and motor technologies. This includes gearboxes, geared motors, gear drives, servo motors, variable frequency drives, and controllers. Boneng Transmission serves various industrial applications, emphasizing reliable performance and advanced technology. With ISO 9001, ISO 14000, and OHSAS 18001 certifications, the company is committed to quality and environmental management. It exports a significant portion of its products to markets around the world, including North America, Europe, and Asia, while maintaining a strong focus on innovation and customer service.

Chapin International, Inc. is an American manufacturer with over 140 years of experience, specializing in durable sprayers, spreaders, and application tools. Founded in 1884, the company operates multiple manufacturing and warehousing facilities across the United States, totaling over 1.5 million square feet. Chapin is recognized for its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, and it holds an ISO 14001:2015 certification for its environmental management practices.

Chapin offers a diverse range of blow-molded plastic products, including various types of sprayers and spreaders designed for applications in pest control, industrial cleaning, construction, and horticulture. Their product lineup caters to both professional and retail customers, featuring items like the Chapin 1949 Professional 3.5 Gallon Industrial Concrete Pump Sprayer. The company also provides custom blow-molded solutions developed in collaboration with clients to meet specific needs. With a focus on innovation and operational efficiency, Chapin continues to be a trusted supplier across multiple industries.

As a subsidiary of Ewald Dörken AG, which has a rich history dating back to 1892, Dörken Systems combines expertise with a commitment to quality and sustainability.

The company offers a range of products, including air and moisture barriers designed to prevent air infiltration and moisture damage. Their dedication to sustainability is evident in their product design and operational practices, ensuring a balance between quality and environmental responsibility.

DY Concrete Pumps Inc. is a global manufacturer of concrete equipment and hydraulic cylinders, established in 1978. The company is recognized as one of the largest exporters of concrete pumps and hydraulic cylinders, serving major brands like Caterpillar, Genie, John Deere, and Volvo. The company is committed to ethical business practices and customer satisfaction, positioning itself as a trusted partner in the construction industry.

Short Description:
Forta is a private telehealth company that specializes in virtual Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy for children diagnosed with autism spectrum disorder (ASD). Founded in 2021, Forta aims to enhance access to quality healthcare by offering personalized ABA therapy that encourages active parent involvement and achieves positive outcomes for families.

The company provides virtual therapy services through secure video sessions led by experienced Board Certified Behavior Analysts (BCBAs) and Registered Behavior Technicians (RBTs). This approach addresses common barriers to traditional in-person therapy, such as long waitlists and geographic limitations. Forta accepts over 300 insurance plans, including Medicaid, and assists families in obtaining grant funding to help cover therapy costs. Key features of their services include live sessions in the child's home environment, parent coaching, rapid access to care, and flexible scheduling options.

Forta leverages technology and data science to customize care for each child, focusing on reducing challenging behaviors and enhancing communication and learning skills. The company is dedicated to improving healthcare accessibility and outcomes for families affected by autism across the nation.

Short Description:
Graco Inc. is an American industrial company that specializes in fluid-handling systems and products. Founded in 1926 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, by brothers Russell and Leil Gray, Graco initially focused on creating an air-powered grease gun to enhance automobile lubrication in cold weather. Over the years, the company has grown into a global leader with around 4,000 employees and a presence in various international markets.

Graco's product offerings include pumps and spray equipment for industrial, commercial, and automotive applications, airless spray guns, lubrication equipment, and advanced fluid handling systems. The company serves a diverse range of customers, including those in the automotive, industrial manufacturing, construction, and commercial sectors. Graco is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker symbol GGG and is recognized for its commitment to innovation and quality in fluid handling technology.

Short Description:
Haviland Corporation has manufactured squeegees in the United States since 1946. The company began as a small family-owned business in Missouri. Haviland squeegees continues as a family-owned business selling nationwide and internationally manufacturing over 5000 types of squeegees.  

The company's main product is floor squeegees.  Straight floor squeegees range from 12 to 72 inches long and curved squeegees from 18 to 54 inches long. Floor squeegees also include blade options such as rubber, foam, serrated, non-marking, high heat, petroleum resistant, food service, and slanted edge.  

The window squeegee line consists of four main squeegees which includes economical, aluminum, heavy-duty and a dual edge. Also included is a 14-inch window scrubber. 

A line of specialty products is also manufactured.  This line includes grill squeegees, roller squeegees, waterbrooms, scrapers, crackfillers, and tampers.

Haviland Corporation manufactures a family of squeegees that is embedded with an antimicrobial agent. The antimicrobial agent has been tested to ASTM-E-2149-01 standards to be 99.9% effective in reducing MRSA bacteria.

Lastly, Haviland manufactures replacement blades for sweeper scrubbers.  Manufacturing complete kits in standard materials or specialty materials. This includes machines that are obsolete.

Short Description:
The International Grooving & Grinding Association (IGGA) is the sole representative of the grooving, grinding and CPP/CPR industry. From specification and policy development to marketing and promotion, we cover the entire spectrum of issues germane to companies involved in this marketplace. 

The IGGA is a non-profit trade association founded in 1972 with a stated mission of serving as the leading promotional and technical resource for acceptance and proper use of diamond grinding and grooving as well as CPP/CPR. In 1995, the IGGA joined in affiliation with the American Concrete Pavement Association (ACPA) to represent its newly formed Concrete Pavement Restoration Division. Renamed in 2012 as The IGGA/ACPA Concrete Pavement Preservation Partnership (IGGA/ACPA CP3), it now serves as the technical resource and industry representative in the development and marketing of optimized pavement surfaces, concrete pavement restoration and pavement preservation around the world. 

Members of the IGGA include: 
Associates 
Concrete construction material manufacturers and suppliers
Concrete sawing & cutting equipment manufacturers
Consultants
Contractors
Government officials 
Diamond blade manufacturers
Honorary life members

Short Description:
Kishigo is an American company based in Santa Ana, California, specializing in high-visibility safety apparel. With over 50 years of experience since its founding in 1971, Kishigo designs and manufactures durable and comfortable workwear that enhances safety for workers in hazardous environments. Their product range includes high-visibility and flame-resistant vests, shirts, jackets, pants, and rainwear, catering to sectors such as construction, airport operations, and municipal services.

The company emphasizes quality materials and innovative design, ensuring that their garments meet the needs of various industries. Kishigo's flagship brand, 1971, reflects decades of expertise and continuous improvement in workwear. They also offer custom-made solutions to meet unique client requirements, supported by an in-house design center. Kishigo serves a diverse customer base, including municipalities and private industries, and is committed to maintaining a professional appearance for workers. Their mission is to be the most trusted brand in high-visibility workwear, driven by a passion for safety and quality.

Short Description:
Established in 1958, KOR-IT® is a leading diamond tools and core drill machine manufacturer. Our catalog includes core drill machines, core drill bits, diamond saw blades, walk behind saws and related accessories. KOR-IT® strives to uphold our promise of providing the most durable equipment at the most favorable terms, while maintaining the best customer service rating in our sector.

Any of our machines compete side-by-side with our competition and drill faster, last longer and provide a more efficient drilling process. With the gasoline powered K-401 and versatile K-102 as its foundation, KOR-IT® has developed, in recent years, a product line of bits, saw blades, and more than 30 core drill machine models and accessories. Through our products, we aim to save our customers money and reduce job related injuries and loss.

KOR-IT® owes this success to meeting customers' needs and offering customer satisfaction with quality customer service as industry expertise. In addition, KOR-IT® also meets unique drilling requirements. If you don't see it, but need it, call us and we will have our design department create it.

Today KOR-IT® products are used worldwide and sold through a dedicated dealer network. It's not unusual to find a seasoned customer still using the K-401, which was purchased 35 years ago. Its no wonder why thousands of clients around the world count on KOR-IT as their preferred diamond tools and core drill machine manufacturer.

Our customers buy value, and we provide value daily, by making a positive improvement in their business.

Short Description:
MaintainX is a digital platform focused on maintenance and operations management, enhancing collaboration for industrial and frontline teams worldwide. Founded in 2018, the company provides a mobile-first solution that streamlines maintenance workflows, maximizes equipment uptime, and promotes operational excellence across various industries.

The platform offers a range of tools, including work order management, preventive and predictive maintenance, asset management, and parts inventory management. Users can create and monitor maintenance work orders, automate scheduling, and track asset health. MaintainX also features customizable reporting and analytics to support data-driven decision-making. With capabilities for multi-site organizations, it enables standardization and performance comparison across locations. The company supports over 11,000 customers globally, helping them manage more than 7.3 million assets and complete over 54 million work orders.

Short Description:
Pinnacle Infotech is a global leader in Building Information Modeling (BIM) solutions for the Architecture, Engineering, and Construction (AEC) industry. Founded in 1991 and based in Houston, Texas, the company has over 30 years of experience and has completed more than 15,000 projects in over 43 countries, serving over 2,000 clients.

The company offers a wide range of BIM services that encompass the entire project lifecycle, including design and consultancy, pre-construction services, value engineering, construction management, and facilities management. Pinnacle Infotech utilizes advanced BIM tools like Autodesk Revit and AutoCAD to ensure precise modeling and design. With a workforce of over 5,500 professionals and 14 delivery centers worldwide, they are well-equipped to handle complex construction projects across various industries, including airports, hospitals, and high-rise towers. Their commitment to excellence and innovation positions them as a key partner in the global AEC sector.

Short Description:
Portamix specializes in mobile mixing equipment for the flooring industry, focusing on mixing and pouring self-leveling compounds and floor coatings. Founded in 1995, the company has built a strong reputation for innovation and reliability, collaborating with leading material manufacturers to enhance efficiency and profitability for flooring professionals.

The flagship product line includes Portamix Hippo mixers, designed for on-site mixing and pouring of various flooring materials. Models such as the Mega Hippo, Pelican Mixer, and Badger cater to diverse mixing needs. These mixers are known for their precision and ease of cleaning, handling materials like polyaspartics, epoxies, and cement-based coatings. Portamix also provides tools like a profit calculator to help customers assess their return on investment.

With a strong international presence, particularly in Australia, the United States, and the United Kingdom, Portamix has been involved in significant projects, including large-scale industrial installations. The company emphasizes core values of responsibility, trust, and positivity, ensuring a dedicated approach to customer service and community engagement.

Short Description:
Prestige Protective Coatings is a Family/Veteran owned & operated company in Mesa, Arizona.  Husband and Wife team Dale & Lisa Breese have over 25 combined years of experience in the industry. They have such a passion for the industry that in 2012 they opened up a One-Stop-Shop in Mesa, AZ to offer the best products on the market. They offer highly competitive prices along with top-notch technical support & expert advice to contractors, distributors, architects, engineers and end-users nationwide.

Having formally been on the installation side of the business for so many years has given them insight and knowledge into a number of different products. They know which products are tried & true, they know which products WORK!

Prestige Protective Coating carries several different national lines of products for all of the following:

  Decorative Concrete
  Resinous Coatings
  Stains – Water Based & Acid
  Sealers – Water Based & Solvent Based
  Polymer Modified Concrete
  Stamped Lace
  Textured Trowel Overlays
  Industrial & Residential Countertop Epoxy
 
In addition, Prestige Protective Coatings also carries a full line of concrete 
surface prep and clean up equipment as well as tooling and materials for 
grinders, diamond tooling, polishers and dust collection systems.
 *Rental Available on select units

Prestige Protective Coatings is here to offer you expert customer service, the highest quality products on the market and the ability to interpret the needs of each client and make recommendations to improve the performance, durability and aesthetics for a wide range of projects.  Training classes are offered on both techniques using various products and equipment being introduced to the market.  We look forward to working with YOU!

Short Description:
ProAll - A Terex Brand is a Canadian manufacturer specializing in mobile volumetric concrete mixers. Founded in the mid-1960s, the company has grown to serve both North American and global markets, employing around 170 people. Its main production facility is located in Olds, Alberta, with a service and installation site in Keller, Texas.

ProAll's mobile volumetric concrete mixers provide make-to-order concrete directly at job sites. This technology allows for precise mixing of concrete ingredients on demand, improving delivery quality and efficiency while minimizing waste. The mixers are particularly suited for projects requiring smaller, specialized pours that traditional ready-mix delivery cannot accommodate. As part of Terex Materials Processing, ProAll enhances Terex's presence in the concrete mixer market and supports its strategic growth in construction and infrastructure sectors.

REVOMAC INDUSTRIES PVT LTD is a prominent manufacturer and exporter of concrete product machines, established in 2010 and located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. The company specializes in designing and producing machinery for a variety of concrete products used in construction, such as fly ash bricks, paver blocks, and concrete blocks. 

With a modern manufacturing facility, REVOMAC Industries utilizes advanced Indian and German technologies to enhance productivity and operational efficiency. Their product range includes automatic concrete block machines like the Robotic 9000, MAC +4000, and MAC 2500, which are built for reliability and durability to support large-scale production. 

In addition to machinery, REVOMAC offers comprehensive business setup solutions, providing technical advisory and support to customers. The company is dedicated to maintaining high-quality standards and continuously improving its offerings, ensuring customer satisfaction and a commitment to sustainable practices.

Short Description:
SharpGrade is a family-owned company that designs, manufactures, and exports skid steer grader attachments. Founded in 2014 in Hamilton, New Zealand, and now based in Bellefontaine, Ohio, USA, SharpGrade focuses on creating high-performance grading tools for compact track and skid steer loaders.

The SharpGrade Grader Series features advanced grader blades developed with contractor feedback to ensure strength, reliability, and precision. These attachments include hydraulically controlled wings and zero cross coupling technology, allowing for forward and backward grading. They are compatible with various machine control technologies, such as 2D laser, sonic tracker, 3D GPS, and robot positioning systems, making them suitable for modern construction and earthmoving applications.

SharpGrade serves contractors and operators in the construction, landscaping, and earthmoving industries, providing precise grading solutions. The company also collaborates with distributors like Earthmoving Equipment Australia (EEA) to offer full installations and user training, ensuring customers receive both equipment and technical support.

Short Description:
Sika is a global specialty chemicals company founded in 1910 in Zurich, Switzerland. It started with the invention of Sika-1, a quick-setting waterproofing admixture, which played a crucial role in waterproofing the Gotthard Tunnel. Headquartered in Baar, Switzerland, Sika operates in over 100 countries and offers a wide range of products and services for the construction and industrial sectors.

The company specializes in developing and producing specialty chemicals across seven target markets: concrete, waterproofing, roofing, flooring, sealing & bonding, refurbishment, and industry. Sika provides integrated solutions that support the entire lifecycle of buildings and infrastructure, from initial construction to repair and refurbishment. Its product offerings include concrete admixtures, waterproofing systems, roofing solutions, flooring systems, sealing and bonding agents, refurbishment products, and industrial solutions. Sika serves various customers, including construction companies, industrial manufacturers, and public infrastructure projects, contributing to landmark projects worldwide.

Short Description:
Vantage Point Consulting, Inc. is a strategic consulting and solutions firm founded in 2006, specializing in workforce development, IT services, and management consulting. As a Veteran- and Woman-Owned Small Business, it focuses on serving public sector and postsecondary education clients. The company utilizes design, data science, technology, and strategic planning to help organizations achieve exceptional outcomes.

The range of services offered includes IT solutions like cloud migration and professional IT staffing, workforce development initiatives that support career pathways and strategic planning, and management consulting with a focus on data-driven solutions and agile project management. Vantage Point Consulting serves various industries, including financial services, healthcare, and government, and is recognized for its client-centric approach that emphasizes tailored solutions and long-term relationships.

Notably, the company launched the Displaced by DOGE Network, a nationwide platform aimed at assisting public servants facing career transitions. Co-founders Cristine Carpenter and Jeffrey Carpenter lead the firm, bringing expertise in HR and management consulting to drive its mission of promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion in the workplace.

Short Description:
SOLARMAN Europe is a regional branch of SOLARMAN, part of IGEN Tech Co., Ltd., which specializes in innovative energy solutions. Founded in 2009, the company focuses on intelligent photovoltaic (PV) and smart energy management solutions, emphasizing sustainable, zero-carbon energy systems. With over 15 years of experience, SOLARMAN provides integrated hardware, software, and data analytics solutions for renewable energy assets.

The company offers a comprehensive suite of products and services, including data loggers, smart meters, and a cloud platform for real-time monitoring of solar energy systems. Their Energy Management System (EMS) optimizes green energy production and consumption, while the Home Energy Management System (HEMS) enhances user control over energy usage. SOLARMAN Europe also features dedicated local teams to provide tailored support, ensuring high service quality and operational efficiency. The company serves a diverse range of customers, including residential users, commercial and industrial clients, and PV professionals, contributing to the European energy transition.

Sod Solutions is a private company founded in 1994 that specializes in the research, development, and marketing of patented turfgrass varieties. With over 25 years of experience, the company combines expertise and technology to provide innovative solutions for homeowners and professionals in the turfgrass industry.

The company offers a variety of sod brands, including Celebration and Discovery, as well as Bermudagrass, Bluegrass, Centipedegrass, Fescue, MicroClover, St. Augustine, Tall Fescue, and Zoysiagrass. In addition to sod, Sod Solutions provides plugs, grass seed, and a range of lawn care products such as fertilizers and pest control solutions. They also develop software tailored for sod farms and distributors to enhance operational efficiency. Sod Solutions serves a diverse customer base, including homeowners, sod farms, distributors, landscapers, and sports field managers, focusing on quality and innovation in turfgrass solutions.

Short Description:
TeamGantt is a project management software company founded in 2009 in Baltimore, Maryland, by John Correlli and Nathan Gilmore. The company specializes in providing intuitive online Gantt chart tools that help teams collaborate effectively on projects. Originally named Groundbreaking Designs LLC, TeamGantt was created to address the need for an efficient online scheduling and collaboration solution.

The core offering is a cloud-based platform that allows teams of any size and industry to plan, track, and manage projects visually through Gantt charts. The software is designed for ease of use, requiring no advanced project management skills, making it accessible to a wide range of users. TeamGantt supports various project sizes and workflows, enhancing productivity and collaboration, especially in remote work environments. The company serves thousands of customers globally, including Fortune 500 companies and teams in sectors like construction, engineering, software development, marketing, and manufacturing.

Tecwill Ltd. is a leading company in the design, manufacture, and supply of mobile and stationary concrete batching and mixing plants. Founded in 1994 and based in Joensuu, Finland, Tecwill has nearly 30 years of experience and has delivered over 300 concrete plant solutions worldwide. The company specializes in modular, containerized, and mobile concrete batching plants, ensuring reliability and fast installation.

Their product range includes ARCAMIX containerized plants, COBRA mobile mixing plants, and modular plants for precast factories. Tecwill provides comprehensive services, including plant installation, technical support, and spare parts supply, serving a diverse international customer base in various sectors like construction and mining.

Short Description:
ABAGY Robotic Systems is a technology company based in Houston, Texas, specializing in AI-powered software solutions for industrial robots, particularly in robotic welding automation. Founded in 2019, ABAGY operates globally with additional offices in Chicago, San Francisco, Germany, UAE, and Cyprus. The company aims to make sophisticated robotic automation accessible to a wide range of manufacturing businesses, addressing the growing shortage of skilled welders.

ABAGY develops software that enables industrial robots to perform tasks such as welding, cutting, grinding, and assembly with high precision. Their flagship product allows users to upload a 3D model and define welding parameters, automatically generating optimal robot paths. This system is compatible with major robot manufacturers and integrates with leading welding equipment brands. ABAGY primarily serves manufacturers in high-mix, low-volume production environments, focusing on those seeking to enhance productivity and quality through user-friendly robotic automation.

Airfoam Industries Ltd. is a prominent North American manufacturer based in Surrey, British Columbia, specializing in sustainable building envelope insulation products. The company focuses on expanded polystyrene (EPS) solutions that enhance energy efficiency and provide lightweight fill materials for various construction applications. With around 87 employees and annual revenues of approximately $17.7 million, Airfoam is recognized for its high-performance insulation products.

The product range includes Insulated Concrete Form (ICF) walls, floors, and roofs, rigid board EPS and Geofoam, laminated vapor barriers, tapered roof systems, and custom EPS forms. Airfoam's products are designed for residential, commercial, and industrial construction, emphasizing durability and environmental sustainability. The company is committed to delivering insulation solutions that maintain superior thermal resistance and moisture resistance, ensuring long-term energy efficiency in building projects.

American Highway is a prominent manufacturer and supplier of infrastructure products, primarily serving highway contractors in the United States and Canada. Formerly known as Simplex-USA, the company rebranded in 2020 and operates as a division of Simplex. It specializes in high-quality products for concrete pavements, including loose dowels, tie bars, welded dowel assemblies, and innovative solutions like Armour Coat™ dowel bars and baskets. 

With a manufacturing footprint of 448,000 square feet across facilities in Fernley, Nevada; Kankakee, Illinois; and Minneapolis, Minnesota, American Highway employs over 150 people. The company is committed to technical expertise, on-time delivery, and customization to meet specific project needs. Its products support the structural integrity of roads, highways, and airport pavements, and the company provides technical specifications and expert guidance to ensure compliance and optimal performance.

Short Description:
BuildBlock Building Systems is a manufacturer based in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, specializing in insulating concrete forms (ICFs) and related building products. Founded in 2004 by Mike Garrett, the company is dedicated to producing energy-efficient, durable, and sustainable building solutions. Their core product line includes BuildBlock, BuildLock, BuildRadius, BuildDeck, and GlobalBlock ICF technologies, which combine the strength of steel-reinforced concrete with the insulation properties of Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) foam.

The ICFs from BuildBlock are designed for ease of installation, featuring innovations like molded-in tape measures and fully reversible blocks. These features help streamline construction, reduce errors, and minimize waste. The company serves a variety of building projects, from custom homes to multi-level commercial structures, focusing on quality and affordability. BuildBlock aims to promote the benefits of energy-efficient and sustainable construction through a network of distributors and dealers, ensuring their products enhance building performance and support successful construction practices.

Short Description:
Oil drillers, Frac Sand operators, cement manufacturers, energy companies and food processors all face a similar challenge of moving huge amounts of dry bulk solids daily.  Bulk materials vary drastically in texture, moisture content, and size of pieces; the solutions for handling them are surprisingly comparable.  

Cambelt International has been solving these challenges for over half of a century.  At the core of Cambelt's technology is our unique and patented one-piece flexible sidewall conveyor belting.  Our patented belt design provides a structurally stronger material that can be transported up steep angles including vertical inclines.  

In Cambelt's propriety press, CamBelt, CamWall and CamFlex conveyor belts are produced with the base belt, the sidewall, and the cleat or nubs molded and vulcanized together to for a homogenous belt with unsurpassed durability.  Cambelt GUARANTEES that its rugged, one-piece, homogeneously cured products will not delaminate. 

Cambelt PROUDLY designs, engineers, manufactures and assembles all of our products in the USA.  Call us today to see how we can help solve your material handling challenges.

Short Description:
CONSAP S.p.A. is a private company established in 1993 and wholly owned by the Italian Ministry of Economy and Finance. It operates in the insurance sector, managing public interest insurance services that were inherited from the former Istituto Nazionale delle Assicurazioni (INA). 

The company oversees several key public insurance funds, including the Guarantee Fund for Road Accident Victims, which compensates victims when the responsible party is uninsured or unidentified. It also manages the Fondo di Solidarietà for victims of mafia-related crimes and administers the Compensation Body and Clearing House for motor insurance claims. Additionally, CONSAP provides information to claimants involved in cross-border motor vehicle accidents within the European Economic Area.

By acting as a public insurer, CONSAP ensures coverage and support in situations where private insurance may not be sufficient. The company plays a vital role in protecting public interests and victims' rights in Italy, employing between 51 and 200 people and generating estimated revenues between 11 million and 100 million euros.

Short Description:
CYNTECH is a Calgary-based company founded in 1981, specializing in innovative engineering solutions for the construction and energy sectors. The company is known for its pioneering products, including Helical Screw Piles and Pipeline Anchors for Buoyancy Control, which help reduce costs and energy use in pipeline construction and infrastructure projects.

CYNTECH operates in three main areas: Pipeline Anchoring Solutions, which provide cost-effective buoyancy control; Helical Screw Piles, offering reliable foundation support; and Helical Rigid Inclusions, designed to improve soil stability for infrastructure development. The company is backed by a team of professional engineers and experienced staff, ensuring high safety standards and project success.

Acquired by Keller Group plc in 2013, CYNTECH has enhanced its access to advanced technologies and resources, furthering its innovation and global reach. The company serves a diverse customer base in the industrial and infrastructure construction markets, particularly in pipeline construction and energy projects, with solutions valued for their cost-effectiveness, safety, and environmental benefits.

EUROBEND is a prominent European manufacturer specializing in advanced technology machinery with over 30 years of experience. The company is known for its robust research and development department, which fosters innovation to meet the needs of the construction, wire, and rebar processing industries. Short Description:
GBM Shoring and Scaffolding® is an Italian manufacturer with over 60 years of experience in building equipment, specializing in post shores and scaffolding. The company, which rebranded from GBM Building Equipment in 2012, operates in more than 70 countries worldwide. 

Their product lineup includes various types of post shores, such as light post shores, DIN EN 1065 post shores, and aluminum post shores, essential for multi-storey construction. GBM also offers a range of scaffolding systems, including pin scaffolding and pipe-coupling scaffolding, widely used in construction and maintenance projects. Additionally, they provide yellow beams, formwork wooden panels, and over 120 accessories for post shores and scaffolding, allowing for customized solutions.

GBM emphasizes high production flexibility and quick response to international demand, ensuring quality and compliance with European standards. Their primary customers are construction companies that require reliable and certified equipment for safe and efficient project completion.

Short Description:
Geotab is a leading provider of connected vehicle and fleet management solutions, established in 2000 in Oakville, Ontario, Canada. The company has grown significantly, serving over 55,000 customers across more than 130 countries with a workforce of over 2,000 employees and a partner network of over 700.

Geotab specializes in advanced data analytics, artificial intelligence, and Internet of Things (IoT) technology to enhance fleet performance, safety, and sustainability. Its core product, the Geotab GO telematics device, collects extensive vehicle data and supports various functionalities through add-ons. The company also offers a cloud-based fleet management platform that processes over 80 billion data points daily, providing tools for vehicle tracking, driver safety, fuel optimization, and predictive maintenance. Additionally, Geotab's open platform allows integration with numerous third-party applications, enabling tailored solutions for diverse business needs.

Short Description:
GRIPMetal™ is a revolutionary new manufacturing material that consists of a series of consistent small-scale metal hooks that are uniformly distributed on thin gauge sheet metal. The hooks allow for other softer materials to mechanically bond with GRIPMetal™ providing improved mechanical properties of created composites even without the use of adhesives. The composites can be created by simple pressure bonding or molding.

GRIPMetal™ material can be successfully bonded with various materials such as thermoplastic materials, fiber reinforced polymers, phenolic, performance polymers, graphite, fiber-based materials (Kevlar, glass fiber, carbon fiber, friction material), coatings, concrete, and a wood. 

GRIPMetal's ability to bond instantly to almost any material makes it the most versatile MECHANICAL bonding technology available today. 

This material aims at replacing or reinforcing traditional adhesive bonding between two materials by utilizing the proprietary technology.

The hooks are precisely formed to specification, available in a range of hook heights up to as much as 4 times the base material thickness and they can be produced in various different geometries.

Short Description:
Cummins Inc. is a global leader in the design, manufacture, distribution, and service of diesel and natural gas engines, as well as power generation equipment. Founded in 1919 in Columbus, Indiana, the company has expanded to operate in approximately 190 countries and territories. Cummins is recognized for its innovation and quality in power solutions, with a strong legacy in diesel engine technology.

The company offers a wide range of products, including durable and fuel-efficient engines for heavy-duty trucks, buses, construction equipment, and marine vessels. Cummins also designs and manufactures electrical power generation systems, including generators for commercial, industrial, and residential markets. Additionally, it produces various components that enhance engine performance and compliance with emission standards. With a global network of over 600 distributors and approximately 7,200 dealers, Cummins provides comprehensive aftermarket support, ensuring reliable service for its diverse customer base across multiple industries.

Short Description:
3M Company, founded in 1902 in Minnesota, is a global multinational conglomerate known for its innovative culture and diverse product offerings. Originally focused on mining minerals, 3M quickly transitioned to manufacturing sandpaper and adhesive products, including the well-known masking tape and Scotch Tape.

Today, 3M produces over 55,000 products used in homes, businesses, schools, hospitals, and industrial settings. Its extensive product range includes adhesive tapes, abrasives, medical and dental supplies, consumer office products like Post-It Notes, safety and security items, and electronic materials for visual displays. The company emphasizes research and development, with a significant portion of its sales coming from products developed in recent years. Headquartered in Maplewood, Minnesota, 3M operates in 48 countries and serves a wide array of sectors, including industrial, healthcare, consumer, and government markets.

Short Description:
Bobcat Company is a leading manufacturer of compact construction equipment, renowned for its skid-steer loaders. Founded in 1947 in Gwinner, North Dakota, the company originated as Melroe Manufacturing Company. The brand name "Bobcat" was introduced in 1962, reflecting the toughness and agility of its machines. 

Bobcat's product lineup includes skid-steer loaders, compact track loaders, compact excavators, telehandlers, backhoe loaders, compact tractors, and various attachments. The company serves a wide range of industries, including construction, landscaping, agriculture, and material handling. Bobcat is recognized for its innovative approach, having produced over one million loaders and pioneered compact excavators in North America. 

With a strong global presence and a commitment to quality, Bobcat continues to be a trusted choice for customers seeking reliable and efficient compact equipment. Its machines are designed for versatility and productivity, making Bobcat a prominent name in the industry.

Short Description:
Fullbay is a cloud-based shop management software platform designed for heavy-duty diesel truck repair shops and fleet maintenance operations. Founded in 2014 and based in Phoenix, Arizona, Fullbay addresses the unique challenges faced by independent heavy-duty repair shops, which differ from light-duty automotive businesses.

The software streamlines the repair process, enabling shops to manage everything from repair requests to invoicing in a paperless environment. It helps shop owners and technicians efficiently handle multiple vehicles for business customers, improving workflow and increasing profitability. Fullbay's platform is regularly updated based on customer feedback to enhance usability and functionality.

Targeting independent heavy-duty diesel repair shops and fleet maintenance providers, Fullbay offers a comprehensive management system that includes tools for job tracking and operational efficiency. The company is committed to promoting safer roads and supports charitable causes within the trucking industry, reflecting its dedication to the heavy-duty repair community.

Short Description:
PROGRESS GROUP is an international company specializing in the design, manufacture, and supply of machines, systems, and software for precast concrete plants. Founded in 1961 in Vahrn, Italy, the company has established itself as a global leader in providing comprehensive technology solutions for the precast concrete industry, including automation for reinforcement and precast element production.

With headquarters in Brixen, South Tyrol, and multiple locations worldwide, PROGRESS GROUP operates its own advanced precast concrete plant, which also serves as an innovation hub. The company offers a wide range of products and services, including turnkey carousel plants, moulding systems, and software solutions tailored to the precast concrete sector. Its commitment to sustainability is evident in its innovative building systems, such as the Green Code, which utilizes precast concrete elements. PROGRESS GROUP serves a diverse global customer base, supporting manufacturers and bending companies across Europe, North America, Asia, and Oceania.

Short Description:
The American Shotcrete Association (ASA) is a trade association founded in 1998 to promote and advance the shotcrete industry. Established by industry leaders, ASA focuses on enhancing the quality and acceptance of shotcrete in various concrete construction applications. The association serves as a central resource and advocate, providing education, certification, technical resources, and networking opportunities.

ASA offers certification programs for shotcrete nozzlemen and other professionals, ensuring adherence to industry standards. It organizes educational events, including conventions and workshops, to foster professional growth. The association publishes *Shotcrete* magazine, which features industry news and technical articles, and provides guidelines and research related to shotcrete materials and applications. ASA supports a diverse membership, including contractors, engineers, architects, and researchers, contributing to the advancement of shotcrete as a vital construction method.

Short Description:
The American Society of Concrete Contractors (ASCC) is a non-profit trade association based in St. Louis, Missouri, founded in 1964. It is dedicated exclusively to cast-in-place concrete contractors and represents around 720 to 760 member companies worldwide, including contractors, manufacturers, suppliers, designers, and educators in the concrete industry.

ASCC's mission is to provide a unified voice for concrete contractors, enhancing their presence in the construction sector. The organization offers a variety of resources, including technical bulletins, specialty councils, safety training programs, and certification opportunities. Members benefit from a nationwide network of peers and experts, which helps them improve their construction quality and business operations. ASCC also promotes sustainability through initiatives like the Sustainability Hotline and collaborates with international organizations to advance industry standards and innovation.

Short Description:
The Basement Health Association is a non profit organization whose purpose is to educate the general public about water diversion, waterproofing, structural repair, building and basement health industries.

Basement Health is not a new industry but rather a re-energized movement to improving the health of millions of people who live over unhealthy basements and crawl spaces. Basement Health Association is an umbrella association encompassing all the related basement contractors.

Now for the first time a consumer can join the various groups on this website and learn all they can about good basement health for free! Join our social networking website at http://www.basementhealth.org––get advice and answers from industry experts and your neighbors alike.

Contractors and service professionals join our discussion board and learn all about your industry and also related fields as well. Join one group or all of them – the choice is up to you and best of all it is free!

Contact us today learn more about the Basement Health Association, and learn about becoming a Certified Contractor! (800) 245-6292

Short Description:
Bohringer Group is a Canadian company based in Innisfail, Alberta, specializing in concrete, aggregates, and mining solutions. With over 77 years of experience, the company designs and manufactures heavy-duty equipment that operates effectively in harsh environments. Their focus is on creating robust, high-capacity material processing plants that deliver superior performance.

Founded by Paul Böhringer in West Germany, Bohringer Group has a strong heritage of engineering excellence. The company emphasizes reliability and durability in its products, which include large batch plants and equipment tailored for concrete production, aggregate processing, and mining applications. Their technology is designed to handle tough conditions, ensuring maximum operational efficiency and production capacity.

Bohringer Group serves a global clientele, including concrete producers, aggregate suppliers, and mining operations. Their plants are recognized for their unmatched production capacity and reliability, making them suitable for demanding industrial environments.

Short Description:
BringFuel is committed to being your easiest decision.
We believe that when your challenge begins, our commitment starts. You can count on BringFuel to Bring Safety, to Bring Solutions, and to Bring Value from our people, our products, and our services.

BringFuel delivers diesel, gas, propane, DEF, and lubricants to locations across the United States, focused on tailored solutions to meet your needs and to ensure the most efficient costs, while providing prompt service dedicated to safety and regulatory compliance.

Our team brings decades of experience in construction, rental, industrial, and mission-critical expertise to every task, from logistics, compliance, and safety to urgent and deadline-driven operations or multiple projects in multiple areas.

BringFuel operates 24/7/365, just like you and your business. We are Rapid Response Specialists and react quickly in after-hours situations, holidays, during emergencies, and whenever and wherever you need us.

We don't just deliver fuel and lubricants. BringFuel takes service one step further, by advising on permit needs, including local, state, and federal rules and regulations for fueling.

Established in 2019, but rooted in 90+ years of experience, BringFuel is powered by AGRILAND FS. 
Founded in 1931, AGRILAND FS is a customer-owned cooperative with professional employees, dedicated to being a value-added supplier of products and services for the purpose of improving customer profitability. With more than 90 years of experience serving customers across the Midwest and throughout the United States, AGRILAND FS is a financially strong and dependable cooperative that continually strives to proactively serve patrons' future needs.

Short Description:
BW Manufacturing, Inc. is based in Comstock Park, Michigan, and has been in operation since 1996. The company specializes in designing and manufacturing durable equipment for the surface preparation, restoration, and maintenance industry. Their product line includes concrete shot blasters, scarifiers, and diamond grinders, all featuring an interchangeable attachment design that enhances versatility and efficiency.

All equipment is produced at their facility in Grand Rapids, Michigan, ensuring strict quality control. BW Manufacturing is committed to addressing the challenges faced by contractors, such as workforce shortages and environmental regulations. They also offer on-site training for their equipment, providing customers with operational guidance and maintenance best practices to optimize performance and productivity. Their primary customers are contractors and professionals involved in surface preparation and restoration projects.

Short Description:
Command Alkon is a technology company based in Birmingham, Alabama, founded in 1976. It specializes in software solutions for the heavy building materials industry, serving suppliers and producers of concrete, aggregates, cement, asphalt, and ready-mix products. The company focuses on providing innovative technology to address industry challenges and enhance operations globally.

Under the leadership of CEO Martin Willoughby since 2021, Command Alkon has transitioned many traditional software products to cloud-based applications. Their comprehensive suite of solutions includes tools for production and quality control, dispatch and logistics, trucking and fleet management, sales and office automation, and operational analytics. These offerings cater to a wide range of customers, from small local producers to large multinational corporations.

Command Alkon serves clients in over 80 countries, reflecting its broad market reach. The company has a history of strategic acquisitions, enhancing its technology portfolio and industry presence. Recognized as a top workplace, Command Alkon is committed to innovation and operational efficiency in the heavy building materials sector.

Short Description:
Concrete Cares is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization focused on supporting families and children facing cancer. Founded in 2013 by industry professionals, including Stan and Kyle Poff of Kearney Concrete Co., the organization provides financial assistance for essential living expenses such as rent, utilities, transportation, food, clothing, daycare, and funeral costs. Concrete Cares operates with a commitment to transparency, ensuring that approximately 96% of funds raised go directly to families in need.

The organization has expanded its reach across multiple states, including Nebraska, Missouri/Kansas, South Dakota, Colorado, Arkansas, Arizona, South Carolina, Texas, Nevada, Louisiana, and Illinois. Concrete Cares engages the concrete construction community in fundraising and awareness efforts, symbolized by the phrase "Fighting Cancer 1 Yard at a Time." Supported by volunteers and donors, Concrete Cares aims to keep funds within the states they are collected to assist local families. The organization also collaborates with other cancer support groups to enhance the support provided to families affected by cancer.

Short Description:
Equipment Times is a prominent Indian media company focused on the construction and mining equipment industry. It operates as both a magazine and a digital platform, delivering the latest news, insights, and trends in the construction equipment sector. The company aims to foster innovation by closely monitoring technological advancements and market dynamics, providing comprehensive coverage that inspires progress within the industry.

Recognized as one of India's most widely read publications in this field, Equipment Times offers editorial content that includes news, expert interviews, product launches, and industry analysis. The platform addresses a wide range of topics, such as new machinery, sustainability initiatives, and technological advancements like AI-powered predictive maintenance and next-generation equipment. Its diverse readership includes equipment manufacturers, contractors, engineers, and decision-makers, making it a vital resource for stakeholders in the construction equipment sector.

Short Description:
CS Unitec, Inc. is a manufacturer and supplier of high-performance industrial power tools based in Norwalk, Connecticut. Founded in 1990-1991, the company specializes in electric, pneumatic, hydraulic, and gas-powered tools for various applications, including metalworking, construction, industrial, mining, and marine sectors.

The extensive product portfolio includes deburring equipment, portable magnetic drills, concrete core drilling machines, and specialty tools such as non-sparking safety tools and explosion-proof fans. CS Unitec also offers a variety of additional products like band saws, drill bits, and hydraulic tools. The company serves a diverse customer base, providing durable and reliable tools designed to meet the needs of demanding industries.

In addition to its products, CS Unitec offers services such as technical support, training, and repair and maintenance to enhance tool performance and customer satisfaction. With over 100 years of combined industry experience, the company is recognized for its quality and innovation in power tool manufacturing.

Short Description:
DENSO Corporation is a prominent global manufacturer of automotive components, headquartered in Kariya, Japan. Established in 1949 as a spin-off from Toyota Motor Corporation, DENSO is now the second largest auto parts supplier in the world. The company employs around 168,000 people and operates over 200 subsidiaries across various regions, including North America, Europe, and Asia.

DENSO specializes in a wide array of automotive parts and systems, such as electronic components, air conditioning systems, engine-related components, body equipment, and advanced driver assistance systems. The company is dedicated to innovation and quality, having pioneered electronic controls for automotive applications since the 1960s. DENSO serves a diverse customer base, including major automotive manufacturers globally, reflecting its extensive market presence and commitment to meeting the needs of its clients.

Short Description:
Dodge Construction Network is a prominent technology and data solutions provider for the commercial construction industry. Formed in 2021 by uniting several established brands, it offers the largest connected database in the sector. With over 130 years of experience, the company combines deep industry knowledge with modern digital tools to support construction professionals at every stage of the building process.

The company provides a range of integrated solutions, including Dodge Commercial Construction for project leads and bid management, The Blue Book Network for connecting industry professionals, Sweets for product research, IMS for planning and bidding tools, and Principia for analytics and consulting services. These offerings deliver actionable market intelligence and comprehensive project data, helping clients strategically plan and grow their businesses.

Dodge Construction Network serves a diverse clientele, including general contractors, subcontractors, architects, engineers, and government stakeholders. With a focus on innovation and expansion, the company continues to invest in technology to enhance its services and support the evolving needs of the construction industry.

Short Description:
Dusty Robotics is a California-based company founded in 2018, focused on enhancing the construction industry through innovative robotics. The company develops robot-powered tools that facilitate the digital transformation of construction processes, particularly through its flagship product, the FieldPrinter. This autonomous mobile robot automates the construction layout process by printing digital building plans directly onto job site floors with high precision, significantly improving efficiency and collaboration among trades.

The FieldPrinter allows layout work to be completed up to 10 times faster than traditional methods, reducing errors and rework. Dusty Robotics addresses key industry challenges such as labor shortages and tight project timelines, helping contractors build more efficiently and safely. The company has formed strategic partnerships with major U.S. contractors and has raised over $66 million in funding to support its mission of automating manual processes and enabling digital workflows on job sites. Headquartered in Mountain View, California, Dusty Robotics employs around 63 people and is recognized for its contributions to construction automation.

Short Description:
Ellis Manufacturing Company has been a leading manufacturer of construction materials since 1951. Having a primary focus on shoring equipment for commercial and residential construction, while also offering a wide range of fall protection and formwork solutions. Ellis MFG Co. is dedicated to providing unbeatable quality, affordability, and customer service. Ellis MFG Co. is a privately held company based in Oklahoma City, OK.

Ellis products and methods are intended to help contractors and firemen quickly, safely, and economically temporarily or permanently reinforce vertically suspended structures such as concrete buildings or the inside of mines. However, these products are not limited to the use of vertical applications but are also intended to be used in horizontal reinforcement situations as well; for instance, horizontal support for the walls inside of trenches. Our products are utilized by contractors and fire departments in all 50 states and many other parts of the world as well.

Ellis Manufacturing Co., Inc. is located in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. We are able to serve our customers directly from this facility as well as through a large network of distributors throughout the United States and other parts of the world.

Short Description:
EZG Manufacturing, founded in 1998 by Damian Lang, is based in Malta, Ohio. The company focuses on designing, manufacturing, and customizing masonry and construction equipment, aiming to enhance contractor efficiency and profitability. Their flagship product line, Mud Hog, features patented innovations that improve performance and reliability.

In addition to masonry equipment, EZG Manufacturing serves various related markets, including fencing, hardscape, and precast/refractory. They offer a range of metal fabrication services, such as bending and laser cutting, and can create custom solutions like conveyor systems and cabinets tailored to specific customer needs. 

Customer service is a key aspect of EZG's culture, with a commitment to responsive support and timely order fulfillment. The company prides itself on delivering high-quality, cost-effective solutions backed by extensive industry experience.
