Short Description:
Fujimi Corporation, a subsidiary of Fujimi Incorporated, is a Japanese manufacturer specializing in synthetic precision abrasives. Founded in 1950, the company focuses on grinding, lapping, and polishing abrasives used in high-tech industries such as semiconductors, LEDs, glass, plastics, and metals. 

With manufacturing facilities in Tualatin and Wilsonville, Oregon, Fujimi Corporation produces a variety of lapping and polishing products. It also engages in the import and export of materials from its parent company in Japan and its sister company in Malaysia. The product range includes lapping abrasives for silicon wafers, precision grinding wheels for lenses, polishing compounds for various applications, and thermal spray materials. 

Fujimi Corporation serves leading industries worldwide, emphasizing quality and innovation. The company holds several certifications, including ISO 9001 and ISO 14001, and is committed to integrity and compliance with legal and ethical standards.

Short Description:
Gensco has been part of the scrap recycling, rebar processing, and busbar fabrication industries since 1919. Gensco operates a complete sales, service and manufacturing facility in Toronto, Canada as well as a sales and distribution warehouse outside Atlanta, Georgia in the United States. 

Expertise in the following areas: Recycling Equipment, Metal Processing and Separation Equipment, Material Handling Attachments, End Of Life Vehicles, Rebar Fabrication, Rebar Shearing, Rebar Shearlines, Maintenance of Way, Railroad, Switchgear Fabrication, Demolition, Asset Recovery, Plant Closure and Re-marketing, Appraisal, Project Management and Consultation.

Gensco products can be found at recycling facilities, scrap and auto salvage yards, steel mills, foundries, railways, precast shops, sub-stations and countless industrial settings across North, Central and South America, as well as Europe. Gensco has earned a reputation for honesty and reliability for over 100 years, supplying proven high-quality products, with complete after sales service and support.

We make a range of dustless concrete saws and crack chasers ideal for joint clean-out and crack repair. These saws are heavy-duty, made of the highest quality materials right here in the U.S. Use the Gorilla line of saws on your job site for superior form and function.

Short Description:
Headed Reinforcement Corporation (HRC USA) is a private company based in Fountain Valley, California, that specializes in concrete reinforcement products for the construction sector. Founded in 1990, HRC USA is a leading manufacturer in North America, offering a variety of products including headed reinforcement bars, mechanical couplers and splices, HeadLock™ systems, and friction welding products. These solutions are designed to enhance structural performance and streamline installation in concrete structures.

HRC USA serves a diverse range of applications, from foundations and walls to bridges and high-rise buildings, particularly in seismic regions and under extreme load conditions. The company also plays a key role in testing and certifying new products within the broader HRC group. With an international presence, HRC USA supports major infrastructure projects across Canada, Europe, and the UK, catering to contractors and engineers focused on high-performance concrete reinforcement. Their commitment to innovation and quality makes them a trusted partner in both residential and large-scale commercial construction.

Short Description:
American Honda Motor Company, Inc. is the U.S. subsidiary of Honda Motor Co., Ltd., established in 1959 in Los Angeles. It serves as the main hub for Honda's operations in the United States, overseeing sales, marketing, and distribution of Honda and Acura vehicles, motorcycles, and power equipment. The company moved its headquarters to Torrance, California, in 1990.

American Honda offers a diverse range of products, including popular vehicles like the Honda Accord, Civic, and CR-V, as well as the luxury Acura brand. The company has a strong history in motorcycles, with iconic models such as the Dream and Super Cub. Additionally, it manufactures power equipment, including generators and all-terrain vehicles. American Honda was also the first Japanese automaker to produce cars in the U.S., beginning with the Accord in Ohio in 1982. The company is recognized for its commitment to innovation, quality, and environmental responsibility.

Short Description:
The International Trade Centre (ITC) is a multilateral agency established in 1968 as a joint subsidiary of the World Trade Organization (WTO) and the United Nations (UN). Based in Geneva, Switzerland, ITC employs around 300 staff from over 80 nationalities. Its core mission is to support the internationalization and competitiveness of micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs), particularly in developing countries.

ITC provides a range of services, including trade and market intelligence, technical support, and capacity building to enhance the export capabilities of enterprises. It collaborates with governments and international partners to develop trade policies that benefit exporting enterprises and promote sustainable practices. The organization also manages procurement services for its projects and is involved in the TradeTech Initiative, which uses technology to improve global trade efficiency. ITC focuses on empowering women, youth, and marginalized communities to foster inclusive economic growth.

ITALCARRELLI® is a leading manufacturer based in Chiampo, Vicenza, Italy, specializing in the design and production of self-propelled transporters and equipment for goods handling and storage. Founded in 1995, the company focuses on various industrial sectors, particularly the glass industry. ITALCARRELLI has built a reputation for innovation, investing in automation technologies such as Autonomous Guided Vehicles (AGVs) and integrated warehouse logistics software.

The company's product range includes platform transporters, in-loader transporters, multi-directional side-loaders, and specialized equipment tailored to meet specific industrial needs. Their Glass Division is dedicated to developing machines for handling flat glass, optimizing transport and storage for manufacturers worldwide. ITALCARRELLI serves major global manufacturers, providing customized solutions that enhance efficiency and safety in material handling operations, supported by a comprehensive service network for maintenance and assistance.

Short Description:
KCI is a 100% employee-owned professional services firm based in Sparks, Maryland, with a strong presence across the United States. Founded in 1955, KCI employs over 1,700 professionals in more than 54 offices across 20 states. The company specializes in engineering, consulting, and construction services, focusing on mobility, land development, preservation, and infrastructure projects.

KCI operates through four main sectors: Construction Services, Energy, Healthcare, and Geospatial and IT Solutions. Their Construction Services include telecommunications infrastructure and environmental restoration. The Energy sector supports industrial and utility clients with energy infrastructure and renewable projects. In Healthcare, KCI provides services for the development of medical facilities, including planning and construction management. The Geospatial and IT Solutions sector offers GIS and asset management services to government entities. KCI is committed to quality and holds ISO 9001:2015 certification, ensuring reliable project delivery while upholding core values of honesty, integrity, and continuous innovation.

MagnumStone (MaxumStone in UK) is a proven, large hollow core precast concrete retaining wall system with a growing global network of licensed block production partners. 

This engineered retaining wall system delivers durable, high-strength solutions for residential, commercial and infrastructure projects. With fast installation, comprehensive wall design software and time-saving resources, engineers and contractors can achieve diverse, reinforced retaining wall designs and features. 

From soil retention and slope stabilization to stormwater management and erosion protection, MagnumStone's installation efficiency, enhanced drainage, design versatility and natural stone looks excel in simple and complex applications. 

Ask our experts for more information about MagnumStone block production opportunities in your region, or for further insight on retaining wall designs and installations.

Short Description:
Mateenbar Composite Reinforcements is a global leader in manufacturing high-performance pultruded glass-fiber reinforced polymer (GFRP) rebar for concrete reinforcement. With over 30 years of experience, the company provides innovative and corrosion-resistant composite rebar solutions that serve as sustainable alternatives to traditional steel reinforcement. Their products are engineered to meet international standards and have received approvals from major agencies.

The product lineup includes Mateenbar™ FRP Composite Rebar, designed for maximum strength and bonding with concrete; Mateenbar60™, suitable for large-scale structural projects; and Greenbar2X™, a lightweight and environmentally sustainable option for residential applications. Mateenbar also offers tailored solutions using advanced manufacturing technologies, ensuring reliable infrastructure support.

With a presence in over 2,000 projects worldwide, including significant initiatives like the Jizan Flood Mitigation Channel in Saudi Arabia, Mateenbar has established joint ventures and partnerships to expand its market reach. The company is committed to quality, sustainability, and innovation, making it a trusted partner in modern concrete reinforcement solutions.

Short Description:
We Bring Light and Life to Basements 

Monarch Materials Group Inc. is one of the nation's leading providers of egress window products and basement window systems including a complete line of window systems for poured concrete and block wall applications. Monarch has been a pioneer in the basement window industry with products evolving into today's high quality, durable, and energy efficient models.

Monarch products are fashioned with the long-term best interest of the homeowner in mind. These window systems create beautiful light-filled living spaces. The quality and attention to detail in these products give the homeowner the feeling that the lower level environment they are creating is as important as the main floor. The strength and durability of the materials used to create these products let the homeowner know that these components are going to look and operate great year after year! Simply put, that's what Monarch does: provide above-grade quality, beauty, warmth, security and light for basement living areas.

Monarch is proud to be the only North American manufacturer with a complete line of windows, frames and landscape wells integrated as a flexible, custom-made system.

Short Description:
MPAQ Automation is a Canadian software company based in Mississauga, Ontario, specializing in automation, batching, dispatch, and control systems for the Ready Mix concrete industry.
Since 1988, we've helped concrete producers of all sizes—from single-plant operators to multi-site enterprises—streamline their operations and scale with confidence. Our modular product suite includes:

TouchBatch: Intuitive batching software for Ready Mix and Precast plants

Insight Dispatch: Centralized dispatch system with real-time scheduling and ticketing

RoundTrip GPS: Live truck tracking and route optimization

Inscale: Digital scale ticketing and data capture for drive-over truck scales

Whether you're upgrading outdated systems or building a new plant, MPAQ's software is designed to integrate easily, boost productivity, and deliver clear ROI.
We move quickly to meet customer needs, develop with the latest technology, and back every install with responsive, in-house support. Our team is passionate about concrete—and on sunny days, we're just as passionate about firing up the BBQ.


Our software products involve industrial plant automation (eg. opening and closing material gates, controlling conveyor belts, monitoring material flow, reading weigh scales and pulse meters, all in real time) and product dispatch (eg. dispatching orders to production plants, monitoring fleets of delivery trucks via GPS, load-balancing and optimizing workload across multiple production locations).

Short Description:
NDS is a leading company in water management solutions, specializing in stormwater, irrigation, access box, and flow management. Founded in 1972 and headquartered in Woodland Hills, California, NDS has a rich history of innovation, including the invention of the first plastic catch basin for landscape drainage. Since becoming part of the NORMA Group in 2014, NDS has enhanced its global reach and engineering capabilities.

The company provides a wide range of products designed for efficient water management, such as drainage systems, flow controls, valve and meter boxes, landscape irrigation equipment, permeable pavers, and custom fabrication services. NDS focuses on performance, durability, and ease of installation, catering to both residential and commercial customers. Their client base includes property owners, landscape professionals, irrigation specialists, and municipalities, all seeking sustainable solutions to enhance property value and conserve water resources.

NDS is committed to innovation, customer success, and environmental stewardship, fostering a culture of diversity and continuous improvement. With over 50 years of expertise, NDS aims to address the challenges of water quality and scarcity worldwide.

Short Description:
Pecora Corporation is a leading manufacturer of elastomeric sealants, waterproofing products, adhesives, and coatings, primarily for the construction industry. Founded in 1862 in Philadelphia, the company has evolved from its origins as a paint and varnish manufacturer into a major supplier of advanced chemical products for architectural and industrial applications.

Pecora offers a diverse range of silicone, urethane, and latex acrylic sealants and coatings, focusing on building envelope waterproofing, glazing, and construction joint sealing. The company is particularly recognized for its pioneering silicone sealants, including innovations like the first field-tintable silicone sealant and non-staining silicones. With a commitment to quality, Pecora participates in industry programs that validate and certify product performance, ensuring reliability for contractors and end users.

Headquartered in Harleysville, Pennsylvania, with a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Garland, Texas, Pecora serves a global customer base, including contractors, architects, and building owners, providing durable and high-performance solutions for various construction projects.

Short Description:
Prinsco, Inc. is a family-owned company based in Prinsburg, Minnesota, established in 1974. It specializes in manufacturing construction materials, particularly polyethylene pipes and related products, with a strong emphasis on agricultural water management. Over the years, Prinsco has expanded its offerings to include solutions for commercial construction, residential retail, and onsite wastewater markets. The company is known for its high-density polyethylene (HDPE) pipes, which feature a distinctive gold stripe, and operates multiple manufacturing plants across the United States.

Prinsco is guided by core values of hard work, integrity, relationships, and humility. The leadership team, including CEO Jamie Duininck, COO Mark Johnson, and CFO Adam Schmidt, brings a wealth of experience to ensure operational excellence and customer satisfaction. The company serves a diverse range of customers, including agricultural producers, commercial construction firms, residential clients, and septic system installers, all while maintaining a commitment to quality and reliable service. With around 349 employees and annual revenues of approximately $95.7 million, Prinsco continues to be a significant player in the building materials and manufacturing industry.

Rhino Carbon Fiber, a division of AGT Products, Inc., is based in Heath, Ohio, with manufacturing facilities in the US and Canada. The company has been a leader in concrete crack repair and structural strengthening products for over 20 years, focusing on advanced building materials that enhance living spaces by reinforcing and repairing concrete structures.

The company offers a wide range of products, including solutions for concrete crack repair, structural strengthening, seismic upgrading, and bowed wall repair. RIVET Work is a technology company based in Detroit, founded in 2020. It specializes in workforce management software specifically designed for the construction industry. The platform helps self-performing contractors manage, plan, schedule, and deploy labor crews, aiming to enhance productivity and profitability.

The core product is a unified digital platform that addresses common challenges in construction labor management. Key features include tools for labor planning and scheduling, worker profiles to track certifications and performance, real-time reporting, geographical mapping for optimizing staffing, and seamless integration with existing systems. RIVET's target customers include contractors, project managers, and field workers across various construction trades.

RIVET Work is committed to leveraging technology to support skilled trades and promote digital transformation in the construction sector. The company fosters a diverse team culture and is actively involved in Detroit's tech and construction communities.

Welcome to Scaffoldmart. On this website you will find extremely high-quality  scaffolding... quality that rivals anyone... at pricing that is the lowest in the country. We carry one of the largest inventories in the country, about 30,000 to 40,000 frames at any given time. We've got a website that's easy to use, go ahead and look around. It's like you sat down and had a cup of coffee with a friend as we explain in detail and with videos the how's and why's of scaffolding. Check the FAQ's. After you've educated yourself, give us a call and we'll quote a price delivered to your door.  We look forward to hearing from you.   Factory Fresh: In addition, we are the only company of our kind that keeps our entire inventory inside. Our competitors keep a large stock outside on a yard. This means if you order elsewhere it's possible and likely that some or all of the product you receive has been exposed to the elements for who knows how long. We run short on certain products from time to time and have to order from our friendly competitors, and have been victims of this ourselves. We have had to return products in the past for that very reason. We will not sell  or rusty products. 100% of our inventory is kept inside our 240,000 square foot facility. No competitor of ours can say the same.  

We have many patterns and styles of scaffolding for sale, in preconfigured scaffolding towers, scaffold sets, or by the single scaffold frame. We also have a vast selection of scaffolding parts and accessories for sale: scaffolding jacks, caster wheels, scaffolding side brackets, and an entire line of scaffolding safety equipment just to name a few. We are the premier site from which to buy scaffolding and scaffolding supplies on the internet.

Short Description:
Signature Systems is a global leader in the design, engineering, manufacturing, and distribution of high-quality composite matting systems, turf protection, and portable event flooring. Founded in 1998, the company has grown from a small provider of tent flooring into a prominent manufacturer serving various industries, including construction, energy, and special events.

Their product portfolio features a range of solutions such as EventDeck® for turf protection, DuraDeck® for construction site safety, and DanceDeck® for the wedding and event industry. Other offerings include ArmorDeck® for stadium applications, modular staging systems like ExpressDeck™ and AlphaDeck™, and DiamondTrack® portable trackout mats. Signature Systems is dedicated to providing safe and reliable ground protection and site access solutions, serving a diverse customer base that includes major venues and high-profile events like the Vancouver Olympics.

With manufacturing facilities in Orlando, Florida, and distribution centers across the U.S. and England, Signature Systems emphasizes integrity, customer focus, and continuous improvement in their operations.

Short Description:
TECON is a global manufacturer based in Suzhou, China, specializing in solutions for the construction industry, particularly in formwork and scaffolding systems. Founded in 2013, the company has expanded its reach across North America, South America, the Middle East, Africa, and Southeast Asia, successfully completing thousands of projects worldwide.

TECON offers a wide range of products, including wall, slab, and beam formwork systems, climbing formwork, various scaffolding systems, and heavy-duty support frames. The company emphasizes quality and safety, adhering to European design standards and implementing strict quality control measures. TECON also provides comprehensive services, including consultancy, technical planning, on-site supervision, and efficient logistics, ensuring timely delivery and responsive customer support. The company targets contractors, builders, architects, and project developers, focusing on delivering high-quality solutions tailored to diverse construction needs.

Short Description:
Syntec Diamond Tools is a leading manufacturer of premium diamond tools, specializing in blades, core bits, and surface preparation tools for the construction and flooring industries. Founded in 1994 in Australia, the company has grown to become the largest diamond tool manufacturer in the country and has expanded its operations globally, including a facility in California, USA.

The company produces high-performance tools for cutting, coring, grinding, and polishing various materials, including concrete, asphalt, tiles, and natural stones like granite and marble. Syntec emphasizes quality and innovation, utilizing top-grade synthetic and natural diamonds along with rigorous quality control measures. With a large manufacturing site in South Australia and a global distribution network, Syntec serves contractors and professionals who require reliable and durable diamond tooling solutions. The company is part of the National Flooring Equipment family and proudly holds the Australian Made® certification, reflecting its commitment to quality and local manufacturing standards.

Short Description:
Task Gloves Corp is a private company based in City of Industry, California, with an additional distribution site in Louisville, Kentucky. Founded in 2016, the company specializes in the wholesale distribution of gloves and personal protective equipment (PPE). With a workforce of 10-50 employees, Task Gloves Corp focuses on providing a wide range of high-quality safety gloves and protective gear tailored to meet various industrial and work-related needs.

Their product offerings include traditional work gloves, coated gloves, cut-resistant gloves, cold and heat resistant gloves, textile gloves, chemical-resistant gloves, disposable gloves, impact-resistant gloves, and mechanic gloves. In addition to gloves, they provide protective sleeves, disposable apparel, and cut-resistant sweaters. Task Gloves Corp emphasizes customer-centric service, offering direct import, private label, and vend packing solutions to support customized branding and packaging. The company serves customers primarily in the industrial, manufacturing, and safety sectors, prioritizing hand safety and protective workwear.

Short Description:
AlignOps is an operations management platform tailored for the construction industry, boasting a 30-year history of enhancing operational efficiency for companies globally. The platform integrates various functions, including tool and material inventory management, field and warehouse logistics, safety program management, fleet management, and time tracking into a single, user-friendly system. This comprehensive approach aims to improve productivity, reduce risk, and enhance the overall profitability of construction operations.

The platform is built on the unification of four established solutions: ToolWatch, SafetyReports, FleetWatcher, and busybusy, creating a centralized "command center" for construction management. AlignOps serves a diverse clientele, including general and specialty contractors, energy companies, and utilities, with over 24,000 businesses relying on its services across more than 20 countries. The platform provides real-time operational data, facilitating informed decision-making and operational transparency for contractors, builders, and project managers.

Short Description:
TRUEWERK is a Denver, Colorado-based company that specializes in high-performance workwear tailored for skilled trade professionals. Founded by Brian Ciciora, the company integrates advanced fabric technologies and thoughtful engineering to create durable, lightweight, and comfortable apparel. TRUEWERK aims to redefine workwear by leveraging innovations from outdoor and military fabrics, moving beyond traditional materials like canvas and denim.

The product line includes a variety of items such as softshell work pants, layering systems for extreme temperatures, and technical shirts and jackets designed for mobility and durability. TRUEWERK emphasizes innovation, flexibility, and comfort, allowing gear to transition seamlessly from rugged outdoor work to office settings. Their customers primarily include construction workers, contractors, and tradespeople who face challenging conditions daily. The company also supports community and sustainability initiatives in Colorado, reflecting its commitment to performance and social responsibility.

Short Description:
Innovation is our job!

We've been setting industry standards for manufacturing, products, and service for over 40 years.Our manufacturing facilities have the capacity to produce more than two million feet of wire products per day. We offer the complete line of masonry joint reinforcement products and accessories. We ship throughout the United States, Canada, Mexico, and overseas.

Product Line

We produce continuous systems of masonry wall reinforcing including truss and ladder designs. Variations are available to these standard designs to meet specific wall conditions and are illustrated on this website. Our in-house hot dip and strand galvanizing facilities offer total product control, ensure optimum quality, and quick turnaround on orders.

Our Goal Today

Our goal today, as always, is to develop innovative products for the masonry industry that are durable, save time and money, and are easy to handle and install. WIRE-BOND® is head-quartered in Charlotte, North Carolina with a second plant in Memphis, Tennessee. Both are centrally located to serve the entire country.

Short Description:
WIRTGEN GROUP is a leading manufacturer of construction machinery, specializing in road construction and surface mining technologies. Founded in 1961 by Reinhard Wirtgen, the company has grown from a small service provider into a global leader in its field. It operates under five key brands—Wirtgen, Vögele, Hamm, Kleemann, and Benninghoven—each contributing decades of expertise to the industry.

The company offers a wide range of products, including cold milling machines, recyclers, soil stabilizers, and surface miners, where it holds a leading market position. Vögele is recognized for its high-quality road pavers, while Hamm specializes in compaction equipment. Kleemann provides crushing and screening plants, and Benninghoven manufactures asphalt mixing plants. WIRTGEN GROUP serves a diverse customer base, including road construction companies and mining operations, delivering innovative and sustainable solutions for their projects.

AmeriLux Family of Companies, based in De Pere, Wisconsin, has been a distributor and fabricator of building materials and plastic sheet products since 2004. Short Description:
Founded in 2015, the company is a professional Chinese manufacturer and exporter of concrete admixtures, specializing in research, production, sales, and technical services.

Initially producing naphthalene-based high-efficiency water reducers, the company has expanded its product line to include polycarboxylate-based high-efficiency water reducers and other concrete admixtures. Its current offerings encompass naphthalene-based water reducers, polycarboxylate-based water reducers, sodium gluconate, raw materials for polycarboxylate water reducers, and customized admixture formulations. The company operates production lines with an annual capacity of 50,000 tonnes of naphthalene-based water reducers and 10,000 tonnes of polycarboxylate-based water reducers.

Integrating R&D, innovation, sales, and service into a comprehensive system, the company is equipped with advanced quality control instruments and full-scale concrete testing equipment. Its technical team, backed by over a decade of expertise, delivers professional solutions tailored to diverse engineering projects and concrete types. Specialized formulations include precast concrete water reducers, retarding water reducers, and pumping aids.

The company continues to broaden the application scope of concrete admixtures, which are widely compatible with Portland cement, ordinary Portland cement, Portland slag cement, fly ash cement, Portland pozzolanic cement, and various concrete types such as conventional concrete, pumped concrete, super-fluid self-compacting concrete, and high-performance concrete—particularly excelling in high-strength and ultra-high-performance concrete applications.

Short Description:
The Federation of Tax Administrators (FTA) is a nonprofit organization established in 1937, dedicated to enhancing the quality of state tax administration across the United States. It serves as a central resource for state tax authorities, including agencies from all 50 states, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, and New York City. FTA promotes cooperation and information exchange among these agencies, ensuring uniformity in tax administration.

FTA offers a variety of services, including research on state tax policies, training programs for tax administrators, and coordination between states and the IRS. The organization also leads efforts in developing electronic filing standards to streamline tax processes. Governed by a Board of Trustees made up of tax administrators, FTA is financed through member dues and other revenue sources. Its mission is to provide expertise and tools that improve the efficiency and effectiveness of state tax administration nationwide.

Short Description:
FEHR is a Swiss-based company founded in 1949, specializing in warehousing logistics and automated materials handling solutions. The company is recognized as a leader in the industry, providing tailored solutions with Swiss precision to various sectors. FEHR focuses on homogeneous warehousing solutions that encompass logistics, automation, and special handling tasks, ensuring efficient material movement for materials like stainless steel, aluminum, and wood.

Their product offerings include advanced automated storage and retrieval systems, robotic materials handling, and laser-guided loading/unloading systems. FEHR's proprietary honeycomb system is noted for its speed in handling large quantities of materials. With production facilities and warehouses worldwide, including a base in Charlotte, North Carolina, FEHR serves a diverse customer base across metal markets and industries that require specialty material handling.

In addition to their product solutions, FEHR provides training programs for operators and warehouse management to enhance efficiency and safety in warehousing logistics. The company continues to innovate, recently expanding its capabilities through the acquisition of Matter srl, an Italian company specializing in vertical storage solutions.

Short Description:
Gilson Company, Inc. is a manufacturer and distributor of construction materials testing equipment, established in 1939 and based in Lewis Center, Ohio. The company specializes in equipment for testing soils, concrete, asphalt, and aggregates, catering to industries such as civil engineering, construction, pharmaceuticals, and food.

Their extensive product range includes testing screens, test sieves, sieve shakers, and various instruments for material analysis. Gilson also provides general laboratory equipment like splitters, crushers, grinders, balances, ovens, thermometers, and glassware. With a product catalog that exceeds 350 pages, they offer detailed descriptions and application advice to help customers choose the right equipment.

Gilson serves civil and construction engineers, laboratories, and industries involved in infrastructure projects. The company is family-owned and has expanded its headquarters to enhance production and sales capabilities, solidifying its position as a leader in materials testing equipment.

Short Description:
Hatz Americas, Inc. is the North American subsidiary of Hatz, a global engine manufacturer with over 140 years of experience. Founded in 1978 and based in Waukesha, Wisconsin, the company serves as the factory headquarters for North America, featuring fully equipped engineering, service, and engine testing facilities.

Hatz Americas specializes in high-quality diesel engines designed for compact equipment, powering a variety of construction machinery such as pavers, concrete mixers, and compaction equipment. The company also provides diesel power solutions for generators, pumps, and military equipment. Hatz Americas is committed to environmental compatibility, offering exhaust-reduced and air-cooled diesel engines across its product range. Additionally, the company provides digital services, including app-controlled engine diagnostics and fleet management tools, to enhance machine operation and maintenance. Hatz Americas focuses on delivering expert application engineering to ensure optimal engine performance for its diverse customer base in construction, military, and power generation sectors.

Short Description:
HealthyFeetStore.com is an online store that offers the best orthopedic shoes and foot care products on the market that are not only designed to improve foot comfort, but also foot health. We offer an impressive selection of orthopedic shoes, orthopedic sandals, diabetic shoes, diabetic sandals, and orthopedic boots. Our orthopedic shoes come in a variety of styles from dress to casual and in multiple sizes and widths. You'll also find a grand selection of arch supports, orthopedic slippers, house shoes, and other foot care products designed to minimize the discomfort caused by diabetic foot problems, plantar fasciitis, bunions, heel pain, post-surgical healing, and other foot conditions. We strive to provide quality services and products, which is why our experienced staff, including our Medical Director Podiatrist Dr. Jeffery Hurless, carefully reviews and selects the products that we offer.

But HealthyFeetStore.com is more than just a medical shoe store selling orthopedic footwear. We offer a variety of healthy shoes that are extremely stylish because we believe that fashionable footwear for work and play can and should be comfortable. You do not have to be a medical patient to shop at HealthyFeetStore.com. In fact, a lot of our customers already have healthy feet and choose to shop here for comfortable and supportive dress and casual shoes. As our business grows, so does our selection of fashionable healthy shoes. At the end of the day, our main goal is to provide our customers a place where they can not only receive outstanding customer support, but also find stylish orthopedic shoes, high-quality foot care products and comfortable healthy shoes so that foot problems can be prevented all while maintaining healthy feet.

IMO USA specializes in the manufacturing and sales of Precision German Engineered Slew Drives and Slew Rings. We offer custom engineered drive systems and ready-to-replace, standard bolt-in slew drives. We pride ourselves on precision manufacturing, unparalleled performance, and the highest customer satisfaction in the industry.

Our patented standard and custom slew drives and slew rings will elevate any application above the competition. IMO USA is an extension of your engineering team, from the early stages of your project in drive selection and design, all the way through field support after deployment. We will maximize the potential of your application.

IMO USA's engineering team is dedicated to providing custom solutions to your unique requirements. Whether it is a complex Slew Drive System or a unique solution for a large Slew Drive Ring, our experienced team can take your ideas and specs and spin it into a complete engineered design. Our goal is to support you from the inception to the completion; exceeding your expectation in the process.

Short Description:
Inteplast Group is a prominent North American manufacturer of integrated plastics, established in 1990 by Dr. John Young. Headquartered in Livingston, New Jersey, the company operates over 50 facilities across North America and employs more than 7,000 people. Inteplast Group is dedicated to sustaining American manufacturing and workforce.

The company offers a diverse range of products, including grocery and retail bags, trash bags, corrugated plastics, and composite decking boards. Its divisions—AmTopp, Integrated Bagging Systems (IBS), and World-Pak—cater to various market segments. Inteplast's flagship facility in Lolita, Texas, is one of the largest and most advanced manufacturing plants globally, with a production capacity exceeding one billion pounds of finished goods annually. The company emphasizes environmental responsibility by producing down-gauged films and reusable plastic containers, contributing to sustainability efforts.

Inteplast Group serves multiple industries, including retail, foodservice, healthcare, and building materials, with a commitment to quality and innovation. Its culture is built on trust, transparency, and continuous improvement, reflecting its dedication to the workforce and the environment.

Short Description:
HortiLed.EliteGrow specializes in manufacturing and exporting high-quality indoor LED grow light solutions for the horticultural industry. Since 2013, as a daughter brand of Laite E-Commerce, EliteGrow has focused on providing flexible and customized grow light systems tailored to the needs of small- to medium-sized horticultural businesses.

The company develops a range of LED grow lights designed for various indoor horticulture settings, including shelves and growing chambers. Their products are CE and RoHS certified, ensuring compliance with European safety and environmental standards. EliteGrow collaborates closely with botanical experts to create optimal lighting solutions, offering custom designs based on specific client requirements. They also provide installation support and year-round assistance to ensure proper setup and performance. Their cost-effective grow lights are priced around 150-200 yuan per square meter, making them accessible for clients looking to enhance their indoor plant growth.

Short Description:
JLG Industries, Inc. is an American company founded in 1969 and based in McConnellsburg, Pennsylvania. It specializes in designing, manufacturing, and marketing access equipment, particularly aerial work platforms and telehandlers. JLG serves various industries, including construction, industrial maintenance, material handling, and facilities maintenance.

The company pioneered the access industry with its first aerial work platform in 1970, focusing on safety and productivity. JLG's product offerings include boom lifts, scissor lifts, telehandlers, mobile vertical lifts, and specialized equipment like fuel-cell powered boom lifts. JLG's equipment is recognized for enhancing worker safety and improving productivity, making it a preferred choice for equipment rental companies, construction firms, and commercial businesses worldwide.

As a subsidiary of Oshkosh Corporation since 2006, JLG benefits from expanded resources and leadership continuity. The company operates multiple manufacturing facilities globally and provides extensive sales and service support across North America, Europe, Asia, and Oceania.

Short Description:
Kanga Coolers is a company based in Greenville, South Carolina, that specializes in iceless beverage coolers. Founded in 2017 by Clemson University students, the company’s flagship product is the Kanga Kase Mate, a soft-sided cooler designed to keep cases of drinks cold for up to seven hours without ice. This innovative product has gained popularity among college students and outdoor enthusiasts, leading to a successful Kickstarter campaign.

The product line has expanded to include a variety of items such as waterproof pouches, backpacks, and drinkware, creating a comprehensive beverage cooling ecosystem. Kanga Coolers also offers custom branding for corporate clients and distributes its products through over 4,000 retail locations and online platforms. The company has been recognized for its entrepreneurial success, including an appearance on *Shark Tank* and features in Forbes 30 Under 30. Kanga Coolers serves a diverse customer base, including college students, partygoers, sports fans, and campers.

Short Description:
Key Resin Company specializes in manufacturing high-performance resin-based floor and wall coating systems. Their products are designed to protect and enhance surfaces in industrial, commercial, and residential environments. The company offers a wide range of coatings, including epoxy, polyurethane, and vinyl ester systems, tailored to meet various performance requirements such as chemical resistance and abrasion resistance.

The company provides multiple floor coating options, including thin-film, high-build, and heavy-duty coatings suitable for different environments. They also offer wall coatings that protect against chemical exposure and abrasion, as well as decorative coatings like the Key Luster Metallic Coating System, which delivers a bright metallic finish. Key Resin's products emphasize low or no volatile organic compounds (VOCs) and are designed to meet environmental and safety standards, making them suitable for a diverse range of applications.

Short Description:
Lind Equipment is a Canadian company founded in 1949, specializing in portable electrical products for industrial and hazardous work environments. With over 65 years of experience, Lind has built a strong reputation for providing safe and dependable electrical equipment tailored to sectors such as oil and gas, aviation, construction, chemical, and automotive industries.

The company offers a range of products, including portable lighting solutions for challenging jobsite conditions, portable power equipment for reliable electrical supply, electrical safety products for worker protection, and static grounding products to mitigate static electricity hazards. Lind Equipment prioritizes customer service by maintaining a large inventory and ensuring over 90% of orders are shipped within 24 hours, recognizing the importance of timely delivery in preventing project delays. Headquartered in Markham, Ontario, Lind Equipment employs around 45 people and generates approximately $9.2 million in revenue.

Short Description:
Mid Continent Steel and Wire, Inc. is a prominent steel and wire manufacturer based in Houston, Texas, and operates as a division of DEACERO. The company offers a wide range of high-quality steel wire products and fasteners, serving various markets across the United States. Its well-known brands, including Magnum®, Rangemaster®, and Stay-Tuff®, cater to industries such as agriculture, construction, and pallet manufacturing.

With over 35 years of experience, Mid Continent Steel and Wire is dedicated to exceptional product quality and customer service. The company emphasizes sustainable business practices and values like teamwork, community safety, and respect for individuals. This commitment has helped build strong relationships with customers and a solid reputation in the industry. The company evolved from the Mid Continent Nail Corporation, merging with DEACERO in 2012 to enhance its product offerings and operational efficiencies while staying true to its core values.

Short Description:
National Construction Rentals is the largest supplier of temporary fencing and related site services in the United States. Founded in 1962 and headquartered in Mission Hills, California, the company operates in nearly 80 metropolitan areas across 41 states. It serves a diverse range of projects, including commercial, residential, government, special events, and emergency response.

The company provides a wide array of rental products and services, such as temporary fencing, pedestrian barricades, portable toilets, mobile storage containers, temporary power solutions, and installation services. National Construction Rentals operates under several brand names, including National Event Services and National Rent A Fence, reflecting its commitment to quality and customer service.

With a workforce of approximately 500-999 employees and annual revenues exceeding $190 million, National Construction Rentals is recognized for its extensive offerings and expertise in temporary site services, making it a valuable partner for large-scale construction and event projects.

Short Description:
Normet Group is a global technology company based in Finland, specializing in underground mining and tunneling solutions. Founded in 1962, the company has grown to employ over 1,800 professionals across more than 50 locations in 30 countries. Normet focuses on delivering a comprehensive range of products and services that enhance safety, efficiency, and sustainability in the mining, tunneling, and civil construction industries.

The company offers a variety of solutions, including concrete sprayers, lifting and charging equipment, personnel and materials transport vehicles, and aftermarket services. Normet also provides construction chemicals and rock support products, along with expertise and consulting to optimize customer processes. With a commitment to ethical business practices and environmental responsibility, Normet serves a diverse clientele, including major mining corporations and tunneling contractors, emphasizing safety and risk reduction in its operations.

Short Description:
PAXXO was founded in 1980 in Malmö. The business mission is to develop an environmentally friendly bag system for the rational handling of waste products - Longopac®.
The unique endless bag system, which now has a global market, is based on a thin and strong bagging material of three layer polyethylene. The bagging material is folded into compact cassettes in specifically developed machines. This affords major logistical advantages in the form of efficient handling and low transport costs. Longopac and ancillary peripheral equipment are available for industry, hospitals, waste management plants and the retail trade.

Short Description:
PRATTO S.A. was established in 1991 in the Greek port city of Piraeus. In the past years the company has become a leading force in the design, manufacture and technical support of wire-processing machinery and complete welded mesh production lines for the wire and construction industry worldwide.
PRATTO serves a variety of industries, including guarding (fencing, machine, window), mining, construction, decorative, automotive, transport, packaging & processing (conveyers), animal control, and cages.
Thanks to its "in-house" innovative engineering know-how, enriched through continuous research, development and field experience, the company has rapidly grown to a very successful supplier of a comprehensive line of standard and custom built machines and complete plants such as:
--Welding machines for the production of:
-Fine wire mesh in rolls
-Light and industrial wire mesh in rolls or sheets
-Medium and heavy weight wire and reinforcing wire mesh panels
-Electro-fused grating
-Fencing (plain and bent)
-Shelves, grids, cages, pallets, containers, etc.
--Auxiliary wire processing machines
The company's premises of 5.000 m2 are located in Inofyta, Viotia (53 km north of Athens).

Short Description:
Pulse-Bac technology was invented over 22 years ago when our founder's passion for taking what he saw and making it better lead to a discovery.  Our founder noticed something very simple that most people tended to overlook or simply accepted as the norm. What was this simple thing? The almost inescapable loss of suction that occurred with most vacuums used in the construction industry. This of course was caused by the filter becoming clogged with fine dust and debris and cutting off the airflow to the vacuum motor. That's when David set to work. Tinkering in his barn he came up with a lot of different solutions, some better than others. It wasn't until a simple mistake happened one day that everything came together. When testing a design, David forgot to hook up a couple of electrical leads. So a component he had previously thought to be critical simply didn't turn on, but what happened amazed him. The force of the physics at work "pulsed" the dust off the filter, better than anything else he'd tried and in that moment Pulse-Bac Technology was born.

Today Pulse-Bac is a readily available brand that offers innovative, high-quality products with 15 patents awarded to us by the US Patent and Trademark offices for the innovations found in our vacuums. The spirit of innovation instilled by our founder is alive and growing every day at Pulse-Bac. Our engineers and production teams are always working to find the next feature that will make our products better for our customers. We are dedicated to helping professionals in many different industries find the best dust collection and vacuum assisted clean up solutions that will increase their productivity and protect their health.

We are also very proud that all of our products are produced in our Tulsa, Oklahoma factory, not far from where it all  begin. Our employees are enthusiastic about making sure that the products we make and the service we provide exceed our customer's expectations.

Short Description:
Renold PLC is a well-established engineering company that specializes in manufacturing and supplying power transmission products. Founded in 1879 by Hans Renold in Salford, near Manchester, the company is known for inventing the bush roller chain, which significantly enhanced the efficiency of mechanical power transmission. Today, Renold operates globally with around 2,500 employees across more than 23 countries.

The company offers a wide range of products, including precision-engineered roller chains, custom and stock couplings, and various power transmission components such as gearing, clutches, brakes, and hydraulic products. Renold serves diverse industries, including materials handling, cranes and hoists, metal manufacturing, and the pulp and paper sector. With a strong focus on engineering innovation and quality, Renold is committed to delivering reliable solutions that meet the demanding needs of its customers.

Short Description:
SF Tools is the manufacturer of the worlds' most popular, UL™ approved heat tools that shrink film around boats, pallets, and any odd-shaped product for shipping, storage and protective purposes. Our heat tools are also used for multiple other manual direct heat applications such as weed burning, removing ice buildup, and paving repairs.
 
Our heat tools will quickly heat shrink film around your product providing:
- Weatherproof protection 
- Tamper resistance 
- Storage capability 
- The ability to transport on an open flat bed 
- Construction and work site protection 

Through a worldwide network of distributors, SF Tools offers the expertise for wrapping everything from small equipment to large buildings, boats, bridges, scaffolding and military aircraft. SF Tools' heat tools are manufactured in the United States, come with a full one-year warranty, and are fully capable of handling any shrink wrap and manually directed heat requirement.

Short Description:
SPEC MIX is a construction products company that specializes in preblended masonry mortars, grouts, and stucco products. Founded over 28 years ago in Minnesota, the company has established a strong presence with more than 40 production facilities across the U.S. and Canada. It is recognized for its unique white silo material delivery systems and its commitment to providing high-quality materials for a variety of construction projects, from single-family homes to large sports coliseums.

In addition to its product offerings, SPEC MIX is known for the SPEC MIX BRICKLAYER 500®, a national bricklaying competition that promotes masonry skills and craftsmanship. Launched in 2003, this event has grown to include regional qualifiers and an annual world championship at the World of Concrete trade show. SPEC MIX collaborates closely with architects, engineers, and contractors to deliver project-specific solutions, ensuring high standards of quality and safety on job sites. The company supports a diverse customer base in the masonry and construction industries with its innovative products and technical expertise.

Short Description:
Spectra Precision is a leading brand in surveying and construction measurement solutions, owned by Trimble Inc. since 2000. Originally part of Spectra Physics, the first commercial laser company, Spectra Precision has become a key player in the geomatics and construction sectors.

The company specializes in precision optical and laser-based tools for professionals in surveying and construction. Its product range includes optical survey products like auto levels and grade rods, laser levels for grading and alignment, and automatic grade match systems that enhance accuracy in construction tasks. Additionally, Spectra Precision offers surveying software and accessories through its integration with Trimble, providing comprehensive solutions for geomatics and construction applications.

Spectra Precision serves general and specialty contractors, surveyors, and construction industry professionals, delivering reliable instruments that improve accuracy and efficiency in fieldwork. With a strong affiliation to Trimble and other notable companies, Spectra Precision is committed to advancing technology in the surveying and construction industries.

Short Description:
At Sylvan Products, our mission is simple: "Right Products. Impressive Results." This tagline embodies our commitment to going beyond the initial deal, ensuring we deliver more than just products. We pride ourselves on our reliable, trustworthy team, passionate about understanding your business and unique requirements. By listening first, we tailor solutions to meet your specific challenges, delivering innovative, reliable, and customized options at competitive prices. Our goal? To provide impressive results that enhance your customer's projects.

Sales & Service Philosophy: Customized Solutions, Every Time

We stand out by offering more than products—we provide tailored solutions with every order. Our Sylvan Specialists are dedicated to finding the perfect balance between performance, price, and quantity to meet your customer's needs. Every shipment includes this customized care, ensuring that your requirements are met with precision and professionalism.

Shipments & Delivery: Excellence from Start to Finish

From optimizing freight rates to handling complex mixed shipments, Sylvan ensures seamless delivery. Our international freight contracts mean competitive pricing and schedules, while our post-delivery services ensure we're there for you even after the product arrives, responding swiftly to any installation questions or additional requests.

Our Legacy of Innovation

Founded in December 1990 by A. Craig Digman and W. Scott Wilson, Sylvan Industries began with a mission to develop innovative products and expand market share in high-performance panels and composite construction materials. Over the years, we've introduced cutting-edge materials for diverse industries, including Architectural Concrete Forming, Aerospace, and Marine. Our specialists continuously deliver customized solutions, embodying our pledge to create better products and solve performance challenges.

Discover how Sylvan Products can drive impressive results for your next project.

MoRecruit is a Human Resources software company based in China, founded in 2016. It operates as a small to medium-sized enterprise with a team of 10 to 50 employees and generates annual revenue between 1 million to 5 million USD. The company specializes in recruitment process outsourcing and offers human resources solutions that support recruitment and staffing functions.

MoRecruit provides HR software tools aimed at streamlining recruitment, talent acquisition, and staffing processes. The company serves clients in need of recruitment and HR consulting services, focusing on efficient hiring solutions and workforce management. Its team consists of senior consultants and HR professionals dedicated to delivering tailored recruitment and staffing services. MoRecruit primarily targets organizations in China and potentially Singapore, catering to various industries.

Short Description:
Tie Down Engineering is a family-owned engineering and manufacturing company based in Atlanta, Georgia, established in 1968. The company specializes in custom manufacturing solutions and emphasizes American-made products. With over 500,000 square feet of ISO-9001 certified facilities, Tie Down holds more than 90 patents and offers a diverse portfolio of over 7,000 products globally.

The company serves various industries, including roofing, workplace safety, marine, manufactured housing, agriculture, outdoor living, and trailer replacement parts. Its product range features roofing tools, guardrails, dock ladders, asphalt anchors, marine parts, and safety accessories. Tie Down is committed to quality control, adhering to industry standards like OSHA and HUD Code, and utilizes advanced manufacturing processes such as CNC cutting and robotic welding.

With nine warehouses in Atlanta, Tie Down manages logistics, customer service, and marketing internally, ensuring efficient operations. The company caters to contractors, manufacturers, and businesses needing custom-engineered solutions, reinforcing its position as a leading contract and custom manufacturer in America.

Short Description:
The University of Tulsa (TU) is a private, comprehensive doctoral-degree-granting university located in Tulsa, Oklahoma. Established in 1921, it has roots dating back to 1882 with the founding of the Presbyterian School for Indian Girls. TU operates independently and maintains a covenant relationship with the Presbyterian Church (USA), welcoming students from various faiths and backgrounds.

TU offers a wide array of academic programs through its four undergraduate colleges, the College of Law, and a Graduate School. The university emphasizes personalized education with a low student-to-faculty ratio of 11:1 and an average class size of 20. The College of Law, with a history of accreditation since 1953, provides modern facilities and a strong legal education. TU also fosters a vibrant campus life with numerous extracurricular activities, promoting community engagement and diversity among its students and faculty.

Short Description:
US Fleet Tracking, founded in 2005 and based in Edmond, Oklahoma, specializes in manufacturing and distributing GPS tracking products for vehicle fleets and mobile assets globally. The company is known for pioneering the first web-based GPS tracking product and provides essential tracking services to emergency responders, including police, fire, and EMS, as well as various industries with mobile workforces.

The company offers a range of GPS tracking devices that deliver real-time location updates, along with a cloud-based monitoring platform accessible on any internet-connected device. Their system includes features such as live tracking, route optimization, maintenance scheduling, and detailed reporting. US Fleet Tracking also provides advanced capabilities like live streaming video from multiple cameras per vehicle and integration APIs for enterprise systems, helping clients improve operational efficiency and reduce costs.

US Fleet Tracking serves diverse industries, including construction, courier and delivery, law enforcement, and small businesses with mobile workforces. The company focuses on affordability and accessibility, making its solutions suitable for both large fleets and individual vehicle owners.

Valvoline Global Operations is a prominent company specializing in automotive and industrial solutions, with a legacy that began in 1866 when it launched the first branded motor oil. Headquartered in Lexington, Kentucky, the company employs between 1,001 and 5,000 people and serves customers in over 140 countries. Valvoline Global offers a wide range of products, including motor oils for various vehicle types, additives, industrial lubricants, and specialized fluids for hybrid and electric vehicles. Their patented 5 quart Easy Pour Bottle™ has been recognized for its innovation in the car care category.

The company focuses on creating advanced products and services while supporting the automotive service industry through partnerships with mechanics and service providers. Valvoline Global celebrates the role of mechanics with initiatives like Mechanics Month. As part of Saudi Aramco since 2022, Valvoline Global is dedicated to driving innovation and sustainable solutions in the automotive sector, with products available at over 80,000 locations worldwide.

Voze is a sales productivity software company dedicated to enhancing the efficiency of sales teams. The platform simplifies note-taking, communication, and customer management, allowing sales representatives to quickly capture essential customer data through voice recordings, photos, or typed text. This approach minimizes administrative tasks and maximizes time spent selling.

The Voze Sales Engine is a key feature that processes sales data and provides actionable insights to drive sales behaviors. It integrates with various third-party systems, aligning sales activities with inventory and account data. Additionally, Voze facilitates seamless communication among sales reps, support staff, and managers, promoting faster decision-making and improved customer service. The platform also offers managerial insights through analytics and smart notifications, helping to optimize workflows and boost revenue growth.

Voze serves sales teams across multiple industries, particularly in commercial uniforms and linen rentals, where efficient field sales productivity is essential. The platform is designed to enhance collaboration, increase adoption, and support businesses in refining their sales strategies.

Short Description:
Warson Brands specializes in the design, engineering, and distribution of occupational and military footwear. Since 1988, the company has built a diverse portfolio of over 800 styles across eight national brands, catering to various occupations worldwide. Their product offerings include work boots and shoes in athletic, casual, and slip-resistant styles, focusing on comfort and performance for men and women in demanding work environments.

The company emphasizes performance, believing that better footwear enhances customer performance. Warson Brands is committed to exceptional customer service, supported by a team with over 350 years of combined industry experience. They provide a wide variety of safety and occupational footwear, 24/7 online ordering access, and marketing resources to assist distributors and retailers. Warson Brands also prioritizes environmental responsibility, partnering with manufacturers to implement sustainable practices and ensure compliance with environmental laws.

With a global distribution network, Warson Brands serves a diverse customer base, including occupational workers, military personnel, wholesale distributors, and retail customers. Their focus on customer support and sustainability positions them as a leader in the footwear industry.

Whip Around is a fleet management company that provides digital solutions for vehicle inspections, maintenance, and regulatory compliance. Founded in 2016, their platform connects drivers, mechanics, and fleet managers through mobile and web applications, enhancing vehicle uptime and operational efficiency.

The fleet management platform allows drivers to conduct digital vehicle inspections via a mobile app, with real-time syncing to a web-based dashboard for fleet managers. Key features include defect management, maintenance scheduling, dynamic reporting, and automated alerts. Whip Around also integrates with various third-party systems, centralizing fleet data for a comprehensive operational overview.

In addition to software, Whip Around offers professional fleet maintenance services, including strategic recommendations, data migration, and training. They serve a variety of industries, such as roofing, plumbing, HVAC, and electrical services. The company is committed to excellence, adaptability, and customer-centricity, helping clients optimize vehicle health and reduce operational costs.

Short Description:
ZipWall LLC is a company based in Arlington, Massachusetts, that specializes in dust barrier systems for construction, remodeling, and renovation projects. Founded in 1997 by Jeff Whittemore, ZipWall has developed innovative solutions that can be set up quickly without the need for ladders, tape, or causing damage. The company holds 25 patents and has received multiple industry awards for its products.

The flagship product, the ZipWall® Dust Barrier System, allows contractors to create dust barriers efficiently. It can be used to set up plastic or reusable fabric barriers, create entries, and seal off areas without additional tools. Another key offering is the ZipFast™ Reusable Barrier Panels, which are made from environmentally friendly nylon fabric and can be zipped together to form airtight barriers. These panels are available in standard and flame-retardant versions, providing a professional appearance on job sites.

ZipWall serves a diverse range of customers, including residential and commercial contractors, healthcare facilities, and educational institutions, making its products accessible to both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

Short Description:
Shanghai Horse Construction Co., Ltd is a Chinese company established in 2006, based in Shanghai. It specializes in the research, development, production, and sale of reinforcement materials, particularly carbon fiber-based products and epoxy adhesives used in structural strengthening and repair. The company employs between 50 to 86 people and has an estimated annual revenue of up to $7.7 million.

The product range includes carbon fiber cloth and sheets, carbon fiber adhesives, anchor adhesives, structural adhesive bonding steel, and various repair adhesives for concrete and stone installations. Shanghai Horse Construction collaborates with scholars from prestigious universities to enhance its product offerings and has obtained several quality certifications, including ISO 9001:2008. The company serves a diverse market, with applications in significant projects such as the Oriental Pearl Tower in Shanghai and the National Arts Centre of Trinidad and Tobago. Its business philosophy emphasizes quality and customer service, aiming to create value for society.

Houzz is an online platform and community founded in 2009, based in Palo Alto, California. It serves as a comprehensive resource for architecture, interior design, landscape design, and home improvement. The platform connects homeowners with design inspiration, products, and local professionals, making it easier to visualize and plan renovation projects.

Houzz offers a variety of services, including a vast database of home interior and exterior images accessible through its website and mobile apps. The Houzz Pro business management software helps home professionals manage projects and client communications. The Houzz Shop features over eight million home goods and furniture products for direct purchase. Additionally, Houzz provides interactive tools like the Real Cost Finder and augmented reality features to enhance the user experience. With a global reach, Houzz serves millions of users and has established localized services in various countries, making it a leading resource for residential design.

Short Description:
IntegraSpec ICF, the only true panellized Insulated Concrete Form Wallsystem, was created with the input of structural engineers, computer assisted design, & more than 75 years of field experience in residential/commercial concrete forms & the general construction industry.  IntegraSpec ICF was developed to address & eliminate the problems encountered by most ICF systems: blowouts, form lift & bulging, compression, alignment problems, wavy walls, etc.

The patented multi-directional "flippable and reversible" IntegraSpec ICF independent panel design dramatically reduces inventory, site waste, installation time, labour, & transportation costs, while delivering a high-end finished product on small or large projects in all markets & construction applications.

Panel interiors are "dovetailed" for proper concrete placement & bonding while the panel exterior is grooved for optimum steel channel placement to meet commercial fire codes.  Also, clearly marked 1⅝" inserts are moulded inside the panels every 8" on-centre, providing studs for interior/exterior finishing, reinforcement against unit bulging, & a connection for webs/spacers.

The IntegraSpec ICF system has made a significant change to the construction industry worldwide, giving builders in earthquake and hurricane zones increased confidence in their structures' integrity, & the energy-efficient buildings it produces will assist in meeting LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) specifications around the world.

Short Description:
The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (IPG) is a prominent global advertising and marketing services holding company based in New York City. Established in 1930, IPG operates as one of the "Big Four" agency companies, managing over 90 operating units and five major agency networks, including FCB, McCann Worldgroup, and MullenLowe Group.

IPG offers a wide range of marketing and communication services. These include integrated advertising campaigns, media planning and buying through IPG Mediabrands, public relations, digital marketing, and experiential marketing. The company focuses on delivering data-driven and creative solutions that connect with consumers. IPG emphasizes ethical business practices and fosters a culture of inclusivity and diversity, supporting its agencies with resources to effectively meet client needs. With a strong presence in the United States and growing markets in Latin America and Europe, IPG serves a diverse clientele across various industries.

Short Description:
Klein Tools is a historic American company founded in 1857 in Chicago, Illinois, by Mathias Klein. Originally a blacksmith shop, it has grown into a leading manufacturer of professional-quality hand tools, particularly known for its lineman’s pliers. The company remains family-owned, now led by the fifth and sixth generations of the Klein family, who prioritize craftsmanship and quality.

Klein Tools specializes in a wide range of hand tools for professional trades, including electricians, linemen, and construction workers. Its product offerings include lineman’s pliers, wire stretchers, climbing spurs, and various occupational protective equipment. The company is committed to American manufacturing, investing in production facilities in the U.S. and operating internationally with subsidiaries and a global network of distributors.

Klein Tools serves a customer base of professional tradespeople who rely on its durable and high-performance tools. The company has an exclusive retail partnership with The Home Depot, enhancing accessibility for professionals and serious DIYers. Klein Tools continues to focus on innovation and global expansion while maintaining its reputation for quality and craftsmanship.

Short Description:
KPA is a prominent provider of Environment, Health & Safety (EHS) and Workforce Compliance software, training, and consulting services. Founded in 1984 and based in Westminster, Colorado, KPA has over 40 years of experience supporting more than 15,000 clients across various industries, including construction, manufacturing, mining, oil and gas, automotive, and insurance. 

KPA offers a range of solutions, including KPA Flex, a cloud-based safety management platform, and Compligo, which automates workforce compliance activities. Their Succeed Risk Management Center provides comprehensive risk management and OSHA compliance support. Additionally, KPA features an extensive online training library with thousands of courses tailored to industry needs and employs over 150 in-house compliance consultants to assist clients in building effective safety programs. KPA's commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion enhances their mission to foster safe work environments while helping organizations achieve regulatory compliance and reduce workplace risks.

Keywords: fall protection, ppe, occupational safety, safety equipment, safety product manufacturing, personal protective equipment
Short Description:
KStrong Asia specializes in manufacturing and distributing personal protective equipment (PPE), with a focus on fall protection safety products. Based in Singapore, the company is part of the global KStrong brand, which has over 20 years of experience in producing high-quality safety equipment for industrial and construction environments. KStrong Asia aims to be the premier provider of safety equipment in the Asian market, adhering to international safety standards such as EN, ANSI, AS/NZS, and OSHA.

The company offers a comprehensive range of fall protection solutions, including full-body harnesses, self-retracting lifelines, lanyards, fall restraint devices, lifeline systems, anchors, and rescue kits. KStrong Asia also provides extensive product support resources, ensuring proper use and maintenance of their equipment. They primarily serve the industrial and construction sectors, focusing on companies that require reliable fall protection systems for workers at height. With a trusted presence in over 50 countries, KStrong Asia combines global expertise with localized service to enhance worker safety.

Short Description:
LIUNA, the Laborers' International Union of North America, is a labor union established in 1903 that represents construction laborers and other workers across the U.S. and Canada. With over 600,000 members organized into more than 500 local unions, LIUNA is dedicated to advancing the rights, wages, safety, and benefits of its members in the construction sector and related industries.

The union engages in collective bargaining to negotiate fair wages and safe working conditions. It offers extensive training programs to enhance members' skills and safety knowledge, including specialized training for women in construction. LIUNA also participates in political advocacy to promote labor-friendly policies and supports community development through disaster recovery efforts. Additionally, the union provides legal services and pension plans to ensure the long-term welfare of its members.

Short Description:
Über 40 Jahre Erfahrung 
bei der Entwicklung, Herstellung und dem Projektieren 
von Feuchtemesssystemen für Schüttgüter.

Die Franz Ludwig Gesellschaft für Mess- und Regeltechnik mbH beschäftigt sich seit nunmehr über 40 Jahren mit der Entwicklung und Herstellung von Wasserdosier- und Feuchtemesssystemen. In diesem Anwendungsbereich zählt
sie international zu den führenden Unternehmen. Vom Hause Ludwig gingen Entwicklungen aus, die zu einer verbesserten Arbeitsweise in den verschiedensten Industriebereichen führten. Das von Ludwig entwickelte
Mikrowellen-Quotienten-Messverfahren wurde zur messtechnischen Basis deren Systementwicklungen.

Die Qualität eines Produktes reflektiert die Leistungsfähigkeit seines Herstellers. Als Familienunternehmen in der zweiten Generation legt die Ludwig GmbH deshalb seit jeher größten Wert auf die Qualifikation ihrer
Mitarbeiter. Sie ist die Basis für erfolgreiche Entwicklungen und effiziente Produktionsabläufe. 
Nähe – im menschlichen, wie im räumlichen Sinne – ist im Hause Ludwig eine zusätzliche, positive Komponente.
Kürzeste Wege zwischen Information, Entscheidung und Umsetzung beschleunigen nicht nur die Projektabläufe, sondern fördern darüber hinaus auch team-orientiertes Denken und flexibles Handeln. 
Vom ersten Kontakt mit den Mitarbeitern, über die kompetenten Mitarbeiter in der Technik, bis hin zur Geschäftsleitung – der Tradition eines Familienunternehmens verpflichtet, versteht sich die Kundenbetreuung als
vorrangigste unternehmerische Aufgabe.

Online-Feuchte- und Temperaturmessung in Mischern und Schüttgütern für fast alle Anwendungsbereiche 
Einheiten für Labor- und Produktprüfung
Systeme für kombinierte Wasserdosierung, Feuchte- und Temperaturmessung 

WLAN-Übertragung der Meßwerte 
APP's für Hersteller unabhängige Endgeräte mit Android-Betriebssystem
Industrie 4.0

Internationales Vertriebsnetz und Servicepartner

Short Description:
Machinery Trader, founded in 1978 and based in Lincoln, Nebraska, is a prominent marketplace for buying and selling new and used construction equipment. Originally launched as a print publication by Sandhills Publishing, the company has evolved into a global platform that connects buyers and sellers in the construction machinery sector.

The company offers an extensive online marketplace where dealers and manufacturers can list a variety of heavy machinery, including excavators, bulldozers, and cranes. In addition to its digital platform, Machinery Trader continues to publish industry-specific print magazines, providing detailed listings and specifications to its audience. The company also provides hosted software solutions for equipment dealers, enhancing inventory management and sales processes. With a strong focus on both print and digital channels, Machinery Trader serves a diverse customer base, including construction companies and equipment rental firms, facilitating informed purchasing decisions in the construction industry.
