Short Description:
Since 1953, MAR-MAC INC. has been on the job at many of the world's most recognizable construction projects. We're thrilled to be on the big jobs of course, but we're just as proud to be on the jobs that don't get much attention—like the buildings where we work, the runways where we land, and the roads that take us home every day.

In addition to being the manufacturer and supplier of industry-leading MAR-MAC PREMIUM Building Products, we also offer CONTRACTOR Concrete Construction Products, MAR-MAC Industrial Wire, and a complimentary line of tools and accessories for the construction and iron-working industries.

Only MAR-MAC offers a comprehensive approach backed by the highest quality products, superior customer care and more than 60 years of deep industry expertise. We help our customers grow their business with greater efficiencies, reduced overall costs, and satisfied end-users. That's why MAR-MAC is the first choice for construction professionals, and why contractors ask for us by name.

Short Description:
Matrix Design Group, Inc. is an employee-owned firm based in Colorado Springs, Colorado, specializing in architecture, engineering, and design services. With a workforce of approximately 100 to 249 employees and annual revenues between $100 million and $250 million, the company has over 25 years of experience serving federal, state, municipal, and private clients across the contiguous United States and Guam.

The firm offers a comprehensive range of services, including civil, environmental, and transportation engineering, architectural design, planning and program management, ecological consulting, landscape architecture, and GIS services. They focus on delivering innovative, technology-driven solutions tailored to client needs, emphasizing sustainability and resilience. Matrix Design Group is committed to quality, as evidenced by their ISO 9001:2015 certification, and they leverage advanced technologies to enhance their service offerings. Their diverse clientele spans various sectors, including industrial, energy, commercial, and environmental projects.

Short Description:
MAX FRANK Group is a global company based in Leiblfing, Germany, specializing in products and technologies for concrete and reinforced concrete construction. Established in 1962, the company has expanded to include 20 subsidiaries across Europe, North America, Asia, Australia, and the Middle East, supported by a network of trade partners.

The company focuses on providing high-quality building technologies that enhance the durability and efficiency of construction projects. Their product range includes fibre-reinforced concrete spacers, formwork and reinforcement technologies, sealing solutions, and sound insulation products. MAX FRANK supports construction engineers and contractors at every stage of their projects, ensuring tailored solutions that meet specific regional and project needs.

With a workforce of around 850 employees, MAX FRANK is committed to customer satisfaction and continuous growth. The company actively engages in professional committees and collaborates with universities and research institutes to advance construction processes and industry standards. Their primary customers are building contractors and construction engineers seeking reliable technical solutions.

Metalcrete Industries has been manufacturing high quality materials for the plant maintenance and construction industry since 1908. We offer a wide variety of specialty products for the concrete industry all over the world, and our goal is to provide a full-service product line to solve many of the problems and challenges you face on a daily basis. Since 1908, Metalcrete Industries has focused primarily on:

Heavy-Duty Industrial Flooring
High-Strength, Non-Shrink Anchoring and Grouting
High-Performance Cement and Epoxy Coatings
Shotcrete Applications
Colored Quartz Seamless Epoxy Flooring
Dry Shake Floor Hardeners
Concrete Sealers, Penetrants, and Curing Agents
General Concrete Repair Materials

Service and commitment to quality have been a part of our tradition since 1908 and continues to this day. Whether your facility's floor is in need of repair or you are installing a new floor, Metalcrete Industries is able to meet the needs of all types of projects - large or small. Choose Metalcrete Industries for your next project and let our products and services meet your building needs.

Short Description:
Miller Formless Co. is a manufacturer based in McHenry, Illinois, specializing in automated slipform paving machines for concrete construction. Founded in 1970 by Charles P. Miller, the company has a rich history of innovation, starting with the development of its first curb and gutter machine in the 1960s. Its product line includes several models, such as the M-1000, M-8100, and M-8800, which are designed for various applications, including concrete curb and gutter installation, barrier walls, and pavements.

The company serves a diverse global market, with machines utilized across North America, Europe, Asia, Central America, and Australia. Miller Formless also offers parts and service support, including a European office in Genk, Belgium. With a commitment to professionalism and continuous learning, the company has maintained its legacy through ownership transitions and continues to innovate in the concrete construction industry.

Short Description:
Moasure® is a UK-based technology company founded in 2014 by Alan Rock, specializing in motion-based measuring tools. The company created the Moasure ONE, the world’s first motion-measuring device, which utilizes high-performance inertial sensors to measure distances, areas, volumes, and elevations by moving the device through space. This innovative approach eliminates the need for GPS or lasers.

Launched in 2019 after a successful crowdfunding campaign, the Moasure ONE captures approximately 500 sensor measurements per second and transmits data via Bluetooth to an app for visualization and calculation. The Moasure 2 Series offers enhanced features, including layout mode and measurement export options to PDF, CAD, or CSV formats. Moasure's technology is widely used by over 100,000 contractors and professionals in various industries, such as landscaping, construction, and architecture, across more than 90 countries. The company has received notable recognition for its innovation, including being named the fastest-growing UK manufacturing company by the Financial Times and winning the “Hottest Startup” award at CES 2019.

Short Description:
NetPlus Alliance is a family-owned buying group established in 1885, originally as a machine shop in Lockport, New York. It has grown into a prominent organization that supports independent industrial and contractor supplies distributors, manufacturers, and wholesalers. By leveraging the collective purchasing power of its over 400 distributor members, NetPlus Alliance negotiates better pricing, rebates, and terms with more than 220 suppliers, facilitating approximately $62 billion in annual sales.

The organization focuses on helping its members thrive in a competitive market. It offers services such as negotiating rebates and pricing, providing marketing support, and organizing networking events. The Growth Plus program encourages collaboration between distributors and suppliers to explore new business opportunities. Members benefit from improved buying power, access to a wide supplier network, and opportunities for education and business development, leading to significant increases in profitability. Under the leadership of President and CEO Jennifer Murphy, NetPlus Alliance continues to empower its members through strong partnerships and strategic support.

Short Description:
Norseman Protective Solutions is a Canadian company based in Edmonton, Alberta, with a history dating back to 1921. It specializes in manufacturing and supplying industrial fabric, foam, and film protective solutions across North America. The company employs between 200 and 500 people and generates annual revenues estimated between $25 million and $100 million.

Norseman serves a wide range of industries, including construction, oil and gas, transportation, agriculture, and health and wellness. Its product offerings include construction and jobsite protection solutions like tarpaulins and utility tents, custom foam components for various applications, and portable shelters. The company also provides durable industrial fabric products such as transportation tarps and secondary containment berms. Norseman is known for its commitment to quality and innovation, working closely with clients to deliver tailored solutions that enhance job-site operations and protect people and equipment.

Short Description:
Nucor Corporation is a prominent American steel producer and recycler based in Charlotte, North Carolina. Founded in 1905, the company transitioned to steel production in the mid-1960s and adopted the Nucor name in 1972. It is recognized for pioneering electric arc furnace (EAF) mini-mill technology, which allows for efficient and cost-effective steel production through the recycling of scrap metal.

As the largest steel producer in the United States and the leading recycler in the Western Hemisphere, Nucor operates a network of mini-mills and regional plants. The company manufactures a diverse range of steel products, including bars, joists, girders, sheets, and other structural components used in construction, manufacturing, and infrastructure projects. Nucor serves various sectors, including construction, automotive, energy, and manufacturing, emphasizing operational efficiency and a teammate-focused culture that has contributed to its growth as a Fortune 500 enterprise.

Short Description:
In 1979, B. L. Moore and his brother-in-law, Robert Lockridge, founded Oklahoma Steel & Wire, located in Madill, Oklahoma, with the sole purpose of manufacturing livestock panels. The company experienced steady expansion and soon included a comprehensive product line for agricultural and industrial markets.

Market demand created the need for a rod source to ensure a sufficient, reliable supply of steel rods to meet their expanding market. In 2004, Mid-American Steel & Wire, in Madill, Oklahoma, was established, employing 238 additional employees. In 2011, to keep pace in an ever-changing steel market, construction of the Melt Shop Division was completed and production started. Mid American Steel keeps Oklahoma Steel and Iowa Steel supplied with wire rods and allows them to stay competitive in the marketplace.

Although Bob Lockridge lost his battle with cancer in 1982, Max Moore lost his life in a mid-air collision in 2000, and in early 2011 with the passing of B.L. Moore, the family continues to own and direct the daily operations of the companies. The family's philosophy for continuous improvement of products and service, with a strong commitment to their employees and their customers, has guided Oklahoma Steel & Wire and Iowa Steel & Wire in becoming industry leaders.

Short Description:
OTH Pioneer Rigging is a North American company founded in 2021 by Jeremy Poste and Olivier Gleize. The company specializes in the distribution and support of the LudwigHook, a remote-controlled crane hook designed to improve safety and efficiency in lifting operations. This innovative product allows rigging teams to release loads remotely, reducing the need for manual unhooking and saving time.

The LudwigHook complies with multiple safety standards, including OSHA, ASME, UL/CSA, and FCC/IC, and is widely used in various industries such as steel erection, wood construction, and overhead manufacturing. OTH Pioneer Rigging has successfully deployed over 1,100 LudwigHooks across 250 businesses in 47 states and Canadian provinces, with applications spanning more than 30 unique use cases. The company also offers comprehensive customer support, including 24-hour spare parts shipping, annual inspections, and a one-week free trial for new users, all aimed at enhancing lifting operations and ensuring customer satisfaction.

Short Description:
Plastika Kritis is a prominent European manufacturer based in Crete, Greece, established in 1970. The company specializes in masterbatches and agricultural films, with a strong international presence and exports to over 90 countries. It has been publicly listed on the Athens Stock Exchange since 1999 and operates multiple production plants across Europe and Asia, including locations in France, Romania, Poland, Russia, Turkey, and China.

The company offers a diverse range of products, including KRITILEN® masterbatches for the plastics industry, KRITIFIL® agricultural films, KRITIFLEX® geomembranes for water management, KRITISOL® polyethylene pipes, and KRITISAN® recycled plastics. Plastika Kritis also emphasizes sustainability through its recycling unit and renewable energy assets, including a wind park and photovoltaic stations in Greece. With over 1,100 employees, the company fosters a family-oriented culture and has affiliate companies in several countries, positioning itself strategically in high-growth markets.

Short Description:
Polarmatic Oy is a Finnish company founded in 1968, specializing in sustainable solutions for the concrete industry. With over 50 years of experience, Polarmatic develops advanced systems for heating, curing, cooling, control, and information management to optimize concrete production processes. The company is headquartered in Tampere, Finland, and has branch offices in the USA and Sweden, along with a global network of certified partners.

Polarmatic is recognized for its energy-efficient technology that helps concrete manufacturers enhance production volumes and product quality while reducing operational costs. Their innovative heating systems, such as the TURBOMATIC, significantly lower fuel consumption and maintenance costs. The company also offers tailored cooling and curing solutions, advanced batching plant control systems, and reliable information management tools. Additionally, Polarmatic provides comprehensive service and maintenance support to ensure optimal operation, particularly in challenging winter conditions.

Short Description:
Polyglass USA, Inc. is a prominent manufacturer of bitumen and synthetic waterproofing membranes, primarily for low- and steep-slope roofing applications in the United States. Founded in Italy in the 1960s by the Zanchetta brothers, the company has developed innovative roofing products that combine polymer and fiberglass technologies. Since becoming part of the Mapei Group in 2008, Polyglass has expanded its operations with manufacturing facilities across several states, including Florida, Nevada, and Texas.

The company specializes in a range of high-quality roofing and waterproofing products, such as modified bitumen roofing membranes, patented ADESO® Technology, and various roof coatings. Polyglass also offers advanced liquid-applied membrane systems, enhancing its portfolio in the building envelope market. With a commitment to research and development, Polyglass focuses on innovation and sustainability, serving a diverse customer base that includes roofing contractors, building owners, and architects. Their products are designed for durability and ease of installation, ensuring long-term performance in various construction projects.

Short Description:
KEVA (former Hilong Industrial) is a group company focus on the one-stop OEM/ODM solution of Formwork system, Scaffolding & Accessories. We are providing the various solutions from design, manufacturing, installation guide, logistics and maintenance. Our top design team from Europe with our leading production lines, strict quality control system and professional customer service team to makes KEVA becoming to the leading company in the global formwork & scaffolding industry.

The factories of KEVA are covered an area of total 20000 square meters with more than 200 staffs located in Qingdao, China. The average annual turnover is 20 Million US dollars. With strict quality control, KEVA's factories have certified EN 1090 by SGS & ISO 9001:2015 by Bureau Veritas.

To makes the excellent quality control, KEVA equips the advanced Automatic Production Lines, such as Formwork & Scaffolding Auto-Welding lines, Screw Jack Auto-Welding Lines, Shoring Prop Auto –Welding Lines etc., also different types of Punching Machines.

In casting factory, we have Electronic Furnaces, Automatic Mould Lines, Heat-Treatment Furnace. Meanwhile, we use Advanced Testing Machines including Spectrometer Machine for chemical composition, Tensile Testing Machine, Pressure Testing Machine, Hardness Testing Machine, Waterproof Testing Machine etc.

Besides the production of KEVA, rely on our experienced marketing, sales & customer service team. The target of KEVA is providing the most professional service to satisfy our each clients from all over the world.

We are well-known all the markets, especially for European & American markets. We know how the safety and efficiency are important for the buyers from those markets and rest of the world. We always learning to know what is the customers really needs.

KEVA makes your construction more safety, more efficiency.

Short Description:
Rental Equipment Register (RER) is a specialized publication and marketing platform for the equipment rental sector. It caters to owners and managers of equipment rental companies, retail stores, and dealerships, focusing on equipment used in construction and industrial markets. RER delivers comprehensive news, analysis, and market updates to keep industry decision-makers informed about the latest trends and equipment lines.

The company offers a range of services, including editorial content tailored for equipment rental professionals, advertising solutions to connect marketers with targeted audiences, and full-service content development. RER also provides data-driven marketing strategies, lead generation, and research to support informed business decisions. Additionally, it produces multimedia content such as videos and podcasts to enhance marketing efforts. RER is recognized for its annual RER 100 list, which ranks the largest rental companies in North America by rental revenue, serving as a key resource for industry benchmarking and recognition.

Short Description:
Resinwerks manufactures sustainable industrial coatings that offer superior performance, quality and value. Supported by a team of veteran resinous flooring professionals, we are committed to delivering the very best products to facility owners and our trusted contractor partners. 

Our product line was designed from the ground up to focus on the very latest in environmentally conscious resins and additives. We have made significant advancements in effectively substituting water for harsh solvents, making them safer to use and better for our environment. The result? Over 90% of our products are voc-free and the remaining products are fully voc-compliant throughout North America.

At Resinwerks, we consider our clients as partners and take great care to ensure their continued success. We have invested significantly in state-of-the-art fulfillment systems and a world-class staff to help us provide you with an industry-leading customer experience. Our products ship fast from one of three west-coast, mid-west and east-coast fulfillment centers, with order status updates every step of the way.

RJD Industries, founded in 1987, is the premier manufacturer of non-corrosive concrete construction accessories made 100% in the USA. RJD Industries invented the SuperTie™, the only fiberglass wall form tie, for projects ranging from small to large crane-set wall forms. RJD also offers other non-corrosive engineered products for use in the reinforcement and concrete construction industries.   
 
Designed to prevent rust and corrosion, our products also reduce labor and costs associated with concrete forming, paving, reinforcement, and slab construction. Used prominently in all aspects of concrete construction across the country, these products are specifiable and designed for owners, architects, and engineers looking to increase the value, quality, and longevity of their projects.

Short Description:
Slabstack is a cloud-based sales and business management platform tailored for producers in the heavy building materials industry, including concrete, aggregates, and asphalt. The platform is designed to enhance operational efficiency and profitability, offering an integrated solution that is accessible from any device without the need for installation or maintenance.

The platform features a range of tools, including customer relationship management (CRM), project management, quoting, price optimization, forecasting, and business intelligence. These tools help users manage customer interactions, organize projects, generate quotes, optimize pricing strategies, and analyze data for informed decision-making. Slabstack collaborates with leading dispatch system providers to ensure seamless integration with existing workflows, reducing manual data entry and improving supply chain transparency.

As a U.S.-based start-up with a focus on the ready-mix and heavy building materials sectors, Slabstack aims to support producers in maximizing their profitability and efficiency. The company is actively expanding its team to further develop solutions for the industry.

Short Description:
SPEC MIX is a construction products company that specializes in preblended masonry mortars, grouts, and stucco products. Founded over 28 years ago in Minnesota, the company has established a strong presence with more than 40 production facilities across the U.S. and Canada. It is recognized for its unique white silo material delivery systems and its commitment to providing high-quality materials for a variety of construction projects, from single-family homes to large sports coliseums.

In addition to its product offerings, SPEC MIX is known for the SPEC MIX BRICKLAYER 500®, a national bricklaying competition that promotes masonry skills and craftsmanship. Launched in 2003, this event has grown to include regional qualifiers and an annual world championship at the World of Concrete trade show. SPEC MIX collaborates closely with architects, engineers, and contractors to deliver project-specific solutions, ensuring high standards of quality and safety on job sites. The company supports a diverse customer base in the masonry and construction industries with its innovative products and technical expertise.

Short Description:
Stealth Monitoring, Inc., based in Addison, Texas, has been a prominent provider of security services since its founding in 2006. The company specializes in live video monitoring, mobile video monitoring, IT security, and integrated surveillance solutions. With around 2,000 employees, Stealth Monitoring generates approximately $409.9 million in revenue.

The company offers a wide range of security services aimed at enhancing safety and operational oversight for various sectors, including commercial, healthcare, industrial, energy, infrastructure, institutional, and residential. Their core offerings include real-time surveillance through centralized platforms, mobile monitoring for assets and vehicles, and IT security to protect digital networks. Stealth Monitoring also provides proactive live video surveillance across North America, actively monitoring over 100,000 cameras to ensure continuous protection.

Stealth Monitoring positions itself as a leader in the mobile and fixed video monitoring industry, utilizing technology and skilled personnel to deliver effective security solutions tailored to the evolving needs of its diverse clientele.

Short Description:
Stego Industries, LLC, based in San Clemente, California, specializes in proactive moisture control solutions for the construction industry. Founded in 1998, the company is recognized as a leader in below-slab vapor barriers in North America. Their flagship product, the Stego Wrap Vapor Barrier, is known for its effectiveness in preventing moisture vapor migration, which helps maintain flooring integrity and indoor air quality.

In addition to the Stego Wrap, the company offers products like Stego Tape for sealing, the Drago Wrap Vapor Intrusion Barrier for blocking volatile organic compounds, and Beast Concrete Accessories. Stego serves a diverse clientele, including architects, engineers, contractors, and building owners, providing high-quality moisture protection for various construction projects.

Stego Industries is dedicated to customer support and technical training, aiming to educate the construction community. The company also prioritizes environmental responsibility, focusing on creating products that have a positive impact. Overall, Stego Industries is committed to innovation and quality in moisture and vapor barrier systems.

Short Description:
Structural Reinforcement Solutions (SRS) is based in Thornville, Ohio, and specializes in advanced reinforcement and stabilization solutions for concrete and masonry structures. With over five years in business and an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau since March 2023, SRS serves both residential properties and infrastructure projects across North America.

The company offers engineered carbon fiber strengthening systems that are lightweight, high-strength, and non-invasive. Their product lineup includes carbon fiber reinforcement systems, concrete strengthening products like SRS-4000 Concrete Guard and SRS-4100 Steel Guard, and various structural epoxy resins. SRS also provides comprehensive engineering services, including inspection, design, and bid preparation for a wide range of structural repairs and strengthening tasks, such as foundation repair, retaining wall repair, and beam strengthening.

SRS targets residential property owners and civil infrastructure projects, delivering durable and effective solutions that enhance load capacity and stabilize deteriorated components. Their innovative approach and expertise in carbon fiber technology set them apart in the structural reinforcement industry.

Short Description:
Torginol® was founded in 1961 with the vision of pioneering the resinous performance flooring market throughout the United States. Since then, we have evolved to exclusively focus on engineering materials that enhance the aesthetic and ergonomic qualities of living environments. Our materials combine design and function to provide optimal utility to commercial, industrial, institutional and residential surfaces throughout the world. Designers, architects, builders and home owners are inspired by the innovative patterns and textures produced by our materials.

Today, Torginol® exclusively manufactures and distributes an array of decorative materials for a variety of niche markets, including: resinous and terrazzo flooring, decorative wall coatings, pool plaster finishes, grouts and mortars, EIFS systems, engineered surfaces, landscaping, fish aquariums, art, craft and hobby projects, home decor accents and others.

Short Description:
Trans Lease, Inc. is an independent equipment finance company that specializes in commercial vehicle loans and transportation equipment financing. Founded in 1991 by George Eidsness, the company has expanded from a regional operation to a national presence, serving clients in all 50 U.S. states, Canada, and Puerto Rico. It is recognized as one of the top 10 independently owned equipment finance companies in America, managing over $500 million in assets and financing more than 14,000 units.

The company offers a variety of financing solutions tailored to the transportation industry, including TRAC leases, FMV leases, equipment leases, installment leases, and loan agreements. Trans Lease finances a wide range of commercial vehicles and equipment, such as trucks and trailers, to meet diverse fleet needs. With a focus on personalized customer service, the company provides streamlined credit approvals and quick funding, ensuring efficient deal closures for its clients. Headquartered in Denver, Colorado, Trans Lease operates with a small team and emphasizes career opportunities within the equipment finance sector.

Short Description:
ULMA Architectural Solutions is a cooperative company in the construction sector, focusing on the design and manufacture of prefabricated products made from polymer concrete. As part of the ULMA Group, which operates in 80 countries and employs around 5,500 people, ULMA Architectural Solutions has a dedicated team of approximately 250 employees and reported revenues of about 28.6 million USD.

The company offers a range of innovative and sustainable solutions, including drainage and canalization systems, customizable architectural products, and facade enclosures. Their products are designed for ease of installation and labor savings, meeting European standards. ULMA also provides urban furniture and tailored facade solutions using Stoneo panels, known for their weather resistance and customization options. Serving architects, engineers, contractors, and urban planners, ULMA Architectural Solutions emphasizes high-performance materials and technical support to enhance building projects worldwide.

Short Description:
Unique Industries is a family-owned manufacturer and distributor of party supplies, based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. With over 60 years of experience, the company has grown to become a leading player in the global party supply market, operating 10 facilities across the U.S., Canada, the United Kingdom, and Asia, and utilizing over 37 million cubic feet of warehouse space.

The company offers a wide range of party products, including tableware, balloons, piñatas, party favors, and decorations. Unique Industries features an extensive catalog of trendy and classic items, along with a strong selection of licensed party themes in partnership with major brands like Disney, Marvel, and Nickelodeon. They focus on providing high-quality products at competitive prices, supported by a robust distribution network and personalized service that reflects their family-owned values.

Short Description:
Verifi Inc. is a Los Angeles-based company founded in 2005 that specializes in payment protection and management solutions for card-not-present merchants, including omni-channel and e-commerce businesses. Acquired by Visa Inc. in 2019, Verifi offers a suite of post-purchase solutions aimed at preventing and resolving transaction disputes, reducing fraud, and maximizing merchant revenue throughout the payment lifecycle.

The company is known for its multi-layered approach to risk management, which includes fraud prevention, chargeback representment, and business optimization strategies. Verifi's flagship product, the Cardholder Dispute Resolution Network (CDRN), connects financial institutions and merchants for real-time dispute resolution. Other offerings include Order Insight, which enhances collaboration among cardholders, merchants, and issuers, and customizable payment protection solutions that leverage extensive data for risk management. Verifi serves a diverse range of clients, from startups to Fortune 500 companies, and is recognized for its expertise and personalized client support.

Short Description:
Verizon Connect is a prominent provider of fleet management and mobile workforce management software solutions. Based in Waltham, Massachusetts, the company specializes in GPS tracking, service tracking, and operational analytics for businesses in logistics, supply chain, and transportation. Established in 2004, Verizon Connect was formed in 2018 through the merger of three telematics companies under the Verizon brand, creating a unified platform for fleet and workforce management.

As a division of Verizon Communications, Verizon Connect offers a comprehensive suite of software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions. These tools help businesses optimize fleet operations, enhance driver safety, improve fuel efficiency, and reduce costs. Key features include real-time GPS vehicle tracking, driver behavior monitoring, compliance management, and data-driven operational visibility. The platform connects vehicles, drivers, and back-office operations, facilitating seamless communication and workflow management for a diverse range of commercial customers.

Short Description:
Weber MT (Weber Maschinentechnik GmbH) is a family-owned German company established in 1952. It specializes in designing, manufacturing, and distributing light and hand-guided soil compaction equipment for the construction industry. Recognized as a leader in walk-behind compaction technology, Weber MT exports over 60% of its products globally. The company focuses on high precision and durability, ensuring its equipment meets the demanding conditions of construction sites.

The product range includes vibratory forward plates, reversible plate compactors, rammers, walk-behind rollers, remote-controlled trench rollers, concrete internal vibrators, and pavement saws. Weber MT emphasizes innovation and quality, featuring proprietary technologies like COMPATROL® to enhance performance and reliability. With a strong presence in North America, the company operates through select dealers and manufacturer representatives, providing product demonstrations and service support. Weber MT is committed to continuous research and development, ensuring high-quality standards and dependable customer support.

Short Description:
Weyerhaeuser is a prominent international forest products company based in Tacoma, Washington, founded in 1900. It is one of the largest private owners of timberlands in the United States, managing millions of acres primarily in the U.S. and Canada. The company focuses on sustainable forestry practices, including reforestation and soil management, and has been committed to these practices since initiating its High Yield Forestry Plan in 1967.

Weyerhaeuser's core business includes the production of softwood lumber, pulp, paper, and packaging materials. It manufactures lumber and engineered wood products for construction and industrial use, and produces pulp for paper and packaging. The company operates as a real estate investment trust (REIT) since 2010, managing its forestland assets and related subsidiaries. Weyerhaeuser serves various sectors, including construction, paper and packaging manufacturing, and real estate development, emphasizing sustainability and innovation in its operations.

Short Description:
Williams Form Engineering Corporation is a family-owned company based in Belmont, Michigan, established in 1922. It specializes in the design, development, manufacturing, and sale of concrete forming hardware, anchoring technology, and related construction accessories. With eight locations across the US and Canada, the company serves the heavy construction and geotechnical support industries in North America and internationally.

The product range includes concrete forming hardware, rock and concrete anchor bolts, post-tensioning systems, and ground anchor systems. Their anchoring solutions encompass various types of anchors, including mechanical, resin, and self-drilling options. Williams Form Engineering's products are utilized in significant projects such as dams, bridges, and water treatment plants. The company prides itself on high-quality, American-made products and offers engineering support, including shop drawings and on-site technical assistance. With a focus on innovation and customer service, Williams Form Engineering continues to be a key player in the heavy construction industry.

Short Description:
Badger Meter, established in 1905 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, is a leader in flow measurement technology, focusing on water metering and related solutions. The company began with frost-proof water meters to prevent frozen pipes and has since expanded its offerings significantly.

Today, Badger Meter provides a wide range of products, including mechanical, electromagnetic, ultrasonic, and Coriolis flow meters for accurate water flow measurement. The company has embraced smart metering technologies, offering Automatic Meter Reading (AMR) and Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI) systems that help utilities efficiently collect and analyze water usage data. Additionally, the BEACON AMA platform enhances operational efficiency through data analytics and network monitoring.

Badger Meter serves a diverse clientele, including municipal water utilities and industrial customers, with solutions that help manage and control water flow. The company is recognized for its technological innovation and strong relationships with North American water utilities, supported by ongoing research and development efforts. Its comprehensive offerings position Badger Meter as a key player in the water management sector.

Short Description:
Xwatch Safety Solutions, founded in 2019 and now part of Hexagon, specializes in advanced safety technologies for heavy construction sites. The company develops operator-friendly safety systems that enhance operational safety around heavy machinery, particularly excavators. Their flagship XW series features height control, slew control, and rated capacity indication (RCI), allowing operators to define safe working zones and significantly reduce accidents.

In addition to excavators, Xwatch provides safety systems for lorry-mounted cranes and special-purpose machines, such as the XW4-LMC. Their products are compatible with various excavators, including Kobelco models, and are distributed through partners like Molson Group. This collaboration ensures that Xwatch systems are fitted on new machinery for clients such as Flannery Plant and MJ Church.

As part of Hexagon, Xwatch benefits from strong financial backing and global resources, positioning the company to expand its impact on construction safety worldwide.

Short Description:
FODS LLC is a Colorado-based company that specializes in innovative construction trackout control systems. Their flagship product, the FODS Trackout Control Mat, is a proprietary composite mat designed to effectively remove mud and sediment from vehicle tires without causing damage. This mat is a durable and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional rock stabilized construction entrances, helping contractors comply with Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plans (SWPPP) while saving time and money.

In addition to trackout control mats, FODS offers Scout Ground Protection Mats, which stabilize soft substrates like grass and wet soil, preventing vehicle rutting and protecting both the site and equipment. All products are manufactured in Florida, made from recyclable materials, and distributed nationwide and internationally. Recently acquired by Spartan Composites LLC, FODS aims to leverage combined strengths to expand its product offerings and market reach in the construction industry. The company serves contractors and construction firms, focusing on effective sediment control solutions and sustainability.

Short Description:
Grabo is a company with multiple distinct profiles. One notable entity is Grabo from Poland, established in 1991, which specializes in beech wood products and has expanded its offerings to include oak, maple, and American nut wood. The company manufactures finished goods such as furniture and varnished components, serving customers in the forestry, furniture manufacturing, and construction sectors.

Another prominent company is Grabo Balloons, founded in 1982 in Europe. It is recognized as a leader in foil balloon manufacturing, evolving from a small family business to a global enterprise. Grabo Balloons produces foil balloons and balloon manufacturing machines, catering to event organizers, retailers, and distributors in the party and decoration industry.

Additionally, GRABO Power Tool, based in Las Vegas, NV, was founded in 2013 by engineer Nimo Rotem. This company is known for its innovative electric suction cup tool designed for lifting heavy materials. GRABO Power Tool offers a range of industrial tools, serving construction workers, installers, and DIY enthusiasts.

Founded in 1983, GNE specializes in outdoor power equipment, professional and DIY job tools, and Honda engines, making it the largest Honda Engine Distributor in the United States. The company serves various markets, including hardware, lawn and garden, agriculture, construction, and power equipment.

GNE offers a wide range of products, including over 50 lines of commercial quality power equipment and an extensive inventory of Honda engines. Their offerings also include replacement parts and tools for both professional and DIY applications. GNE is dedicated to understanding its customers' needs and provides tailored support solutions, including a dedicated technician team for OEM partners. The company emphasizes collaboration and aims to build long-term relationships with its diverse customer base, which includes independent resellers, rental stores, and big box retailers.

GreatAmerica Financial Services is the largest independent, family-owned commercial equipment finance company in the United States. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, the company has grown to a $2.5 billion enterprise with over $14 billion in finance originations and more than 600 employees across several states.

The company specializes in tailored financial services and equipment leasing solutions for various industries, particularly focusing on the office equipment sector. GreatAmerica offers flexible financing options, single invoice solutions, and innovative non-financial services to help manufacturers, vendors, and dealers enhance their business operations. Their technology solutions include tools for quoting, applications, and detailed reporting, which streamline workflows and improve efficiency.

GreatAmerica is committed to fostering strong relationships with its customers, which include manufacturers, vendors, dealers, and banking institutions. The company’s culture emphasizes values such as excellence, integrity, and continuous improvement, supporting its mission to help customers achieve greater success.

Short Description:
Geophysical Survey Systems, Inc. (GSSI) is a leading manufacturer of ground penetrating radar (GPR) equipment, established in 1974. Headquartered in Nashua, New Hampshire, GSSI is known for its reliable subsurface imaging technology used globally.

The company offers a wide range of GPR and electromagnetic induction equipment for various applications, including concrete inspection, utility mapping, road and bridge evaluation, archaeology, and environmental studies. GSSI's systems are designed for professionals needing detailed subsurface visualization, supporting tasks from structural health monitoring to geological investigations.

GSSI is committed to innovation, having introduced several industry firsts, such as the first digital GPR system and the first high-frequency GPR system for concrete scanning. The company provides extensive support through a network of specialists, ensuring customers receive training and technical assistance for effective use of their technology. GSSI serves diverse sectors, including civil engineering, construction, and public safety, with equipment trusted by professionals worldwide.

Gülhan Yedek Parça is a Turkish company founded in 1978, specializing in the production of rubber-based spare parts for the construction and construction machinery sectors. Based in Ankara, the company operates from a facility of approximately 10,000 m², showcasing significant growth over the years. Gülhan is recognized as a leading manufacturer both domestically and internationally.

The company focuses on producing rubber, polyurethane, and plastic seals and spare parts, catering to brands like Putzmeister, Schwing, and Cifa. Gülhan also offers custom design and manufacturing of molds, along with laboratory testing to ensure product quality. Additionally, it provides EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction) contracting services, indicating its involvement in project execution.

Gülhan serves a wide market, exporting products to various countries, including Germany, Spain, and Saudi Arabia. With a workforce of 51 to 200 employees, the company has an estimated annual revenue between US$10 million and US$50 million, reflecting its strong position in the industry.

Keene Building Products is an American manufacturer based in Cleveland, Ohio, specializing in high-performance building materials. As a subsidiary of Keene, Incorporated, the company serves various markets, including construction and industrial sectors. It is recognized for its innovative 3-dimensional filament products, which are primarily used in building envelope and noise control applications.

The company offers a diverse range of products, including floor preparation and repair materials, specialty coatings, commercial roofing waterproofing solutions, and custom paints. Keene Building Products emphasizes sustainability and quality, providing environmentally responsible options that help builders achieve LEED certification. Their solutions are particularly beneficial for multi-family residential projects and commercial construction, focusing on moisture management, noise reduction, and overall durability.

With a commitment to innovation and customer service, Keene Building Products supports contractors, developers, architects, and building owners in creating efficient and sustainable building solutions.

London Machinery Inc. is a Canadian company based in London, Ontario, with a history that dates back to 1905. The company specializes in manufacturing high-quality concrete mixer trucks and heavy-duty ready-mix vehicles. With over a century of experience, London Machinery has built a strong reputation for quality, integrity, and innovation in the industry.

The product line includes concrete mixer trucks, replacement drums, and equipment designed to enhance productivity in concrete mixing operations. London Machinery is also the sole Canadian distributor of McNeilus refuse trucks, providing a range of severe-duty products for refuse collection. In addition to manufacturing, the company offers parts supply, service, rentals, and financing to support customers in maintaining their fleets.

With a focus on customer feedback, London Machinery's team of engineers and skilled workers continuously strive to improve their products. The company serves a diverse customer base in North America and globally, emphasizing exceptional customer support and a commitment to quality.

Mack Trucks is a historic American truck manufacturer founded in 1900 by brothers Jack and Gus Mack in Brooklyn, New York. Originally named the Mack Brothers Company, it produced its first successful motorized vehicle that same year and its first heavy-duty truck in 1905 after moving operations to Allentown, Pennsylvania. The company became Mack Trucks, Inc. in 1922 and relocated its headquarters to Greensboro, North Carolina in 2010.

Mack Trucks is known for its durable heavy-duty trucks, which are popular in the commercial trucking industry. The company’s product lineup includes trucks designed for long-haul freight, construction, refuse, and vocational applications. Its trucks are recognized for their strength and performance, making them a preferred choice for logistics companies, construction firms, and waste management services. Mack Trucks has been a subsidiary of Volvo Group since 2000, allowing it to continue innovating while upholding its legacy of reliability and toughness.

Master Builders Solutions is a global manufacturer based in Mannheim, Germany, specializing in advanced chemical solutions for the construction industry. With around 1,600 to 1,700 employees, the company reported sales exceeding 900 million euros in 2023. It focuses on sustainable and innovative building technologies, offering a wide range of construction chemical products and special building solutions.

Their product portfolio includes concrete admixtures, cement additives, waterproofing solutions, and advanced fiber technologies for concrete reinforcement. Multicoat, founded in 1984, specializes in high-performance sealants, coatings, and waterproofing solutions for the construction industry. Short Description:
The National Precast Concrete Association (NPCA) is a prominent trade association that represents companies in the precast concrete industry, including manufacturers, suppliers, and service providers in the U.S., Canada, and beyond. Established in 1965, NPCA focuses on promoting quality precast concrete products, addressing industry challenges, and creating opportunities for its members.

NPCA offers a variety of services to support its members, such as technical support, education, and workforce development to enhance manufacturing techniques and quality standards. The association advocates for the industry's interests in public policy and infrastructure development, and it hosts North America's largest annual precast concrete trade show, fostering networking and business opportunities. Additionally, NPCA runs campaigns to educate various sectors about the benefits of precast concrete.

Headquartered in Carmel, Indiana, NPCA plays a vital role in the precast concrete industry, which includes approximately 2,740 U.S. plants and over 102,300 employees, contributing significantly to the construction sector. The association is driven by a dedicated membership committed to quality and innovation.

Short Description:
When your workers are protected they are more productive. When your projects are protected, the costs associated with delays and shutdowns are minimised. With rapidly inflatable reinforced PVC ‘air beams', a Fast Tent unit is self supporting, no framework or scaffolding is required and it can be quickly & easily relocated. The double walled construction provides very good insulation and robust load bearing capability.

Unlike metal pole systems, which can be heavy, complicated to put together and prone to having parts go missing, an air beam system from Fast Tent only requires a pump to inflate the rigid support structure in a matter of minutes, which means your teams can get on with their work as soon as possible.

Key benefits:

Faster Installation – Whilst a traditional scaffold frame and sheeting such as shrink wrap could take days to achieve, a Fast Tent system inflates in just a couple of minutes.

Consistent Quality – The effectiveness of most traditional tenting and sheeting systems is dependent on the skill of the installer and weather conditions during set up. Fast tent is manufactured and tested off site and we can incorporate colours and corporate branding.

Safe & Sustainable – As fast tent is self supporting, no scaffolding or other framework is required and work at height is eliminated. The system's inflatable skin provides superb insulation and far easier control of the internal environment. Because Fast tent is re-usable there is no sheeting to be disposed of.

Technologies: Outlook, Microsoft Office 365
Short Description: Eliminate pour strips with the PS=Ø® Mechanical Rebar Splice System. Pour strips are often specified to control shrinkage, creep and elastic shortening in post-tensioned and cast-in-place concrete. Without redesign, the PS=Ø® System eliminates pour strips, while allowing for volume change in the slab and providing structural continuity. PS=Ø® stands for pour strip zero. It utilizes proven coupler technologies that have been used worldwide for decades. With a tapered thread on one end and a grout-filled sleeve on the other, this patented system meets ACI Type 1 and Type 2 mechanical splice requirements, is ICC approved and made in the USA. Now you can eliminate pour strips, the construction delays, extra costs and safety issues they bring with the PS=Ø® Mechanical Rebar Splicing System.

Short Description:
Quadra Concrete is a prominent manufacturer specializing in high-performance concrete equipment and turnkey production plants, boasting over 50 years of experience in the concrete industry. Headquartered in France, with a manufacturing facility in Surrey, British Columbia, the company is known for its innovative automated processes and patented vibration systems. These technologies enable the production of various concrete products, including blocks, curbstones, paving stones, slabs, and fences.

The company focuses on in-house design and engineering, employing a diverse team of experts to create customized solutions that meet client specifications. Quadra designs and manufactures concrete batch plants and production machines, optimizing reliability and minimizing downtime. They also conduct comprehensive project studies to recommend efficient equipment solutions and enhance existing operations. With a commitment to quality and customer service, Quadra supports clients globally, serving concrete product manufacturers and ready-mix concrete producers with reliable, high-quality solutions.

RENOLIT is a global leader in the plastics industry, specializing in high-quality plastic films, sheeting, and polymer-based products. Founded in 1946 by Jakob Müller in Worms, Germany, the company has grown from a small producer of PVC-based leather substitutes to a major player in plastics processing, with around 5,000 employees across more than 30 production sites in over 20 countries.

The company offers a diverse range of products tailored for various technical applications. This includes high-performance plastic films for industrial uses, sheeting for sectors like automotive, packaging, construction, and healthcare, as well as specialized films and coatings. RENOLIT is committed to innovation and quality, leveraging its extensive experience to support customers in their manufacturing and product development processes. Short Description:
Roads & Bridges is a well-established trade publication that has been serving the road and bridge construction industry in North America since 1906. It provides valuable information to construction and maintenance professionals, heavy equipment manufacturers, contractors, engineers, and government employees involved in infrastructure development.

The publication offers a variety of content formats, including a print magazine published eight times a year, which features articles on construction, maintenance, technology, and safety. It also has an online platform that delivers news and expert analysis, along with multimedia content such as video interviews and podcasts. Additionally, Roads & Bridges runs newsletters, a job board, and annual awards programs that recognize excellence in the industry.

Owned by Endeavor Business Media and headquartered in Arlington Heights, Illinois, Roads & Bridges reaches around 61,000 subscribers, making it a key resource for professionals in the infrastructure sector. The publication collaborates with major industry associations to enhance its credibility and support the advancement of road and bridge infrastructure in North America.

Roechling Industrial North America is a subsidiary of the Röchling Group, a global leader in plastics engineering. The company focuses on developing and manufacturing high-performance thermoplastics and composite materials for various technical applications. Their product range includes semi-finished thermoplastic products such as sheets, rods, tubes, and finished castings, made from materials like UHMW-PE, HDPE, polypropylene, nylon, acetal, and fiberglass-reinforced composites.

Short Description:
SAGE is an independent global academic and professional publishing company founded in 1965 by Sara Miller McCune. With headquarters in major cities like Los Angeles, London, New Delhi, Singapore, and Washington, D.C., SAGE employs over 1,200 people worldwide. The company is dedicated to disseminating high-quality scholarly content across various disciplines, including social sciences, humanities, business, science, technology, medicine, and engineering.

SAGE publishes more than 1,000 journals and over 800 books and reference works annually. Its offerings include academic journals, textbooks, and digital products such as databases and qualitative data analysis software. The company is known for its commitment to social sciences, providing specialized resources like the Little Green Book Series and research methods journals. SAGE serves a diverse customer base, including academic institutions, researchers, educators, and students, and actively promotes equity in higher education and academic freedom through partnerships with various organizations.

Simiron Inc. is an American manufacturer based in Madison Heights, Michigan, specializing in protective coating solutions since 1992. The company develops high-performance coatings that protect and enhance various surfaces across multiple industries worldwide.

Their product range includes advanced epoxy and polyurethane coatings known for their resistance to abrasion, chemicals, corrosion, UV exposure, and weathering. Simiron offers fast-curing epoxy floor coatings, stir-in additives for safer environments, and easy-to-use epoxy concrete crack fillers. They also provide high-performance polyaspartic floor coatings, semi-rigid polyurea for joint filling, and ultra-clear epoxy resin coatings for artistic applications. Additionally, they manufacture water-based concrete curing and sealing compounds with durable finishes for both interior and exterior use.

Simiron serves a diverse customer base, including industrial, commercial, and DIY markets. Their products are designed for various environments, such as garages, laboratories, and office buildings. The company emphasizes quality and user-friendly formulations, ensuring effective application for both professionals and non-professionals. Simiron is committed to innovation and customer support, with all products made in the USA.

Short Description:
SmartBarrel is a technology company founded in 2018 that focuses on biometric facial verification time tracking solutions for the construction industry. Its main product, the SmartBarrel device, is a durable and weatherproof unit that connects via LTE and can be powered by electricity or solar energy. The device uses AI-powered facial recognition to automatically verify employee clock-in and clock-out times, addressing issues like buddy punching and inaccurate time reporting.

The SmartBarrel system is designed for ease of use, requiring no training for field workers. It includes a cloud-based dashboard for foremen and payroll teams to review time cards, assign cost codes, and track labor hours by project phase. Key features of the software include attendance tracking, automatic break calculation, compliance management, real-time reporting, and geofencing. This comprehensive solution helps contractors improve job costing, payroll processing, and overall productivity. Headquartered in Miami, Florida, SmartBarrel serves construction companies and contractors, aiming to enhance workforce management through innovative technology.

Their extensive product portfolio is designed for various industries, including medical simulation, special effects, prototyping, architectural restoration, and industrial manufacturing.

SpecChem is a manufacturer and supplier based in Kansas City, Missouri, specializing in high-quality construction chemicals for the concrete distributor network. Founded in 2006, the company is led by Chairman and CEO Greg S. Maday and President Mike Shull, who together bring over 300 years of industry experience. SpecChem operates six manufacturing plants across the United States, ensuring efficient shipping and service to major markets.

Short Description:
Spider by BrandSafway is a prominent designer and manufacturer of powered suspended access solutions, primarily serving the industrial and commercial construction sectors. Founded in 1947 and headquartered in Seattle, Washington, the company leverages over 70 years of experience to provide safe and reliable access equipment. As part of BrandSafway’s Motorized Manufacturing Group, Spider combines integrated manufacturing and engineering capabilities with a national network of sales, rental, and service operations.

The company offers a diverse range of products, including traction hoists, drum hoists, material hoists, work cages, modular swing stage work platforms, rigging equipment, and safety solutions like netting and fall protection equipment. Short Description:
Superior Walls of America, Ltd. is a prominent company founded in 1981 by Mel Zimmerman, specializing in precast concrete foundation systems. Based in New Holland, Pennsylvania, the company operates multiple manufacturing sites across the United States and Canada, having installed over 170,000 residential foundations. 

Their core product is a precast concrete foundation system designed for strong, dry, and energy-efficient basements. These systems are produced off-site using advanced techniques, including CAD-designed plans and a high-strength concrete mix. Installation is quick, typically completed in less than a day, enhancing building strength and energy efficiency. Superior Walls offers various product lines, including the Xi wall panels, which provide added insulation and strength. The company is recognized for its commitment to quality and sustainability, receiving awards such as the Innovative Housing Technology Award.

Superior Walls serves a diverse clientele, including homeowners, builders, and light commercial projects, emphasizing energy efficiency and durability. Their systems are featured in notable projects and supported by regional licensees, contributing to their reputation for delivering high-quality foundation solutions tailored to local markets.

Short Description:
Trinity Logistics is a prominent third-party logistics (3PL) company founded in 1979 in Cambridge, Maryland. Originally known as Trinity Transport, it has grown into a top 20 logistics provider and became part of Burris Logistics in 2019. The company focuses on delivering comprehensive logistics services, emphasizing integrity and strong client relationships.

Trinity Logistics offers a wide range of services, including freight brokerage, asset-based trucking, warehousing, and third-party logistics solutions. It operates a fleet of nearly 100 tractors and over 375 trailers, primarily serving the eastern United States. The company also manages a 45,000 square foot warehouse in Lexington, North Carolina, and provides tailored transportation management solutions for various industries.

With a diverse customer base of over 6,000 clients, Trinity Logistics is dedicated to meeting the needs of manufacturers, distributors, and construction companies. The company prides itself on its people-centric culture and commitment to customer satisfaction, fostering strong relationships and driving significant growth in recent years.

Short Description: Vanguard ADA Systems provides training and licenses for their patented method of installing detectable warnings. Vanguard's truncated domes are entirely seamless, designed specifically so that there is no possible way for water intrusion, and therefore no potential "freeze/thaw heave". Vanguard is also "non-skid" as opposed to "slip resistant". It's simply best in class and it is backed by a 5 Year Replacement Warranty. Vanguard Detectable Warnings are made from 25% recycled materials. A new and profitable way to install the longest lasting detectable warnings nationwide.

Short Description:
VELOSIT is an innovative start-up organisation. Our mission is to make construction faster, easier and less tedious.
 
VELOSIT is based on decades of experience in R&D, production and consulting for high performance construction materials which are fully conversant with modern construction techniques, all conducted in harmonious team working. Our global team combines the latest construction methods with novel proven chemistries.
 
The experience behind VELOSIT has been utilised to design and formulate products based on state-of-the-art technologies approved for the construction industry. The novel VELOSIT Binder Formula is the "platform technology" for our cementitious mortars, waterproofing and self levelling product ranges. That offer easily mixed & applied products with good workability times, extremely rapid strength development and no shrinkage in addition to outstanding chemical, mechanical and water-resisting properties, requiring minimal or no post-application curing. The applied "platform technology" enables us to create products with very predictable and safe properties. Along side the cementitious waterproofing range we also supply polyurea-based protective coatings which offer extraordinary physical and chemical-resistant properties.
 
Production started early January 2015 at the new facility located at the "Industriepark Lippe" and will be home to all the new technological innovations for yet quicker and user-friendly products for tomorrow.
 
VELOSIT GmbH & Co. KG is managed by its owners who believe in making distances closer, decision making faster and providing customers with their requirements. Not only are our products "fast"; you will also experience quick and precise technical answers to your queries coupled with short delivery times and adequate after sales service.

Short Description:
Voeller Mixers is a proven equipment manufacturer with over forty years of experience in the manufactured concrete products, glass, and fly-ash industries.  

The Voeller Cyclo-Mixer is available in capacities from .4 cubic meters to 4.6 cubic meters with either V-belt drive or mechanical drive transmissions.  The Cyclo-Mixer is designed and constructed to provide a fast, aggressive mixing action that delivers consistent quality day after day.  

Our line of fully automated batching equipment is available in an accumulative weighing design, a "weigh belt or batcher", or a decumulative style where the loss of material is weighed at the storage hoppers.  Material handling systems can be added to any plant.  This flexibility of design benefits our customers as each plant is tailor-made to fit the specific needs of each concrete production facility.  

All of our equipment is designed to increase productivity and reduce the costs of operation.  Our customers rely upon our batching and mixing systems to provide consistency of mix efficiently and reliably with a capability proven the world over.

Short Description:
World Kinect Corporation, based in Miami, Florida, is a global energy management company that specializes in fuel and energy solutions across various sectors, including aviation, marine, and land-based transportation. With over 35 years of experience, the company operates through more than 185 subsidiaries and 150 offices, serving customers in approximately 190 countries.

The company offers a diverse portfolio of products and services. In aviation, it supplies fuel and related services to commercial airlines, cargo carriers, and military fleets. For the marine sector, World Kinect provides bunkering services and lubricants at over 1,200 major seaports. In land transportation, it serves petroleum wholesalers and distributors, supplying over 5,000 retail gas stations across the U.S., U.K., and Brazil. Additionally, the company focuses on energy management and sustainability, delivering electricity, natural gas, and renewable fuels to clients worldwide. Its comprehensive services also include fuel management, price risk management, and operational support.

Xtreme Polishing Systems Supply (XPS) is a specialized supplier for the concrete and floor resurfacing industry. They provide professional-grade equipment, products, and training focused on concrete polishing and epoxy flooring applications. Their extensive product range includes concrete floor grinding and polishing machines, diamond polishing pads, concrete densifiers, sealers, and a variety of epoxy floor coatings, dyes, and stains. XPS also manufactures its own line of equipment called Xtreme Machines, alongside products from other leading brands.

In addition to supplying products, XPS offers specialized training and certification programs in epoxy floor coatings and polished concrete installation. These training sessions are led by certified trainers and emphasize hands-on learning, equipping contractors and installers with the necessary skills for expert application. XPS serves a diverse customer base, including concrete and floor resurfacing contractors, industrial and commercial flooring professionals, and residential flooring installers, supporting them with both quality products and educational resources.

Short Description:
YETI Holdings, Inc. is an outdoor consumer goods company based in Austin, Texas, founded in 2006 by brothers Roy and Ryan Seiders. The company was established to create durable, high-performance coolers that meet the needs of outdoor enthusiasts. YETI's mission is to design products that last for generations, allowing adventurers to enjoy the outdoors for longer periods.

Initially focused on virtually indestructible coolers, YETI has since expanded its product line to include stainless steel drinkware, bags, apparel, and outdoor living products. The company targets serious outdoor enthusiasts, such as hunters, fishers, and campers, who prioritize durability and performance in their gear. YETI is recognized for its high-quality offerings, including coolers known for their toughness and ice retention, as well as drinkware designed to keep beverages at the desired temperature. 

With a strong brand reputation and a loyal customer base, YETI has evolved its business model to include partnerships with major retailers and has experienced global expansion since its initial public offering in 2018.

Short Description:
Arf is a global liquidity platform that serves licensed financial institutions involved in cross-border payments. Headquartered in Zug, Switzerland, with teams in Istanbul, London, and New York, Arf is regulated in Switzerland and is a member of the VQF Self-Regulatory Organization, ensuring compliance with anti-money laundering and terrorism financing standards.

The company provides a seamless infrastructure for moving value across borders, enabling easy conversion between fiat and digital assets. Arf focuses on using real-world-asset-backed digital assets, such as stablecoins, to ensure reliability and compliance. By democratizing access to liquidity, Arf aims to enhance financial inclusion and connectivity for companies that require efficient and transparent cross-border financial services.

Short Description:
Balboa Capital is a technology-driven independent financing company based in Costa Mesa, California. Founded in 1988, it specializes in providing fast and flexible financing solutions primarily for small and medium-sized businesses across the United States. As a division of Ameris Bank since December 2021, Balboa Capital has enhanced its lending capabilities through advanced technology and expertise.

The company offers a variety of financing products, including equipment financing and leasing, small business loans, franchise financing, vendor financing programs, and working capital financing. Balboa Capital is known for its streamlined online application process, which allows for instant credit decisions and same-day funding. With multiple offices nationwide, it serves a diverse range of industries and has a strong presence in franchise and vendor financing markets. Balboa Capital is committed to delivering accessible capital to help businesses grow and manage their cash flow effectively.

Short Description:
BILL Holdings, Inc. is a San Jose, California-based company that offers a cloud-based, AI-enabled software platform aimed at simplifying and automating back-office financial operations for businesses. Founded in 2006, BILL provides software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions that focus on automating accounts payable, accounts receivable, spend management, and expense management processes.

BILL’s platform integrates with popular accounting software to enhance financial workflows, reduce manual data entry, and improve cash flow management. The company serves a wide range of industries, including small and midsize businesses, construction, healthcare, and nonprofits. Its offerings include automated invoicing and collections, integrated expense management solutions with corporate smart cards, and access to credit lines to help businesses optimize cash flow. With partnerships with over 6,000 accounting firms, BILL supports the automation of bookkeeping tasks and enhances financial management for its clients.

Branded Bills is a premium apparel company based in Mesa, Arizona, specializing in high-quality, custom-designed headwear and apparel. Founded in 2015, the company has grown from a small startup into a recognized brand in the headwear industry, known for its unique leather-patched hats that celebrate state pride and personal identity. With a focus on craftsmanship and detail, Branded Bills aims to connect with customers through products that reflect their lifestyles.

The company offers a range of products, including custom headwear featuring hand-branded leather patches representing all 50 states, as well as a broader apparel collection designed to complement their hats. Branded Bills also provides customization options, allowing customers to personalize their products. With over 130 employees and an estimated annual revenue of around $30 million, Branded Bills continues to innovate and expand its presence, including partnerships that enhance its visibility in the market.

Short Description:
In 1988, Cantsink recognized the need for competitively-priced alternative to augured concrete piers. Helical piles provide a means of evaluating the soil strength at the tip of elevation. They can be drilled to required depths by means of bolted couplings and require no additional support operations such as ready mix trucks, hole casings, or soil removal. In response to this need, Cantsink developed a pile and brackets specifically tailored to the loads encountered in residential new construction and underpinning. Cantsink offers the industry's only structural helix with radial ribs stamped into the helix. This creates more strength and rigidity and has a patent pending.

Using Cantsink helical piles for new construction gives builders a stable foundation, eliminating the need for time consuming sub walls or augured piles.

Short Description:
ChemMasters, Inc. is a third-generation family-owned company that specializes in manufacturing concrete coatings and chemicals. Their products are designed for the improvement, repair, and protection of concrete and masonry surfaces in highway, commercial, and residential markets. The product range includes concrete coatings, sealers, grouts, repair mortars, and other specialty chemicals tailored for various construction and maintenance applications.

The company operates well-known brands such as Murphy, which offers tire mounting lubricants, and Phoenix, known for pipe joint lubricant products. ChemMasters values social responsibility and fosters strong relationships with vendors and customers who share similar values. They are active members of industry organizations, including the American Concrete Institute and the International Concrete Repair Institute.

ChemMasters has pursued growth through strategic acquisitions, enhancing its geographic reach and diversifying its markets. This approach has contributed to significant revenue growth, reinforcing the company’s commitment to quality, innovation, and collaboration within the industry.

Short Description:
CompanyCam is a technology company founded in 2015, based in Lincoln, Nebraska. It specializes in a visual-first job site documentation app designed specifically for contractors in the commercial and home services industries. The company was established by a family of roofers who aimed to address the challenges of organizing and managing photos on job sites. 

The app allows contractors to capture unlimited photos, automatically tagging them with time and location data, and securely storing them in the cloud. With over 140,000 users, CompanyCam is recognized as the leading app for photo documentation and project management for contractors. It offers features such as project management tools, a before-and-after camera for showcasing transformations, and customer communication options to share updates and photo galleries. This comprehensive solution enhances communication, accountability, and customer relations for contractors, ranging from small businesses to larger companies.

Corona Tools is a respected company founded in the 1920s, specializing in the design, manufacturing, and marketing of tools for the lawn and garden, landscaping, irrigation, construction, and agricultural markets. The company offers a wide range of hand tools, including pruners, loppers, and shears, all crafted from durable steel to withstand challenging conditions. Corona Tools caters to both professional contractors and home gardeners, focusing on quality and precision in their products. With a strong retail and distribution network in the United States and Canada, Corona Tools serves a diverse customer base, including landscapers and agricultural professionals. The company is headquartered in the United Kingdom and is known for its commitment to customer satisfaction, offering a lifetime warranty on many of its tools.

Short Description:
Fortera Credit Union is a not-for-profit financial cooperative based in Clarksville, Tennessee. It serves over 78,000 members and has assets exceeding $766 million, following its merger with Life Credit Union in 2022. Fortera operates under a multiple common bond charter, allowing membership for individuals who live, worship, or attend school in its service areas, as well as their immediate family members.

The credit union offers a wide range of financial products and services, including home loans, auto loans, credit cards, money market accounts, certificates, and wealth management solutions. Fortera is committed to community involvement and member-focused service, guided by its core values known as the "Fortera Five." The organization has received recognition as a Great Place To Work® and has earned multiple local awards for its customer service and workplace excellence. Fortera continues to provide competitive dividend rates and maintain strong financial health, demonstrating its dedication to delivering value and stability to its members.

GNB Global Inc. is a manufacturer and specialty construction contractor based in Winnipeg, Manitoba, with additional facilities in Dallas, Texas. The company specializes in tension fabric buildings, providing a range of solutions for commercial, industrial, and government sectors. Their offerings include both temporary and permanent structures, designed for applications such as warehousing, data centers, and oil and gas facilities.

The company emphasizes quality and durability in its products, using materials like cold-formed seamless carbon steel and Cradle to Cradle certified HDPE membranes. GNB Global also provides maintenance and inspection services for fabric buildings, including those from other manufacturers. With a strong focus on customer service, they offer a comprehensive 16-year warranty and a five-year preventative maintenance program. GNB Global is committed to sustainability and operates with a team-oriented corporate culture, offering competitive salaries and benefits to its employees.
