Short Description:
En GRUPEX, nos consolidamos como fabricantes europeos líderes en maquinaria para la producción de bloques y piezas de concreto. Con más de tres décadas en el mercado internacional, somos el socio estratégico de confianza para empresas en más de 20 países, destacando nuestra sólida presencia en América Latina y España. 

Ofrecemos soluciones integrales llave en mano: desde el diseño de plantas bloqueras de última generación, hasta su instalación, puesta en marcha, formación y mantenimiento, garantizando siempre tecnología europea de vanguardia y acompañamiento 360.

Nuestra Propuesta de Valor:
- Calidad Superior: Diseñamos máquinas eficientes con vida útil de 20-25 años, asegurando inversión rentable y duradera.
- Componentes Europeos: Usamos piezas de líderes como Siemens, Schneider Electric, ABB para confiabilidad, mínimos fallos y rendimiento constante.
- Asesoramiento y Soporte Cercano: Acompañamos desde el análisis inicial hasta la puesta en marcha y ofrecemos soporte postventa continuo. 
- Producción Versátil: Nuestras máquinas fabrican bloques, adoquines, tabicones, bovedillas, bordillos y piezas especiales, con opciones de doble capa. 
- Costos Operativos Reducidos: Ingeniería de precisión implica un mantenimiento anual mínimo, maximizando la rentabilidad a largo plazo.
- Robustez Inigualable: Materiales y aceros de alta resistencia confieren robustez excepcional, permitiendo operar en condiciones exigentes.
- Recambios Disponibles: Stock de piezas importantes y guías detalladas aseguran la continuidad operativa.

Lo que nos Diferencia:
Nuestra ventaja competitiva reside en la combinación de durabilidad superior, mantenimiento económico, soporte técnico cercano, y la innovación constante basada en la tecnología más avanzada. En GRUPEX nos convertimos en un socio estratégico que acompaña a nuestros clientes en cada fase, garantizando su éxito y el crecimiento sostenido de sus operaciones.

Short Description:
ICC Evaluation Service (ICC-ES) is a nonprofit organization focused on the technical evaluation of building products, components, methods, and materials to ensure they meet building codes and standards. Established in 2003 through the merger of four legacy evaluation services, ICC-ES has a history of over 90 years in the industry. The organization employs a skilled team of licensed architects, professional engineers, and evaluation specialists who conduct thorough reviews of product data and test reports.

ICC-ES issues technical evaluation reports that confirm compliance with applicable code requirements, covering a wide range of products, including plumbing, mechanical, fuel gas, and green building items. The evaluation process involves manufacturers submitting applications, which are then reviewed by ICC-ES staff. The reports serve as authoritative evidence of code compliance, benefiting various stakeholders, including building regulators, manufacturers, designers, architects, contractors, and the general public. ICC-ES is accredited by multiple organizations, highlighting its recognized authority in building product evaluation both in the U.S. and internationally.

Ironwear is a specialized provider of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) with over 44 years of experience, based in Riviera Beach, Florida. The company employs around 65 people and generates approximately $17.5 million in revenue. Ironwear focuses on manufacturing high-quality, durable protective gear tailored for industrial markets, emphasizing custom solutions for specific plant applications.

The product range includes eye, hearing, foot, hand, and head protection, as well as rainwear, safety clothing, arm guards, respiratory protection, disposable safety clothing, safety vests, and steel mesh protection. Ironwear also offers customization services such as screen printing, embroidery, and private labeling, allowing clients to personalize their safety gear.

Ironwear serves a diverse customer base across major industrial markets, distributing products through a robust network of distribution companies. The company engages closely with clients to enhance product attributes and offers additional services like product engineering collaborations and site assessments to support effective safety programs. With three strategically located warehouses in the U.S., Ironwear ensures reliable product delivery.

Short Description:
L.B. White Company is a manufacturer specializing in climate control solutions, particularly heating equipment for agricultural, construction, and outdoor environments. Founded in 1952 by Lyle B. White in Onalaska, Wisconsin, the company has become a global leader in designing and manufacturing propane, natural gas, and kerosene heaters. With about 160 employees, L.B. White operates manufacturing facilities in Wisconsin and Georgia, along with offices and warehouses internationally, including in Tianjin, China.

The company offers a wide range of heating products, including forced-air heaters, radiant heaters, and indirect-fired heaters. These products cater to various applications, such as maintaining optimal temperatures in swine and poultry farming, providing portable heating solutions for construction sites, and heating tents for outdoor events. L.B. White is recognized for its commitment to quality and innovation, serving customers in the agricultural, construction, and outdoor hospitality sectors worldwide.

LED Lighting Solutions is a family-run private limited company based in Burscough, Ormskirk, England, established in 2000. The company specializes in manufacturing electric lighting equipment and has grown to become a nationally recognized brand. 

They offer turnkey LED lighting retrofit services, which include consultation, sourcing, installation, and ongoing support. These services help business and property owners enhance property value and reduce operating costs through energy savings. Their solutions aim to lower energy consumption, minimize carbon footprints, and improve safety and aesthetics in various environments, such as parking areas and commercial spaces. Short Description:
Level Best is the world's leading manufacturer of precision grading attachments. They are unequaled for creating highly precise finish grades for site preparation and maintenance. Level Best Precision Grading equipment is made in the USA to exceptionally high quality standards, and offers the broadest selection of any equipment of its type.

Level Best Precision Grading equipment is made by ATI Corporation, a veteran-owned business located in the heart of Lancaster County, Pennsylvania.

ATI Corporation developed and introduced the Preseeder® landscaping tiller in 1984, helping the landscape and site preparation industries take big steps forward in productivity. The company has made Level Best grading boxes since 1996, purchasing the product line in 2002.

Since then, the Level Best product line has grown in scope and in capability. The 40,000 square foot ATI Corporation manufacturing facility features the latest manufacturing technologies. The highly skilled ATI Corporation workforce uses these tools and technologies to produce Level Best products and systems.

Level Best is now the leading brand of laser grading equipment and systems in the construction, excavation and site preparation industries, and is specified wherever grading accuracy, speed, high production and reliability are essential.

Level Best laser grading boxes are the first choice of contractors and crews who need grade accuracy, smooth operation, machine durability, and simplicity of operation. Throughout North America Level Best products are the recognized leader in product design and technical support in high precision laser grading attachments. Level Best means fine grade made easy!

Short Description:
Life Specialty Coatings is a trusted partner to architects, consultants, and builders seeking innovative, high-performance coating systems. For over 60 years, we've specialized in manufacturing a full line of fluid-applied waterproofing, deck coatings, and energy-efficient wall coating systems tailored to meet the demands of both new construction and retrofit projects.

Our systems are engineered for durability, aesthetics, and code compliance—helping you achieve project success with long-lasting results. Whether you're specifying for multifamily, commercial, or HOA developments, our technical expertise and hands-on support ensure that every detail is covered.

Our services include:
	•	Customized product recommendation reports
	•	Product knowledge training & demos
	•	Bid walk coordination & field condition evaluations
	•	Sample submittals & architectural specs
	•	Warranty packages tailored to your scope

Our systems include:
	•	AL-Flex & AMAC Waterproofing Systems – ICC-ES evaluated and ideal for elevated decks, walkways, and balconies
	•	Cool Life® Wall Coating System – A heat-reflective exterior coating that helps reduce surface temperatures and combat the urban heat island effect
	•	Concrete & Paver Systems – Decorative and durable systems for rooftop decks and amenity spaces
	•	Under Tile Waterproofing – Reliable solutions for outdoor tiled areas
	•	Fire-Rated Assemblies – ICC-evaluated for one-hour fire resistance where required

We collaborate closely with design teams from pre-construction through post-installation to ensure performance, code compliance (including CA SB-326 & CA SB-721), and client satisfaction. With local manufacturing and dedicated reps across California and the Southwest, we respond quickly and deliver with precision.

Let's talk about how Life Specialty Coatings can support your next project with products that perform—and a team that delivers.

Short Description:
Link2Pump is a multinational technology company that specializes in fleet fuel management systems. The company automates and secures fuel dispensing, tracking, and reporting for businesses across North and South America. With origins in southern Brazil, Link2Pump has established itself as a leader in the oil and gas industry, focusing on managing fuel usage for fleets in sectors such as construction, agriculture, transportation, and landscaping.

The company provides a cloud-based fuel management system that connects directly to fuel pumps through mobile and pedestal hardware controllers. This system ensures secure fueling by requiring driver and vehicle identification before dispensing fuel. All fueling data is transmitted to a cloud portal, offering real-time analytics and detailed reporting on fuel usage, transaction history, and inventory levels. Link2Pump's technology helps businesses reduce fuel costs, prevent theft, and maximize fuel tax rebates by streamlining the traditionally complex process of fuel management. 

Headquartered in Florida, Link2Pump is committed to innovation and customer service, aiming to simplify fuel management for its clients.

Short Description:
High-Performance Dowel Bars for Your Concrete Pavement
Lightweight and easy to install. Master Dowel bars are so light it only takes ONE person to install an 11' dowel-basket!

Our custom engineered matrix resin & non-corrosive glass fibers resist all forms of corrosion.

Master Dowel bars are made to last. Our high-performance dowel bars have been tested & approved by the American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM).


Our Advantages:
Our high-performance dowel bars have been tested and approved to meet ASTM Test standards. ASTM D4475 - Short Beam Shear, ASTM D 7617 - Double Shear, ASTM D5117 Void Content, and ASTM D2584 Fiber Content.

NON-CORROSIVE
Naturally non-corrosive glass fibers and resin matrix resists all forms of corrosion, from salt to alkalinity.

LIGHTER THAN STEEL
Loose dowels are less than 1/3 the weight of steel. Complete baskets are 60% lighter than steel.

Product Information
Master Dowel offers many different sized dowels to order. We offer dowels of 1.25" and 1.50" in diameter, and dowel baskets of 1.25" x 18" x 12" OC and 1.5" x 18" x 12" OC.

ELECTROMAGNETICALLY TRANSPARENT
Invisibile to traffic sensors and other electronic equipment. Perfect for toll ways and intersections.

Short Description:
Maxxon Corporation, founded in 1972, is a leader in the floor underlayment industry with over 50 years of experience. Headquartered in Hamel, Minnesota, the company specializes in innovative flooring solutions that enhance building performance through superior underlayments, sound control, moisture protection, and restoration products.

Maxxon's product offerings include Gyp-Crete® gypsum floor underlayments, Acousti-Mat sound control systems, commercial self-leveling underlayments, moisture mitigation systems, and VenTek™ rainscreens and drain mats. These products are designed for various markets, including commercial, multifamily, single-family residential, and renovation projects. Maxxon is committed to quality and innovation, supported by rigorous field testing and a strong focus on research and development. As a trusted partner for architects, contractors, and building owners, Maxxon provides high-performance flooring solutions that prioritize fire resistance, durability, sound attenuation, and moisture protection.

Short Description:
MEVA Formwork Systems is a family-owned international company based in Haiterbach, Germany, founded in 1970 by Gerhard Dingler. The company specializes in developing, manufacturing, and supplying innovative formwork technology for concrete construction. Recognized as a pioneer in the formwork sector, MEVA is known for its safe, flexible, and cost-effective solutions that address complex construction challenges.

MEVA offers a wide range of products, including wall formwork, slab formwork, climbing formwork, shoring systems, and safety equipment. Their innovative materials, such as the alkus® all-plastic facing, enhance durability and provide high-quality concrete finishes. The company serves contractors involved in various construction projects, from residential to civil engineering, emphasizing efficiency, safety, and sustainability. With a commitment to quality and long-term customer relationships, MEVA reflects the precision of German engineering in its operations.

Short Description:
Motion is a dynamic startup and Y Combinator alum that provides an AI-driven productivity platform designed to enhance daily work planning and project management. The platform helps professionals prioritize important tasks, minimize meeting overload, and consistently meet deadlines by automatically monitoring and reorganizing to-do lists and calendars.

The flagship product is an advanced project management tool that automates task prioritization and scheduling. Unlike traditional software, Motion's AI advances projects as team members complete tasks, which helps prevent delays and idle time. This feature is particularly beneficial for cross-departmental workflows, allowing for smooth transitions without manual updates. Additionally, Motion offers customizable AI agents, known as AI Employees, that can perform various roles such as lead generation and CRM updates, all tailored to specific business needs.

With over 40,000 paying users, Motion serves a diverse customer base, including notable companies like MP Cloud, Ally Advantage, and Efficient App. The platform integrates with popular tools like Google Meet, Gmail, and Salesforce, making it a comprehensive solution for improving efficiency and reducing manual coordination in project management.

Short Description:
NITROcrete is a leading manufacturer of concrete cooling systems that use liquid nitrogen for precise temperature control. Founded in 2012, the company developed its automated cooling system through extensive research and development. This innovative solution enhances concrete quality, durability, and production efficiency, particularly in hot weather conditions.

The automated system integrates liquid nitrogen dosing with advanced technology to maintain optimal concrete temperatures. This approach streamlines batching processes, reduces labor strain, and improves worker safety by eliminating traditional ice cooling methods. NITROcrete's technology can accelerate production and shorten project durations without compromising concrete quality. Additionally, it supports sustainability by helping concrete producers reduce waste and lower carbon emissions.

NITROcrete collaborates with major industry organizations and provides comprehensive services, including system integration, management, and technical support. The company is committed to modernizing concrete cooling for the construction industry, making it a trusted partner for large concrete producers and construction companies worldwide.

Short Description:
Outdoor Retailer is a prominent U.S.-based company that organizes business events, tradeshows, and product demonstrations for the outdoor and winter sports industry. Founded in 1989 and operated by Emerald Expositions, it connects various stakeholders, including retailers, manufacturers, designers, distributors, and media professionals, facilitating face-to-face commerce and networking opportunities.

The company hosts large-scale trade events that allow industry participants to launch new products, engage in educational sessions, and collaborate on business growth. Outdoor Retailer also provides digital platforms to enhance these experiences, supporting the outdoor industry with media events and business solutions that keep brands aligned with market trends and consumer demands. 

With a focus on inclusivity, Outdoor Retailer emphasizes themes such as diversity, equity, and outdoor accessibility in its events. It works closely with the Outdoor Industry Association to promote a healthy and sustainable outdoor economy, serving a diverse community within the outdoor recreation ecosystem.

Penta Software specializes in enterprise resource planning (ERP) and construction management software tailored for specialty contractors in the construction industry. With over 50 years of experience, Penta provides scalable and customizable software solutions that enhance job costing, payroll, field service, financial management, and labor management. Their offerings aim to optimize operational efficiency and profitability for construction businesses.

As part of the JDM Technology Group, Penta has a strong commitment to customer partnerships and service. Their software includes integrated modules for job costing, field service management, financial management, payroll processing, equipment management, project management, and labor management. Penta serves a diverse range of specialty contractors, including those in concrete, mechanical, industrial, oil and gas, fire protection, electrical, utility, heavy and civil, and environmental sectors. Their solutions are designed to address the unique challenges faced by these contractors, ensuring a robust platform that supports business growth.

Short Description:
Phoenix International Holdings, Inc. is an employee-owned marine services contractor that has been operating since 1997. The company is ISO 9001:2015-certified and specializes in advanced underwater operations and engineering solutions. They offer a wide range of services, including deep ocean surveys, search and salvage, waterborne ship inspection, repair and maintenance, submarine rescue solutions, and support for offshore oil and gas infrastructure and wind farms.

With eight regional support facilities across the East, Gulf, and West Coasts of the United States, Phoenix is equipped to respond quickly to underwater needs globally. Their services utilize advanced technologies such as diving systems, Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROVs), and Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUVs). The in-house engineering division enhances their capabilities, providing innovative solutions for complex marine environments.

Phoenix serves a diverse clientele, including commercial and government sectors, with a focus on safety and operational excellence. Their notable projects include the recovery of military aircraft, deep ocean salvage operations, and forensic inspections. The company is recognized for delivering specialized underwater solutions through skilled personnel and comprehensive engineering support.

Short Description:
ProClip USA is a prominent designer, importer, and distributor of mobile device mounting solutions in North and South America. Founded in the late 1990s by CEO Bjorn Spilling, the company is based in Madison, Wisconsin. ProClip exclusively imports products from Brodit AB, a Swedish manufacturer known for its communication device mounts for vehicles.

The company focuses on providing safe and durable mounting solutions for various mobile devices used in vehicles and workplaces. ProClip's product range includes mounts and cradles for cell phones, tablets, GPS systems, and more, designed to keep devices secure and accessible. Their offerings cater to a wide array of industries, including transportation, healthcare, and public safety, and are suitable for use in diverse environments such as cars, trucks, and warehouses.

ProClip USA utilizes CNC machining with ABS and acetal polymers in its manufacturing process, allowing for customized and durable mounts. This approach supports efficient production, accommodating orders of any size while ensuring high quality and adaptability for demanding conditions.

Short Description:
Surface Shields is a prominent American manufacturer of high-quality temporary surface protection products. The company specializes in solutions such as floor and carpet protection films, dust containment systems, and a variety of adhesive tapes. Founded to support jobsite professionals, Surface Shields designs durable products that meet the needs of construction, painting, flooring, abatement, moving, automotive, and marine industries.

Headquartered in Tinley Park, Illinois, Surface Shields oversees product innovation, manufacturing, quality control, and customer support. As part of Trimaco and CSW Industrials, the company benefits from extensive manufacturing and distribution networks, primarily serving customers across North America, including the United States and Canada. Their flagship products include Builder Board™ for floor protection, Carpet Shield for carpets, and a range of dust containment kits and adhesive tapes tailored for various industrial applications. Surface Shields is committed to delivering reliable protection solutions that help professionals safeguard valuable surfaces during their projects.

Short Description:
Reebok is a global athletic footwear and apparel company with a rich history dating back to 1895 in Bolton, England. Originally founded as J.W. Foster and Sons by Joseph William Foster, the company gained recognition when its shoes were worn by British athletes at the 1924 Paris Summer Olympics. In 1958, it was renamed Reebok, inspired by the African gazelle, symbolizing speed and agility.

Reebok offers a diverse range of high-quality performance footwear, athletic apparel, and accessories. The brand is known for its innovative running shoes and fitness footwear, including the first athletic shoe designed specifically for women in the early 1980s. Reebok caters to athletes, fitness enthusiasts, and casual consumers, emphasizing performance and style in its marketing. The company has a strong presence in various sports and fitness activities, including training, running, and CrossFit. Acquired by adidas in 2005, Reebok continues to maintain its distinct identity while being part of a larger global sportswear portfolio.

Short Description:
Rubbl is an online heavy equipment rental marketplace that connects equipment owners with contractors and companies in need of machinery. With over 30 years of experience in the industry, Rubbl operates worldwide, focusing on maximizing equipment utilization by allowing owners to lease idle machinery and generate rental income. 

The platform offers a fully transactional marketplace where equipment owners can list their machinery and set rental rates, while renters can easily browse and rent equipment. Rubbl manages the entire rental process, including logistics, insurance, maintenance, and repair services, providing a turn-key solution for contractors and independent rental shops. The company also facilitates additional service opportunities for equipment owners who can provide transportation or maintenance services. 

Headquartered in Houston, Texas, Rubbl serves professional contractors, independent rental shops, and equipment dealers, offering a convenient digital marketplace for efficient equipment rental. The company emphasizes safety and reliability through a thorough approval process for both owners and renters.

Short Description:
Safety-Reports is a SaaS company formed in 2011, and we're headquartered in Colorado.  We specialize in building and maintaining mobile safety solutions for all types of industries, including, Construction and General Industry.  Our apps have also become an invaluable tool for Loss Control Representatives in the Insurance Industry as well as Safety Consultants who provide third party services.

Our first product on the market was our Inspection App and we've since added several new products to include: Toolbox Talk App, JSA App, Observation App, Incident App, Scan App, and PrecipAlert.

Our philosophy is to build ‘simple' apps in order to minimize the learning curve and maximize usage.  We know that if the app is too difficult or complex to use, implementation and buy-in at the user level will be lacking and you'll never fully achieve the benefits of a mobile solution.  Keeping our app interface simple helps our customers overcome this implementation challenge.

While our apps are simple to use, the data is comprehensive and meaningful.  Our customers use this data to help drive safety improvement.  We take great pride in knowing that the data collected using our applications help make workplaces safer and more compliant!

Above all else, we work on providing reliable and timely service and support and if you read our reviews online, you'll see that we constantly succeed in this important area.  We take great pride in the service we provide and the relationships we build with our subscribers.

If you want to work with a U.S. based company, get quality products that are simple to use at a reasonable price, receive timely and reliable service and support, look no further!  Safety Reports is the solution for you!

Short Description:
Shop Vac USA, LLC, also known as Shop-Vac Corporation, is an American company that specializes in the development, manufacturing, and distribution of wet/dry vacuum cleaners and related accessories. Founded in 1953, the company is headquartered in Williamsport, Pennsylvania, where it operates a large facility for manufacturing, assembly, and warehousing.

Shop-Vac offers a diverse range of products, including wet/dry vacuum cleaners for household and industrial use, various filters, replacement parts, sawdust collection systems, air cleaning systems, and air movers. The company has a history of innovation, such as introducing a pump vacuum in 1998 designed to remove water from flooded areas. Shop-Vac serves a wide customer base, including individual consumers, workshops, industrial users, and retailers, and also produces private-labeled vacuums for well-known brands. With revenues in the hundreds of millions and a significant workforce, Shop-Vac is a key player in the vacuum cleaner industry.

Short Description:
Simpson Strong-Tie is a global manufacturer specializing in structural building products and solutions. Founded in 1956 in Oakland, California, the company started with the creation of metal joist hangers to enhance the security of wood framing. Over the years, it has grown into a leader in the construction industry, offering a wide range of products including structural connectors, fasteners, and anchors for wood, steel, and concrete construction.

Headquartered in Pleasanton, California, Simpson Strong-Tie operates on six continents and is publicly traded. The company is known for its commitment to engineering excellence and rigorous product testing, ensuring that its offerings meet or exceed building code requirements. Its extensive product line includes wood connectors, structural fasteners, and solutions for steel and concrete applications. Additionally, the company provides engineering resources and technical support to assist construction professionals in effectively using its products. Simpson Strong-Tie serves a diverse customer base, including builders, architects, and construction professionals involved in various projects worldwide.

Short Description:
SMC Corporation of America is a prominent provider of pneumatic technology and automation solutions, catering to industrial customers worldwide. Headquartered in Noblesville, Indiana, the company has been active in the U.S. market since 1972 and is part of a global organization with a presence in over 81 countries. With approximately 1,160 employees, SMC operates 23 sales offices and more than 100 distributors across the nation, ensuring robust customer service.

The company offers a wide range of products, including actuators, directional control valves, airline preparation equipment, vacuum components, and electric actuators. These products are designed to enhance industrial automation, improve efficiency, and reduce labor costs. SMC serves various industries, including automotive, electronics, food and beverage, and pharmaceuticals, focusing on innovative solutions that minimize resource consumption. Recognized as a US Best Managed Company for four consecutive years, SMC is dedicated to delivering quality products and exceptional customer support while promoting sustainability in its operations.
Subsidiary of: SMC Corporation Australia and New Zealand (smcanz.com)

Short Description:
Sonoco Products Company is a global leader in diversified consumer packaging, industrial products, protective packaging, and packaging supply chain services. Founded in 1899 in Hartsville, South Carolina, the company has grown into a multi-billion-dollar enterprise with around 28,000 employees across more than 300 facilities in over 33 countries, serving customers in over 85 nations.

Sonoco operates through four main segments: Consumer Packaging, which includes rigid paper and flexible packaging; Industrial Converted Products, known for producing tubes and cores; Protective Packaging, offering custom-engineered solutions; and Display and Packaging Services, which enhances brand visibility. The company emphasizes sustainability and innovation, reflecting its commitment to responsible business practices. Sonoco also engages in philanthropic efforts through the Sonoco Foundation, supporting various community initiatives. Headquartered in Hartsville, Sonoco is South Carolina's largest corporation by sales and is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange.

Short Description:
SOPREMA USA is the North American subsidiary of SOPREMA, an international company founded in 1908 in Strasbourg, France. The company specializes in innovative building materials, focusing on waterproofing, insulation, soundproofing, and vegetated roofing solutions. Its U.S. headquarters and manufacturing plant are located in Wadsworth, Ohio, where it produces high-performance SBS-modified bitumen roofing membranes.

SOPREMA USA offers a wide range of building envelope solutions, including waterproofing membranes, liquid-applied roofing products, insulation materials, and green roof systems. The company emphasizes innovation and sustainability, supported by extensive research and development efforts across its global centers. SOPREMA also provides training to ensure proper installation and performance of its products, making it a key player in the North American market for advanced construction solutions.

Stegmeier LLC, founded in 1968 by Bill Stegmeier, specializes in manufacturing products for the decorative concrete and swimming pool industries. The company is known for its market-driven design approach, focusing on high-quality, user-friendly products that enhance productivity and profitability for distributors and end customers. 

With manufacturing and shipping locations across the United States, including Arlington, Texas, and Henderson, Nevada, Stegmeier ensures efficient transportation and economical freight options. The company emphasizes strong partnerships with distributors, architects, designers, contractors, and installers, supported by a live technical support team available during business hours to assist with installation and product inquiries. 

Stegmeier offers a comprehensive product line, including profile forms, drainage systems, expansion and control joints, and renovation items. Their commitment to exceptional customer service and a broad distribution network allows them to effectively serve a diverse customer base in the construction industry.

Short Description:
Stepup Scaffold is a manufacturer, importer, and distributor of scaffolding and access equipment, established in 1998 in Memphis, Tennessee. As a division of Sunshine Enterprises, the company has developed a strong presence in North America, Latin America, and the United Kingdom over more than two decades. With multiple distribution centers, including six warehouses in the U.S. and Canada, as well as facilities in Medellín and Scotland, Stepup Scaffold employs approximately 382 people and generates annual revenue of around $13.1 million.

The company offers a full line of scaffolding products and access equipment tailored to meet the needs of various sectors, including construction, building finishing, and heavy civil engineering. Stepup Scaffold emphasizes quality and customer satisfaction, providing warehousing, distribution, and support services to ensure timely delivery of products. Their extensive distribution network allows them to effectively serve a diverse customer base involved in residential and nonresidential construction, infrastructure projects, and more.

Short Description:
Strong Man Safety Products Corp, established in 1974 and based in Pompton Plains, New Jersey, is a prominent manufacturer and distributor of safety and building products. The company focuses on weather, containment, and debris enclosures tailored for construction and industrial applications. Their product range includes debris and scaffold netting, tarps for snow removal and demolition, vapor barriers, reinforced polyethylene sheeting, and various safety nets and screens.

The company is known for its efficient order processing and shipping, ensuring that most orders received before 2 PM EST are dispatched the same day from multiple distribution centers. This capability helps minimize worker downtime and supports contractors in managing project costs effectively. Strong Man Safety Products emphasizes practical safety solutions and maintains a large inventory to meet diverse jobsite needs.

In 2024, Strong Man was acquired by PearlWeave Netting Corp but continues to operate independently. The company serves construction professionals, contractors, and distributors, reinforcing its commitment to partnership and service excellence in providing reliable safety products.

Short Description:
Threaded Fasteners, Inc. (TFI) is an employee-owned manufacturer and distributor of high-quality steel fasteners and building materials, established in 1979 in Mobile, Alabama. The company has expanded significantly and now operates 22 facilities across nine states, including Alabama, Florida, Georgia, Mississippi, Oklahoma, Tennessee, and Texas. 

TFI specializes in a variety of fastener products, such as nuts, bolts, washers, and anchor bolts. They also produce specialty headed products and have a dedicated plant for galvanizing their products to enhance corrosion protection. TFI serves a diverse range of customers, from large industrial accounts to small businesses, and is committed to excellent customer service. Their products play a vital role in various industries, including construction and utility towers, ensuring structural integrity and safety. 

As an employee-owned company since 2006, TFI promotes a culture of dedication among its more than 350 employee-owners, with a mission to create value for the people they serve.

Short Description:
Tsurumi America, Inc. is the North American subsidiary of Tsurumi Manufacturing Co., Ltd., a leader in pump technology since 1924. Established in 1979, Tsurumi America focuses on the U.S. market, supported by a network of experienced dealers and distributors.

The company specializes in designing, manufacturing, and distributing durable submersible pumps and pumping systems. Their products are engineered for demanding applications, including construction dewatering, mining, wastewater treatment, and industrial fluid handling. Tsurumi pumps are recognized for their reliability in efficiently moving water and other fluids, even in challenging conditions.

Tsurumi America offers a range of submersible pumps, including those designed for construction, sewage, and industrial processes. Their product line features pumps with solid handling impellers, automatic float-type pumps, and models with dry-type motors for enhanced safety. The company is committed to engineering excellence, accessible inventory, and exceptional customer service, providing tailored water solutions for municipalities, industries, and residential users.

Short Description:
Twiceme Technology is a Swedish company founded in 2016/2017 that specializes in wearable safety technology. Their mission is to empower individuals and professionals in sports and industrial sectors by transforming bystanders into helpers during emergencies. The company promotes the philosophy "Helping is Human," encouraging people to act instinctively to assist others.

Twiceme develops smart safety solutions that integrate into personal protective equipment (PPE) and sports gear, such as helmets and jackets. Their technology securely stores critical safety information, including medical data and GPS coordinates, which can be accessed instantly via NFC-enabled devices. The company offers a comprehensive safety platform focused on accident prevention and emergency recovery, featuring tools for monitoring equipment health and enhancing emergency response. Their Help the Helper (HTH) Technology is embedded in products from leading global brands, enhancing safety and value.

Twiceme serves sports practitioners and industrial workers, as well as B2B clients who integrate their technology into safety equipment. The company aims to set a global standard for safety technology, making safety accessible and actionable worldwide.

The New Driving Force in the Fastener Industry!

Universal screw - Ideal for replacing those old deck screws. The Universal screw's features work together to drive and secure this screw in many types of materials that are used in residential construction.

Urethane Polymers International, Inc. (UPI) is a manufacturer and distributor of high-performance waterproofing and flooring products, established in 1971. The company specializes in advanced polymeric systems, including polyurethane, hybrid polyurea, acrylic, and epoxy coatings. These products create durable, watertight barriers over various surfaces, protecting them from impact, abrasion, and deterioration.

UPI operates a state-of-the-art facility in Fontana, California, and adheres to strict environmental standards. The company offers eco-friendly solutions, including LEED® qualifying products and low VOC systems. Their product portfolio features waterproofing and flooring solutions marketed under brand names like Tufflex and Excellent Coatings, suitable for a wide range of applications in commercial, industrial, residential, and public sector projects.

In addition to manufacturing, UPI provides expert assistance in product selection, specification writing, and project planning. Their experienced staff supports architects, specifiers, consultants, and contractors to ensure the proper application and long-term performance of their systems. UPI is committed to quality, innovation, and sustainability in the construction industry.

Short Description:
V-ROD Fiberglass Rebar offers a corrosion-resistant composite reinforcement solution designed to replace traditional steel rebar in concrete structures. Manufactured by Pultrall Inc., V-ROD rebar is made from high-strength glass fibers embedded in a vinyl ester resin matrix, providing superior tensile strength and durability. It is distributed worldwide through authorized distributors, including Vector Corrosion.

The company provides a complete range of composite rebars suitable for various applications, including transportation, tunnels, building structures, marine environments, water treatment facilities, and more. Key features of V-ROD fiberglass rebar include its lightweight nature, high tensile strength, and resistance to corrosion in harsh environments. It is also non-staining, thermally compatible with concrete, and recognized for its sustainability advantages. V-ROD rebar is marketed as a cost-effective alternative to steel, offering long-term performance and reduced maintenance for infrastructure projects.

Velocitor Solutions is an enterprise mobility and software development firm founded in 1999. The company specializes in mobile SaaS and fleet management solutions, focusing on enhancing field service, fleet, and asset management operations across various industries, including transportation, logistics, and direct store delivery.

The company offers a wide range of products and services, including mobile software solutions for iOS, Android, and Windows Mobile, a middleware server with integration capabilities, and cloud solutions designed to boost productivity and customer service. Velocitor's fleet management platform utilizes IoT technology and real-time telematics to optimize fleet performance and safety. Additional offerings include mobile asset management, remote device monitoring, and project management services.

Operating primarily in the United States, Velocitor Solutions serves clients with field forces ranging from 50 to over 10,000 mobile users. The company has established strategic partnerships with major technology and telecommunications firms, positioning itself as a trusted partner for organizations seeking to improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction through advanced mobile and cloud technologies.

Vector Fleet Management, LLC is a national fleet maintenance provider based in Charlotte, North Carolina, with over 36 years of experience. The company offers customized and cost-effective fleet maintenance and parts management programs for both private and government fleets, including municipalities, hospitals, universities, and utility companies.

Their core services encompass comprehensive fleet maintenance, parts management, and strategic tire maintenance. Vector Fleet Management focuses on reducing operational costs, enhancing service quality, and extending equipment lifespan. They utilize advanced fleet management information systems and skilled personnel to deliver high-quality results and exceptional customer service. The company is dedicated to safety and contract compliance while continuously innovating to meet industry demands.

Vector Fleet Management is committed to improving cost efficiency and operational effectiveness for its clients, allowing them to concentrate on their core business activities.

Short Description:
VIBCO Vibrators is a U.S.-based manufacturer of industrial and construction vibratory equipment, founded in 1962 in Sparta, New Jersey. Now headquartered in Wyoming, Rhode Island, the company has evolved from a small startup to a leader in vibration technology. VIBCO designs, manufactures, and markets a wide range of products, including electric, pneumatic, and hydraulic vibrators, as well as vibratory plate compactors, vibrating tables, air cannons, and vibratory rollers.

The company emphasizes low maintenance, durability, and innovation in its offerings. VIBCO's product line features silent pneumatic turbine vibrators, pneumatic piston and ball vibrators, and various electric models. With a commitment to quality and fast delivery, VIBCO often ships products the same or next day. Under the leadership of Karl Wadensten, the company has adopted Lean manufacturing principles, enhancing productivity and achieving a 99% on-time delivery rate. VIBCO serves a diverse customer base across numerous industrial sectors, including notable applications in the Apollo lunar module.

Short Description:
Sound Transit, officially known as the Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority, is a public transit agency based in Seattle, Washington. Established in 1993, it serves the Seattle metropolitan area, including Pierce, King, and Snohomish counties. The agency plans, builds, and operates a multimodal transit network that includes express buses, light rail, and commuter trains, aiming to provide safe and efficient transportation options for millions of riders each year.

The agency operates the Link light rail system, Sounder commuter rail, and Sound Transit Express bus services. With a focus on expanding transit infrastructure, Sound Transit is undertaking the largest mass transit expansion in the region's history, planning to grow its light rail network to 116 miles by 2040. The agency also participates in the ORCA card system, facilitating seamless fare payments across different transit services. Sound Transit employs around 1,000 people and emphasizes innovation, equity, and sustainability in its operations.

Short Description:
HortiLed.EliteGrow specializes in manufacturing and exporting high-quality indoor LED grow light solutions for the horticultural industry. Since 2013, as a daughter brand of Laite E-Commerce, EliteGrow has focused on providing flexible and customized grow light systems tailored to the needs of small- to medium-sized horticultural businesses.

The company develops a range of LED grow lights designed for various indoor horticulture settings, including shelves and growing chambers. Their products are CE and RoHS certified, ensuring compliance with European safety and environmental standards. EliteGrow collaborates closely with botanical experts to create optimal lighting solutions, offering custom designs based on specific client requirements. They also provide installation support and year-round assistance to ensure proper setup and performance. Their cost-effective grow lights are priced around 150-200 yuan per square meter, making them accessible for clients looking to enhance their indoor plant growth.

Short Description:
Con-Tech Manufacturing, Inc. is a privately owned company based in Dodge Center, Minnesota, specializing in the production of concrete mixers. Founded in 2006, the company focuses on serving the ready mix concrete industry with high-quality mixers and components that emphasize performance, reliability, and ease of use.

The product range includes concrete mixer trucks and various parts such as pump rings, speed sensors, and quick exhaust valves. Con-Tech's customer-centric manufacturing process allows for customization to meet specific client needs. The company also accepts trade-ins of used equipment and maintains a large inventory of mixer chassis in various brands and configurations.

With a team of experienced professionals averaging over 25 years in the industry, Con-Tech is committed to meeting the demands of top producers across North America. The company values responsiveness and flexibility, enabling on-the-fly product adjustments. Customers are invited to visit the factory to meet the team and observe the manufacturing process.

Short Description:
Concrefiber is a Brazilian company based in Sorocaba, São Paulo, specializing in the production and supply of structural synthetic fibers and reinforcements for concrete. Since its establishment in 2007, the company has developed a diverse product line that includes structural macrofibers, microfibers, surface hardeners, shrinkage reducers, silica fume, chemical curing agents, and waterproofing solutions. 

The company focuses on technology, sustainability, and cost-efficiency, ensuring that its products meet both Brazilian and international standards through rigorous quality control and testing. Concrefiber serves the construction civil sector, particularly in urban concrete pavements, and has the capacity to supply its products efficiently across Brazil and internationally. Additionally, Concrefiber offers technical support to help clients choose the best fiber solutions for their projects, enhancing concrete performance and project outcomes.

Short Description:
Cortec Corporation is a global leader in corrosion protection technologies, founded in 1977 by Boris Miksic. The company specializes in Vapor phase Corrosion Inhibitor (VpCI®) and Migrating Corrosion Inhibitor (MCI®) technologies, providing environmentally friendly solutions to combat corrosion across various industries.

Cortec offers a comprehensive range of products, including corrosion inhibitors, protection fluids and coatings, adhesives, metalworking fluids, and packaging materials designed to prevent corrosion. With over 400 products and more than 60 patents, Cortec emphasizes research and development. The company operates the first ISO/IEC-17025 accredited laboratory in the corrosion protection industry, providing advanced testing services.

Cortec serves diverse industries such as manufacturing, construction, automotive, and aerospace. With nine manufacturing plants and a distribution network in over 100 countries, Cortec ensures accessibility and localized support for its customers, backed by dedicated technical support teams in regions like Europe and Asia.

Short Description:
DeFelsko Corporation is a family-owned manufacturer based in Ogdensburg, New York, specializing in coating thickness gauges and inspection instruments since 1965. The company operates a modern facility that combines research, development, manufacturing, quality control, sales, and service. DeFelsko is known for producing simple, durable, and accurate instruments tailored for industrial applications.

Their product range includes over 70 models of inspection instruments, featuring innovations like the first combination ferrous/non-ferrous gauge and a handheld ultrasonic coating thickness gauge for non-metal surfaces. The PosiTector series, which includes the flagship PosiTest mechanical pull-off gauge, is recognized for its ruggedness and precision. DeFelsko also manufactures digital hardness testers compliant with Shore and Barcol scales.

DeFelsko serves a diverse customer base in industries such as manufacturing, construction, automotive, and aerospace. The company is committed to customer service, providing expert support and a 30-day money-back guarantee on their products. They actively participate in industry organizations to promote advancements in coating inspection standards.

Short Description:
ecoFINISH® High Performance Coatings is the world's largest, and fastest growing manufacturer of polymer coatings. Our pneumatically applied high performance thermal plastic coatings have their own patented installation system, and eliminates most shortcomings found in other industrial and aquatic coatings. From our aquaBRIGHT and polyFIBRO for aquatic coatings, to our ecoDUSTRIAL coatings for industrial use, ecoFINISH has a finish that is right for your needs.

aquaBRIGHT is a Thermal Plastic Coating that is applied pneumatically. The raw material is in a dry powder form that is propelled through a gun-type applicator and heated onto the pool surface. The material dries almost instantaneously. The Thermal Spray applicator was specifically designed to produce a polymeric coating using our aquaBRIGHT thermal plastic powder. The finishes are easily applied with our proven installation methods and the end result is a smooth and durable astoundingly beautiful finish, that will last for many years to come.

aquaBRIGHT™ is the swimming pool finish of the future

Short Description:
EFCO Forming & Shoring Solutions is a privately held, employee-owned company based in Des Moines, Iowa. Founded in 1934, EFCO specializes in high-quality concrete forming and shoring products for construction projects around the globe. The company operates manufacturing facilities in Des Moines and Georgetown, Ontario, and has a presence in 12 countries. Scott Walter, the great-grandson of the founder, currently serves as president and CEO.

EFCO offers a wide range of formwork and shoring solutions tailored for various concrete construction projects, including high-rise buildings, bridges, and industrial infrastructure. Their products are designed to optimize construction schedules and enhance concrete finishes. The company’s engineering team is known for addressing complex concrete forming challenges, providing project-specific designs and on-site support. EFCO also features EFCO ONLINE, a platform for customers to order products anytime, and the Concrete Construction and Forming Institute, which offers training for the future workforce in concrete construction. With around 1,200 employees and annual revenues exceeding $300 million, EFCO is a trusted partner in the construction industry.

Short Description:
For people who want to breathe the outdoors, yet want access to big city amenities, Elk River is an emerging small city where the Elk and Mississippi Rivers flow together on the fringe of the Twin Cities and where the heart is powered by its nature so you are energized and inspired to make a difference.

The City of Elk River is located just 35 miles northwest of Minneapolis - St. Paul on the Mississippi River and is the county seat of Sherburne County. The city covers an area of 44 square miles which makes it one of the largest land based cities in the state. Elk River is home to more than 23,000 residents and is comprised of residential, commercial, retail, and industrial businesses. The city continues to develop while at the same time retains its historical perspective and small town flavor. Highways 10, 169, 101 and nearby Interstate 94 provide fast and easy access to the greater metropolitan area of the twin cities. Elk River received the designation of "Energy City" by the Minnesota Environmental Initiative in October of 1997 and in 2008 was designated as a Minnesota Energy City by the State Legislature.

Short Description:
FARO Technologies, Inc. is a global leader in advanced three-dimensional (3D) measurement, imaging, and realization solutions. Founded in 1981, the company initially focused on medical measurement devices before expanding into industrial manufacturing. Headquartered in Lake Mary, Florida, FARO operates over 25 offices worldwide and serves a diverse range of industries, including manufacturing, construction, law enforcement, and aerospace.

FARO offers a wide array of products, including laser trackers, laser scanners, coordinate measurement machines, and 3D software solutions. These tools enable precise 3D inspections, enhance quality control, and improve productivity. The company also provides repair and maintenance services, as well as inspection services utilizing its measurement technologies. FARO is committed to bridging the digital and physical worlds, helping customers make informed, data-driven decisions.

Short Description:
ForgeFX Simulations is a custom software development company founded in 2001/2002, specializing in interactive 3D training simulation software. The company creates immersive training solutions using virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and mixed reality (MR) technologies. Their focus is on developing mixed reality training simulators and digital twins, which are detailed digital replicas of products and processes integrated with training curricula.

Based in San Francisco, California, ForgeFX offers a range of services including the custom development of interactive training simulators, virtual and augmented reality applications, and machine learning development. Their solutions cater to various industries such as national defense, healthcare, and construction, aiming to improve operational efficiency and enhance knowledge retention. With a small team of fewer than 25 employees, ForgeFX is dedicated to advancing workforce training methodologies through innovative technology and client collaboration.

Short Description:
General Vision Services (GVS) is a prominent administrator of vision care programs, primarily operating in the Northeast and tri-state region of the United States. With over 60 years of experience, GVS serves 2 to 3 million members annually, including unions, HMOs, corporations, and insurance eyecare plans. The company specializes in providing comprehensive vision care plans as an Eyecare Benefits Administrator and Preferred Provider Organization (PPO).

GVS offers a range of services, including the management of vision care and hearing programs, with access to two national provider networks. These networks consist of optometrists, ophthalmologists, opticians, and major retail providers, ensuring members have convenient access to high-quality eye care and eyewear at competitive prices. GVS also emphasizes the importance of regular eye exams for ocular wellness and overall health monitoring.

In addition to its core services, GVS partners with RestoringVision to donate a pair of glasses for every member who uses their vision benefits, addressing the global challenge of uncorrected vision impairment. This initiative aims to improve access to eyewear and enhance the quality of life for disadvantaged individuals worldwide.

Short Description:
Hendrickson is a global leader in designing and manufacturing suspension systems and components for medium- and heavy-duty commercial vehicles. Founded in 1913 in Chicago, the company initially produced trucks with cranes before gaining recognition for its innovative tandem truck suspension in 1926. This design improved load distribution, traction, and ride quality.

Today, Hendrickson focuses on a wide range of products, including tandem and single-axle suspensions, air suspensions, auxiliary lift axle systems, and proprietary axle systems like INTRAAX® and VANTRAAX®. The company also offers leaf springs, stabilizers, and metal bumpers, all aimed at enhancing vehicle safety and performance. Hendrickson serves a diverse customer base in the commercial trucking and transportation sectors, supplying original equipment manufacturers and aftermarket customers worldwide. With manufacturing and R&D facilities across multiple continents, Hendrickson continues its legacy of innovation and commitment to the transportation industry.

Short Description:
KAESER KOMPRESSOREN is a family-owned company based in Coburg, Germany, founded in 1919. Initially a mechanical engineering workshop, it transitioned to focus on compressed air technology after World War II. The company is recognized for its pioneering rotary screw compressors, particularly the energy-efficient "SIGMA Profile" rotor design introduced in 1975. 

KAESER offers a wide range of products, including reciprocating compressors, rotary screw compressors, vacuum pumps, and compressor control systems. Their compressors cater to various industrial applications, with power ratings from 0.18 kW to 515 kW. The company operates major production facilities in Germany and employs around 8,000 people globally, with a presence in over 140 countries. In 2023, KAESER reported a turnover of approximately EUR 1.6 billion, highlighting its position as a leading supplier of compressed air systems and solutions.

Short Description:
KIOTI Tractor is the North American brand of Daedong Corporation, a South Korean agricultural machinery manufacturer founded in 1947. Headquartered in Daegu, South Korea, Daedong has a rich history in agricultural equipment, producing Korea's first engine, plow, tractor, and combine harvester. KIOTI USA was established in 1993, with its North American headquarters in Wendell, North Carolina, featuring a parts service and fulfillment center.

KIOTI offers a wide range of agricultural and utility machinery, including over 40 tractor models from 22 to 110 horsepower, zero-turn mowers, and utility vehicles like the MECHRON and K9 series. The company also provides various attachments and implements, such as loaders, backhoes, and rotary cutters. KIOTI serves a diverse customer base, including farmers, landscapers, and construction professionals, and is committed to innovation, continuously updating its product offerings to meet customer needs.

Short Description:
Labsurface develops, manufactures and sell a comprehensive line of flooring products for concrete applications. We focus on providing world-class quality products, unparalleled technical service and product customization to our clients. Our R&D team and industry specialists work diligently to offer customized solutions to clients looking to improve ease of installation and/or floor system properties. We operate in a 10,000 sq. ft. manufacturing plant equipped with high volume production equipment.

Our product lines display superior mechanical and chemical properties as well as an unmatched aesthetic finish. We pride ourselves on providing state-of-the-art products designed for the toughest environments and offered at very competitive prices. The main focus of our R&D team is to develop high performance products that are user and environment friendly. Short Description:
Linxup is a provider of SaaS-based GPS telematics and tracking solutions, founded in 2004 and headquartered in Saint Louis, Missouri. The company focuses on delivering user-friendly fleet management and safety monitoring solutions for small and medium-sized businesses across North America. Linxup serves over 43,000 customers, including more than 30,000 businesses with fleets ranging from 1 to 100 vehicles.

Linxup offers a comprehensive suite of GPS tracking services, including fleet tracking for real-time vehicle location monitoring, personal tracking for individuals and assets, vehicle tracking for usage and status, dash cameras for driver safety, asset and equipment tracking, and electronic logging devices for compliance with hours-of-service regulations. The company combines advanced hardware with intuitive software to simplify fleet management tasks, providing transparent pricing and live, US-based customer support. Linxup's solutions help businesses reduce operational costs, enhance safety, and improve fleet efficiency.

Short Description:
Marshalltown is a family-owned manufacturer based in Marshalltown, Iowa, with a history dating back to 1890. Originally a small machine shop, it has grown into one of the largest manufacturers of masonry tools globally. The company employs around 700 people and operates nearly one million square feet of manufacturing and office space, including a significant subsidiary in Fayetteville, Arkansas.

Marshalltown offers an extensive catalog of approximately 7,000 products, focusing on masonry and construction tools. Its product range includes hand tools like trowels and finishing tools, power tools with safety features, and specialized metalworking machinery. The company also markets a "Quality Line Tools" brand, providing quality tools at competitive prices. Serving professional contractors and builders, Marshalltown distributes its products across the United States, Canada, and internationally, backed by a strong reputation for quality and innovation.

Short Description:
Minnich Manufacturing is an industry leader in the production of Dowel Pin Drills, Concrete Paving Vibrators and Vibrator Monitoring Systems. Our Concrete Vibrator line includes such products as Hydraulic Internal Vibrators, Electric Flex Shaft Vibrators, Gasoline Driven Flex Shaft Vibrators, High Cycle Vibrators, High Cycle Generators, Hydraulic External Vibrators, and Internal Pneumatic Vibrators. Minnich also produces the Auto Vibe vibrator monitoring system. Our Concrete Dowel Pin Drills include Pneumatic Drills, Hydraulic Drills and many Special Application Drills made to your specifications. Product Schools are also offered for all products upon requested.

Minnich Manufacturing has a rich history, and we are grateful for our people who have been a part of that history — they have been a consistent factor throughout a multitude of changes. Roger Minnich founded the company in 1968. The Minnich family takes pride in the private, family-run business today. We focus on trust and producing high-quality, long-lasting products, along with providing around-the-clock customer service.

In 2018, Minnich will celebrate its 50th anniversary and transition to the third generation of the family-owned business. The future looks bright, thanks to increased product market share and our dedication to innovative product engineering. Minnich is in position to succeed in the industry for generations to come.

Short Description:
National Polymers Inc. is a private label manufacturer of industrial floor/roof coatings and concrete repair products.

Our product line includes epoxy coatings, urethane and polyaspartic topcoats, novolacs, ESD systems, concrete restoration products, traffic deck systems, roof coatings, densifiers, sealers, and a variety of crack fillers, joint sealants and maintenance type products.
However, NPI is more than just a product... we provide services and solutions for building your business. Our private label program provides your company the distinction it deserves and recognition it requires to succeed in today's competitive market place.
The philosophy behind our success is the success we create for you. For a time spanning three decades, National Polymers has been manufacturing private label flooring, roofing and concrete restoration products. Not only do we provide high quality products, we also offer the tools and support you need to help your business flourish. Our services and offerings are more unique than that of other manufacturers. Our products are sold with your label on them; we never market finished products with our brand name in place.  
With over three decades of experience in the private label industrial coatings marketplace, we have seen many of our private label accounts flourish into multi-million dollar nationally recognized brands. Our private label brands have been sold and installed in millions of facilities across the globe.  Although it's not our brand name on the bucket, we stand behind every product we sell.

Short Description:
Nexa Autocolor Iberia is a prominent brand in the vehicle refinishing paint industry, part of the global Nexa Autocolor brand owned by PPG Industries. With a history dating back to 1925, it operates in over 147 countries, including Spain and Portugal. The brand is known for its innovative paint technologies, such as the introduction of 2K® paint systems and AQUABASE®, the first waterborne basecoat.

The company specializes in a wide range of refinishing products, including primers, basecoats, toners, and clearcoats, designed for high-production collision centers. Nexa Autocolor also offers advanced color identification tools and extensive training programs to enhance bodyshop quality and productivity. Its products are trusted by professional bodyshops and recommended by leading car manufacturers, reflecting its strong reputation in the industry.

Short Description:
Ozinga is a family-owned American company founded in 1928 in Evergreen Park, Illinois. Originally a coal and coke yard, it has transformed into a leading supplier of ready mix concrete, aggregate materials, energy solutions, and logistics services, primarily serving the Midwest. The company has a rich history, having transitioned to ready mix concrete production in the early 1950s and becoming one of the first providers in the Chicago area.

Ozinga's ready mix concrete has been used in significant construction projects, including Soldier Field and Wrigley Field. The company also supplies essential aggregate materials and energy products, continuing its legacy from its coal origins. With a diverse transportation fleet, including barges and signature red and white striped mixer trucks, Ozinga ensures efficient delivery and supply chain management for its customers, which include contractors, developers, and municipal projects across Illinois and Indiana.

The company is committed to family values, community engagement, and sustainability. Under the leadership of the fourth generation since 2012, Ozinga focuses on integrating technology and green initiatives to adapt to industry demands while maintaining a strong connection to its roots.

Short Description:
Marlin Capital Solutions, now known as PEAC Solutions, is a nationwide financing company based in Mount Laurel, New Jersey. Founded in 1997, the company specializes in lending solutions for small businesses, focusing on equipment financing and working capital loans. Following its acquisition by HPS Investment Partners in July 2022, it has become the world’s largest independent equipment financing provider.

PEAC Solutions offers two main financial products. Equipment financing provides small-ticket loans ranging from $5,000 to $250,000 for purchasing or leasing business equipment, with flexible payment plans and options for delayed payments. Working capital loans can go up to $500,000, with terms up to 24 months, supporting various business needs such as expansion, inventory, and marketing. The company emphasizes a customer-focused underwriting approach, aiming to help clients improve their financial situations and achieve their business goals.

Short Description:
PermitFlow is a construction technology company based in San Jose, California, with a notable presence in New York City. Founded in 2021, it focuses on automating and simplifying the construction permitting process for developers, builders, contractors, architects, and property owners across the United States.

The company offers a comprehensive permit management platform that streamlines permit preparation, submission, and tracking for construction projects nationwide. Its software digitizes and automates workflows, providing real-time tracking and transparency into permit status. PermitFlow coordinates directly with Authorities Having Jurisdiction (AHJs) to expedite responses and approvals, significantly reducing permit times. The platform supports a variety of construction projects, from single-family homes to large commercial developments.

PermitFlow has achieved strong growth, supporting over $600 million in projects and more than 2,000 housing units across several states. The company has raised approximately $36.5 million in funding and is led by co-founders Francis Thumpasery and Samuel Lam, along with Preston Lyons as Head of Sales.

James E. Trimmer founded Precise Forms Inc. in March of 1967, to be operated using strict standards in every aspect. These standards were achieved through his active involvement in the industry and his first-hand exposure to the contractor's needs. These standards ensure that you, our valued customer, are pleased with everything that you receive.

We start at the very beginning with the highest quality raw materials. From there our manufacturing team is painstakingly exact in their production to prevent any problems in the field. We have installed robot welders to ensure consistent welds and increased productivity. The shipping department knows exactly how to get your order to you when you need it. When you do need something, just give our sales department a call. They are always glad to assist you with any of your needs.

Precise started as, and still is today, a family owned and operated business with sights set for aggressive contractors and their needs. Thanks to the quality of Precise's service and products we have been able to grow from a small building 1967, to over 150,000 square feet and still growing. There has been and always will be a strong motivation to update products and meet the needs of our customers. Please share with us any suggestions on how we can serve you better.

Purple Wave Auction is a full-service online auction company that specializes in no-reserve auctions for equipment and vehicles. Founded in 2000 in Kansas, the company primarily serves the construction, agriculture, and fleet industries. In 2008, Purple Wave shifted its focus to exclusively offer online auctions for used equipment and vehicles, establishing itself as the largest no-reserve internet auction platform in the United States.

The company hosts over 150 auctions each year, attracting millions of unique visitors. Purple Wave provides a fully online bidding process that simplifies transactions for both buyers and sellers, eliminating the need to move equipment from the seller's location. Their services include marketing and listing assets, transaction management, and data analytics to enhance auction outcomes. With a dedicated team of over 200 employees, Purple Wave continues to grow, leveraging technology to offer a reliable and efficient auction experience.

RATEC GmbH is a family-run company that specializes in developing and producing advanced shuttering and formwork systems for the precast concrete industry. With nearly 30 years of experience, RATEC has established itself as a global leader in magnetic formwork technology and mould solutions.

The company offers a wide range of products, including magnetic shuttering systems, 3D mould solutions, and Upcrete® technology, which allows for the production of complex precast concrete elements in a single operation. Their subsidiary, RATEC America Corp., located in Clearwater, Florida, manufactures products specifically for the North American market and distributes IDAT GmbH software in the region.

RATEC is committed to innovation and continuous product development, working closely with engineering firms and customers to enhance production efficiency and quality in the precast concrete sector.

DHC Supplies, Inc. is an employee-owned construction supply company dedicated to serving contractors, builders, framers, and industrial businesses across Northern California and Northern Nevada. Since 1961, we've been a trusted partner for professionals looking for high-quality construction materials and specialized products. Our mission is to provide exceptional service, industry expertise, and the best products to help our customers complete their projects efficiently and with precision.

As an employee-owned business since 1991, we take pride in offering personalized service and working closely with our customers to understand their unique needs. We offer free daily jobsite delivery within a 50-mile radius of our locations in Santa Rosa, CA, and Sparks, NV, ensuring that your materials arrive on time to keep your projects on schedule. Our team is ready to provide expert advice and support, from custom orders to selecting the right products for your specific needs.

At DHC Supplies, we stock a wide variety of construction materials, including fasteners, adhesives, anchors, power tools, hand tools, pneumatic tools, rebar, concrete embedment products, and safety gear. Whether you're working on a residential remodel, large commercial construction, or industrial project, we have the materials you need to get the job done right. We carry only top-tier brands and products, ensuring reliability and performance on every project.

What sets us apart is our commitment to delivering the right products with speed and reliability. We aren't just a supplier—we're a true partner in the success of your projects. Our knowledgeable team is always available to assist you with expert guidance and the best construction solutions for your specific needs.

DHC Supplies is here to help you succeed with fast, reliable service and industry-leading products. We invite you to contact us today or visit our website to learn more about how we can support your business.

Short Description:
Scania Group is a prominent global manufacturer of heavy commercial vehicles, including trucks, buses, and engines. Established in 1911 through the merger of two Swedish firms, the company has a rich heritage that dates back to 1891. Headquartered in Södertälje, Sweden, Scania has delivered over 1.4 million trucks and buses worldwide, focusing on heavy transport solutions.

The company produces a diverse range of heavy trucks designed for various transport needs, emphasizing driver comfort, stability, and fuel efficiency. Scania also manufactures buses for city, intercity, and coach services, prioritizing safety and environmental performance. Additionally, Scania develops industrial and marine engines, including powerful V8 turbo diesel engines. The company provides comprehensive aftermarket services, including maintenance, repair, and fleet management solutions, and invests in sustainability initiatives such as alternative fuels and electrification technologies. Scania serves a global customer base, including commercial transport operators and logistics companies, with a strong presence in Europe.

Securis, founded in 2003 and based in Chantilly, Virginia, is a prominent provider of information technology asset disposal (ITAD) services. The company specializes in ultra-secure electronics recycling, auditing, hard drive shredding, and data destruction for various electronic devices, including PCs, laptops, and mobile phones. Securis emphasizes rigorous data security and environmental responsibility in its operations.

The company offers both on-site and off-site services, including electronic media shredding, classified data destruction, and degaussing. Securis is certified by several organizations, ensuring compliance with U.S. federal, state, and local regulations. They serve a diverse range of industries, such as financial services, healthcare, and government agencies, meeting their stringent security and compliance needs.

Securis is dedicated to security, compliance, and sustainability, ensuring the protection of clients' sensitive data while promoting responsible recycling practices.

Sel Sealants, founded in 1991 and based in Istanbul, Turkey, is a prominent manufacturer of chemical and automotive chemicals, primarily known for its SELSIL brand. The company operates two major production facilities: a 33,000 sqm plant in Silivri and a 46,000 sqm aerosol plant in Corlu. Sel Sealants is recognized as the largest producer of sealants and foams in its region and uniquely manufactures and prints its own HDPE cartridges.

The company offers a wide range of products, including various types of sealants such as acrylic, neutral, weather, silicone, and polyurethane, as well as PU foams, adhesives, technical sprays, and more. Sel Sealants exports to over 115 countries, including major markets like the USA, Japan, and Europe. In 2019, it established SELSIL Sealants India Pvt Ltd to enhance its presence in India, supported by a network of channel partners. With ongoing investments in innovation and plans for new production sites, Sel Sealants is committed to quality and building strong partnerships with clients worldwide.
